The topics addressed in this course include: (1) Basic concept and application of stochastic optimization, (2) Two-stage stochastic programming model, (3) Multi-stage stochastic model, (4) Stochastic programming algorithms, (5) Robust optimization model, (6) Simulation optimization algorithms, (7) Reinforcement learning algorithms, (8) Paper readings on stochastic optimization.

description.zh: 這是一門研究所課程，內容包括多元數據分析和高等回歸應用。本課程的目標是確保工業工程與管理領域的研究生能夠解釋、實現和操作幾種不同類型的基本回歸分析。本課程主要致力於高等回歸分析。重點是發展一個嚴格的微積分計算及矩陣代數為基礎的最小平方法 (OLS)、違反回歸假設、假說檢定及一般線性模型。此外，本課程的重點是協助學生理解分析技術這部分的領域知識，如：統計的基本概念 (描述和推理統計，概率分佈)，簡單線性回歸、多元線性回歸、邏輯回歸及對數線性模型之應用。
description.en: This course covers multivariate data analysis as well as advanced regression applications. The course is primarily devoted to advanced regression analysis. Th? emphasis is on developing a rigorous calculus and matrix algebra-based understanding of ordinary least squares (OLS), violations of regression assumptions, hypothesis testing, and the general linear model. In addition, the emphasis of this course is on the acquisition and understanding of analytical techniques such as basic concepts of statistics (descriptive and inferential statistics, probability distributions), simple linear regression, multiple linear regression, logistic regression, log-linear model.

description.zh: 本課程提供學生對於專案管理之主要原則與專案排程實務，並學習運用專案排程管理軟體工具。本課程探討專案管理與排程實務課題，包括專案之需求、經理、工作團隊、溝通、排程管理、預算、成本控制等，並學習專案排程管理軟體工具。
description.en: The course objective is to introduce students about key principles of project management and the use of project scheduling software.This course discusses the factors necessary for the successful project management.  Topics include project management concepts, needs identification, the project manager, teams, project organizations, project communications, project planning, scheduling, control and associated costs.  Project management software tools will be an integral part of the course.

description.zh: 在本課程中，藉由資料蒐集、活動設計、課堂討論與經驗分享等過程，使學生對學習生產力及其特性有所省思與瞭解，掌握正確有效的學習方法，學習如何主動組合、整理、解釋知識，進而培養推廣該專業領域新知的能力。
description.en: By collecting the information, activity planned, discussion in the lessons and sharing the experiences etc. in order to make the students understand this course and it's characteristic, moreover, exactly know well the effective mothod of learning, studying how to make up automatically, arrangement, explain the knowledge, in the meantime, to train and spread their professional ability in the new territory

description.zh: 本課程介紹網路模式的分析與整數規劃問題相關的數學模式、演算法及相關應用，包含相關模式的觀念、方法、數理基礎與分析。網路模式部分包括基本圖學與網路流量最佳化相關的演算法；整數規劃部分包含旅行者問題、有效不等式、與分支定界演算法。
description.en: This course introduces the theory and characteristics of network and integer programming problems. In network models, basic graph theory along with network optimization algorithms is included to have a comprehensive understanding. Introduction to integer programming problems such as traveling salesman problems as well as detail study of valid inequalities and branch-and-bound method, including the concepts, techniques, mathematical analysis and justification. Emphasis is placed on the rigorous theoretical foundations that give rise to solution algorithms.

description.zh: 使學生瞭解品質管理的觀念、原理、領域。品管部門的組織、功能，如何管理產品或服務的品質，品管的工具、方法，如何持續改善品質的方法，品質表示法，如何評估品質管理成效，相關法令，品質管理未來趨勢。
description.en: This course lets the students understand the concepts, theories, and areas of qualify control, organization and functions of quality department. Besides, the way to manage the products or the service quality, tools and methods of quality control, the way to improve the quality, quality representation method, evaluation of quality control, related regulations and future trends are also included

description.zh: 論文指導教授與醫師協商讓學生於在學期間的寒暑假到論文研究相關醫院進行實習。
description.en: Advisor in consultation with physicians suggest the student to practice at the hospital related to the thesis research during the winter and summer vacations at school.

notes: 限機電所智慧醫療器材組學生加選，須配合至馬偕醫院

description.zh: 本課程主要在講述醫學工程基本觀念，內容包括解剖學及生理學、生物力學、復建工程及輔具科技、生醫材料、組織工程、生醫電子系統、生醫感測系統、生醫訊號處理、生醫影像處理、生醫超音波、生醫光學及雷射。
description.en: This course mainly introduces the basic concepts of  Medical Engineering, including anatomy and physiology, biomechanics, rehabilitation engineering and assistive device technology, biomaterials, tissue engineering, biomedical electronics, biomedical sensing systems, biomedical signal processing, biomedical image processing, biomedical ultrasound, biomedical optics and laser.

notes: 丙組必修

description.zh: 讀書報告、專題討論、機電系統產品介紹與討論、Seminar 心得等。可重覆修習。
description.en: Case Study, Mechatronics in Industry, Seminars.

description.zh: 硬體簡介、影像處理 (單色、彩色、3D 及即時)、圖案識別 (Patten Recognition)、機械視覺於順序控制之應用、機械視覺於回授控制之應用、高速檢測、機械人與機械視覺之結合及應用。
description.en: Introduction to Hardware of Vision System, Image Processing (Monochrome, Color, 3D and real-time), Pattern Recognition, Application of MV to Sequential Control Application of MV to Feedback Control. High Speed Inspection, Combined Applications of Robotics and MV.

notes: 計中電腦教室，限 40 人

description.zh: 以結構工程、大地工程、防災科學、運輸交通、營建管理、營建材料及營建技術為專題討論主題之主要範疇。
description.en: SeminarSpecial subject discussion of structure engineering , geography engineering pretecting calamity science, transportation, construction management , construction material and construction technique.

notes: 甲乙組

description.zh: 數值分析為一重要的工具，可用來預測大地工程在施工過程中的變形行為，作為防災的指標。本課程將包含有限元素法，有限差分法，離散元素法及邊界元素法，以配合 "非線性力學"" 岩石力學 ""土壤動力學" 等基礎課程，而延伸至應用的課程，如 "土壤與結構物互制行為"" 土石結構耐震分析 ""地盤改良".... 等等。
description.en: Numerical analysis includes finite element method, finite difference method,discrete element method,and boundary element method. These numerical tool can be based on foundamental geotechnical course to extend to application courses.

notes: EMI 英文

description.zh: 鉆探、取樣及地球物理方法，十字片剪力儀、孔內側壓力儀、平鈹膨脹儀、階段平鈑膨脹儀、孔內直接剪力儀、平鈑載重試驗、基椿載重試驗、地錯抗拔試驗、現場透水試驗探討，岩石直剪、平鈑、岩石裂縫、孔內應力、岩栓抗拔、隧道浮空等量測探討，鋼筋計、水壓計、土壓計、沈陷計等監測儀器之運用說明。
description.en: advanced engineering geology     , sampling and physical method, application of instrument and test like pressurement , vane shear instrument , dilationter . in-situ permeability test, direct shear instrument, foundation loads test, rock direct shear test, rock cleft, pressure meter, steel bar instrument , piezometer, soil pressurement .

description.zh: 本課程探討作業研究方法在營建工程之應用，課程內容包括作業方研究方法，施工作業研究，工期控制之作業研究，資源調配之作業研究，工期與成本控制之作業研究，施工材料之最佳管理，其他施工作業問題之研究。
description.en: operation's studyConstruction engineer and the study of operations. The study of the operation's method , construction , working phase, distribution the resources, working phase and cost control the best manage of construction making and other studies of working matters.

description.zh: 運用無人機技術做為測遙工具為一新穎科技，本課程以航空動力學為前題，分別介紹定翼及旋翼型無人機運作原理，基於航空攝影目的介紹飛行及航拍任務規劃。同時藉由實作，學生將自行組裝及設計無人機，並實際自行拍攝影像、產製所需之空間資訊，如：正射、地形等地理資訊系統圖資。
description.en: The Unmanned Aerial Vehicle (UAV), commonly known as a drone, is an aircraft without human pilot on board that flies autonomously, and is now been used widely for many aspects because of its convenience, high resolution, efficiency, etc. This course introducing first the aerodynamic of different drone frames, as well as the basic photogrammetry. Then try to design and assembly our drones. By using the home-made drones, the students will learn how to do the mission planning and take photos. Finally, the students should generate the geomatic information from their acquired images.

name.zh: 無人機攝影測量概論與實作

notes: 土木三甲乙和防災所合開 / 研究所限 15 人

description.zh: 本課程主要介紹有關災害發生的種類，以及相對應的災害預防規劃，並探討各種風險發生之機會，以進一步研擬危機緊急處計畫，以落實災害防治與減害的功效。
description.en: This course  will introduce the category, of disaster and each related preventing design.For deriving emergency treatment plan, the theory of rick management will be also discussed.

name.en: Disaster Prevention Planning and Risk Management

notes: 管理組必選

description.zh: 1. 結構物劣化形態，介紹.2. 目視檢測與非破性檢測。3. 現況評估與分析。4. 維修與補強設計。
description.en: 1.Reterioration types of concrete structures. 2.Visual an Non-estructive inspection. 3.Conition Evaluation and Analysis. 4.Maintenance and Repair Design.

name.zh: 結構物檢測評估及補強

notes: 土木四甲乙 & 防災所合開 / 研究所限 25 人

description.zh: 高性能混凝土之特性，材料，配比設計及試驗，品質管制，施工規範及構件行為。
description.en: This course focuses on the characteristics of high performance concrete, composition materials, mixture design and testing, quality management, construction specifications, as well as structural behavior.

description.zh: 本課程說明受壓構件之挫屈及挫屈後之線性及非線性行為及分析。整體挫屈及局部挫屈亦分別探討，圖使學生建立結構穩定之整體觀念。
description.en: To demonstrate the linear and nonlinear behaviore as well as analysis of buckling and postbuckling problems for pressed members. Both overall and local buckling are investigated.It is aimed to established an integrated idea for students at structural stability.

description.zh: 岩石工程是一門應用的課程，它的重點在於把基本的岩石力學的原理，運用在實際的工程問題上，因此，這門課將介紹岩石力學在岩石邊坡、岩石基礎、及岩石隧道上的應用。上課的學生在完成這門課之後，應該對這三大類的問題都有清楚的了解。為了使沒有上過岩石力學的學生也能進入狀況，這門課會先對岩體分類法（如 RMR 法及 Q 法）及立體投影圖加以回顧，然後再進行岩石邊坡工程、岩石基礎工程、及岩石隧道工程的介紹。「岩石工程」的課程大綱如下：
description.en: The focus of this course is the application of the basic principles of rock mechanics.  Three types of applications are to be covered in this semester-long course: rock slopes, rock foundations, and rock tunnels.  The students are expected to complete assignments in each of the above three categories.  To prepare students with no previous academic work in rock mechanics, this course will review the classification systems of rock masses (such as the RMR and the Q systems).  Also, the stereographic projection is a required tool, which will be introduced in this course.

description.zh: 近年發生之福島核災、印度新德里爆炸案等各種天然及人為災害已顯著影響到人類的生活品質與安全。本課程目標有三：(1) 了解各種災害形成原因及環境背景因素；(2) 評估災害對社會、環境及人類之影響及因應措施；(3) 新穎技術可擴大環境監測尺度並預警災害。較為代表性之災害會於課堂中案例講述，加深同學學習印象。工程背景較為薄弱之學生，亦適合選修此課程。學習成效：學生可獲得：(1)	災害管理內涵與重要觀念。(2)	評估災害風險與危機管理。(3)	研擬災前的災後復原重建計畫。
description.en: The recurrent occurrences of various natural and manmade disasters like the December 2004 Tsunami, the bomb blasts in the cinema halls of Delhi and many such incidences have diverted our focus towards safety of one’s own life. The goals of this course are three-fold: (1) To educate students about the underlying natural process that give rise to hazards. (2) To emphasize how society evaluates and confronts the dangers posed by these natural processes from a political, social, and ethical perspective. (3) Expose students to the technological innovations that are allowing an increasing large human population to monitor, predict, and warn society about natural hazards and impending disasters. Case studies of recent and past natural disasters will be discussed. This course is designed for students without an extensive background in science or math and can be used to partly satisfy minor programs in Environmental Geosciences.Learning Outcomes: Upon completion of this course, students will

notes: 土木四甲乙和防災所合開 / EMI 英文 / 研究所限 15 人

description.zh: 課程主軸以實務應用為出發點，擬建立水情與洪氾模擬的整合系統。其系統架構包含下列主要項目：1. 連結雷達降雨 QPESUMS 與數值氣候模式的資料，用以作為整個系統的主要輸入資料來源；2. 建立模擬計算能量，包含降雨逕流、渠道、下水道、水利設施、邊界條件如下游潮位、以及二維漫地流淹水模式；3. 動態展示所有資料與計算成果，包含一維與二維的時序列資料；4. 各種轉換處理，包含圖層套疊、空間內插、時間序列補遺等。學員需要設立水情模擬整體環境以及熟悉各項子架構之間的連結，再者，用此系統來對應評估颱洪事件的應變計畫與治理設計，也是相當課程相當著重的部分。
description.en: An integrated system is expected in this class to carry out flood simulation under the configuration close to real practice.  The configuration includes:1.forcing data from QPESUMS which is radar rainfall as well as NWP, numerical weather prediction, usually used in emergency response;2.models considering rainfall round-off, channels, sewers, hydraulic structures, boundary conditions like tidal setup, and 2D overland flow to simulate the flooding area;3.dynamic demonstration which presnets all the possible calculated results as 1D or 2D time series;4.transformation contains spatial overlay, interpolation, and gap filling.Students are asked to setup the environment and familiar with the links among all the configuration.  In addition, planning and response to a typhoon event with the system are encouraged as well as the system development.

notes: 土木四甲乙和防災所合開 / EMI 英文 / 研究所限 20 人

description.zh: 在現代的工程設計與分析中，普遍應用到相關的電腦模式。儘管大部份工程應用電腦模式均以定率式的物理關係作為基礎，但引用電腦模式進行設計，必須考慮隱含在模式輸入與控制參數的不確定性，及其所產生模式輸出的不確定性。因此，適當的評估模式輸出的不確定性應包含在基本的設計當中。
description.en: In modern engineering designs and analyses, computer models are frequently used. Despite the fact that deterministic relationships are used in most compiterized models for engineering,the model outputs are indeterministic due to the uncertain and stochastic nature of the model inputs and parameters. All the uncertainty may contribute to the stochsticity of the input parameters of a corresponding model which, in turn, result in output uncertainty. Therefore,proper assessment of model outout uncertainty is essential.

description.zh: 應用定量分析法於水資源規劃與管理，並介紹系統分析、本益比之評估、多目標規劃與風險評估。
description.en: Quantitative analytical methods in water resources planning and management; introduction to systems analysis, benefit/cost, multi-objective planning and risk assessment.

notes: EMI 英文

description.zh: 地表和地下水的非點源污染，已經成為全世界各地區相當嚴重的環境問題。非點源污染本身複雜的特性導致集水區內污染物承載推估與污染源之標定非常困難。本課程之目的以介紹非點源污染之污染源特性及傳輸途徑為起點，教導學生學習使用最新的科技與工具，去建立最有效可行的最佳管理作業 (Best Management Practice, BMP) 之配置計劃，以達到集水區內非點源污染之削減目標。學生們將學習應用與統合地理資訊系統、遙測資料、水文暨水質數理模式、以及專家系統去解決集水區內非點源污染的控制問題。
description.en: Nonpoint source (NPS) pollution of streams, lakes, and estuaries has been a critical concern throughout the world.  The difficulty in both identifying and assessing nonpoint source pollution resides precisely in the complex nature of NPS.  This course aims to expose students to state-of-the-art tools and techniques for developing effective Best Management Practice (BMP) allocation plans to control NPS pollution at the watershed scale.  The foundations of this course will be focused on definition of NPS pollution, NPS pollutant dynamics in bioenvironmental systems, watershed hydrology and NPS pollutant transport, as well as BMPs for NPS pollution control.  Students will next learn how to apply Geographic Information System (GIS), Remote Sensing (RS), hydrologic modeling and Artificial Intelligence (AI) technologies to the solutions of NPS pollution problems in watersheds.  The tools and techniques presented are flexible and students will be able to apply them to solve NPS type of proble

description.zh: 隨著衛星資料的取得變得更為容易，衛星遙測在各領域的應用在近年來變得更為廣泛。本課程將從遙測之基本概念開始介紹，接著介紹常用的衛星資料來源，最後本課程將簡介在土木與環工領域的衛星遙測應用。本課程一半以上的時間將為實作，學生將熟習在遙測分析軟體上分析真正的衛星資料，並在學期末遞交對自選主題之一研究報告。
description.en: The applications of satellite remote sensing data in various fields have been popular with the increase of selections of satellite data sources in recent years. This course will start with basic concepts of remote sensing, then introduce popular satellite data sources. In the end, the course will introduce applications of satellite data in the field of civil and environmental engineering. More than 50% of the class time will be hands-on. Students will have the opportunity to work on actual satellite data. At the end of the semester, students will need to submit a research report on topics chosen by students.

name.zh: 土木與環工之衛星遙測應用與實作
name.en: Applications of Satellite Remote Sensing in Civil and Environmental Engineering with labs

notes: 土木四甲乙和防災所合開 / EMI 英文 / 研究所 25 人

description.zh: 風工程是一個跨領域的學科，屬於研究所課程，適合已有良好工程力學以及流體力學基礎的學生選修。然而為了推廣我國工程師及土木系大學生了解此門學問，本課程設計為大四及研究所學生選修的先導型課程。本課程內容涵蓋大氣邊界層、鈍體空氣動力學以及空氣彈力學的基礎知識，進而闡述建築物耐風設計以及橋梁耐風設計的概念，配合我國以及國際上常用之耐風設計規範作為解說及練習，輔助學生對於風工程有一定的認識。其他如空氣污染擴散、通風節能減熱、計算流體力學應用等與風相關的主題，亦在本課程提出概略性的介紹以及發展現況。
description.en: Wind Engineering is a cross-disciplinary subject that belongs to the institute course and is suitable for students who have a good background in engineering mechanics and fluid mechanics. However, in order to promote the knowledge of Wind Engineering to engineers and civil engineering students, this course is designed as the precursor courses selected by seniors and graduate students. This course covers the basic knowledge of atmospheric boundary layer, bluff body aerodynamics and air-elasticity, and then expounds the wind-resistant design of buildings and the concept of wind-resistant design of bridges. It is used as an explanation and practice with the wind-resistant design codes commonly used internationally. Students have a certain understanding of wind engineering. Other wind-related topics such as air pollution diffusion, ventilation energy conservation and heat reduction, computational fluid dynamics applications, etc., also provide a brief introduction and development status in

name.en: Introduction to Theory and Applications in Wind Engineering

description.zh: 專題報告，專題演講，研究小組討論 Case Study, Seminar
description.en: Case Study, Seminar

description.zh: 一維及多維穩定態熱傳導及非穩定態熱傳導、對流原理、強迫對流及自然對流經驗和實驗關係式、輻射熱傳遞、凝結與沸騰、熱交換器、熱傳遞中的特殊論題
description.en: Steady-State Conduction-One Dimension, Steady-State Conduction-Multiple Dimensions, Unsteady-State Conduction, Principles of Convection, Empirical and Practical Relations for Forced-Convection Heat Transfer, Natural- Convection Systems, Radiation Heat Transfer, Condensation and Boiling Heat Transfer, Heat Exchangers, Special Topics in Heat Transfer.

notes: 車輛所、能源與車輛外生合開

description.zh: 本課程所為研究所課程，內容包括狀態控間分析，頻域分析，現代數位控制理論分析及控制器設計，應用實例介紹。
description.en: This course is designed mainly for senior-graduate students. The objective of this course is to introduce some fundamental concepts of digital control, such as state space approach, frequency domain approach, and modern control theory. The design and applications of the digital controllers are also included.

notes: 車輛所、能源與車輛外生合開

description.zh: 1. 基本車輛動態簡介 2. 駕駛人模型 3. 引擎／動力系統控制 4. 恆速行駛控制 5. 防滑驅動 / 防鎖死煞車控制 6. 四輪轉向控制 7. 主動式／半主動式懸吊 8. 智慧交通系統 9. 主動式安全系統 10. 複合動力控制系統
description.en: To provide an overview of Vehicle Dynamics and Control Systems of intelligent vehicles in ITS.  Students will learn introduction to vehicle dynamics, driver modeling, driving simulation, engine/power-train control, cruise control, traction control/ABS, four-wheel steering, steer-by-wire, active/semi-active suspension, intelligent traffic systems, active safety technologies, and advanced power-train technologies.  Upon completion of this course, students should be able to follow the literature on these subjects and perform independent design, research and development work in this field.

description.zh: 課程包含模糊控制與灰色系統，培養學生能運用模糊控制與灰色系統之理論於控制系統及車輛系統上，內容包括模糊集合，近似推理理論，解模糊方法，模糊控制器之設計，模糊控制器之應用，. 灰色系統，灰預測原理，灰色建模，灰色控制。
description.en: Fuzzy control and grey system are introduced in this course.  Then students can apply these theories to control systems and vehicle control.  Contents are fuzzy sets, inference, design of fuzzy controller, application, gray system, gray prediction, gray modeling, and gray control.

notes: 車輛所、能源與車輛外生合開

description.zh: 自由度、(平面與空間) 運動幾何分析、彈簧、避震器、力傳遞分析、撓性、電腦輔助懸吊系統分析與設計。
description.en: Degree of Freedom, (2D and 3D) Kinematic Analysis, Springs, Dampers, Force Analysis, Compliance, Computer Aided Analysis and Design of Suspension Systems.

notes: 車輛四、日、職車輛所合開

description.zh: 介紹各種產能反應的原子分子層級理論，包括燃燒、氫生成反應、氧還原反應、二氧化碳還原反應，和電化學電池、燃料電池，新能源材料等物理化學反應程序，以及低碳應用。
description.en: This course introduces reactions of energy production in the insight of atomic and molecular scale, including combustion, hydrogen evolution reaction, oxygen reduction reaction, carbon dioxide reduction reaction, and physiochemical mechanisms of electrochemical cells, fuel cells, new energy materials, and low-carbon applications.

notes: 車輛所、能源與車輛外生合開

description.zh: 工程最佳化方法導論，線性規劃法，非線性規劃法，多目標函數最佳化，近代數學規劃法介紹，精密機電元件與系統之最佳設計。
description.en: Engineering optimization concepts,Linear progrsmming methods, Nonlinear programming Methods, Multi-objective optimization, Introduction to Modern mathematical programming techniques,Optimum design of precision machine components and systems.

notes: 日職車輛、能源、機電博外生、能源與車輛外生合

description.zh: 專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論
description.en: Literature Study, Seminar, Group meeting.

notes: 碩士班

description.zh: 本課程之目的為訓練學生計算冷凍空調設備之蒸發器、冷凝器之熱傳與壓損的能力，以提升冷凍空調設備之設計能力。內容包括兩相流之流譜分析與動量方程式、兩相介面之表面張力作用、熱沸騰與冷凝等相變化之基本現象、兩相流之沸騰與冷凝熱傳性能之計算與分析、兩相流之流力現象分析與壓損之計算、蒸發器與冷凝器之熱傳增強技術等。
description.en: This course offers traning of advanced design techniques of evaporators and condensers in the HVAC & R applications.  The subjects in this course are: the two phase flow regime, analysis of momentum and energy equations for two phase flow, method of prediction of pressure drop of two phase flow, fundamental phenomena of condensation and evaporation, calculation of heat transfer coefficient of convective condensation or evaporation, heat transfer enhancement techniques for condensation and evaporation.

notes: 與職能源所合開

description.zh: 現代能源工程技術，決定製程成本，故如何統合有效率的能源管理技術是決定產品競爭力之關鍵，本課程主要內容為︰1. 能源成本控制 2. 區域型電力能管理策略 3. 能源系統的經濟性設計概念 4. 冷暖系統的檢測與分析 5. 總合能源操作的工程化資料收集 6. 新能源系統的生態模組化設計
description.en: At the completion of this course, students will be able to several factors:1. Compare and contrast the various forms of energy conversion.2. Examine the technologies used to convert chemical energy into mechanical energy.3. Apply the concepts of electrical converters.4. Evaluate the major types of energy storage.5. Determine how human values affect the success of energy conservation.6. Design of new energy system modules with ecology considerations.

notes: 計中電腦教室

description.zh: 實驗是進行科學與工程研究不可或缺的工具，實驗方法的設計與實驗數據的分析更是決定實驗結果品質優劣的關鍵，本課程將介紹實驗過程所必須具備的各項知識，以數據的量測與分析為開始，並介紹量測各類物理量的感測元件，如壓力、溫度、流量及聲波等，以建立學生具備實驗量測的基礎。課程主要內容包含有基本量測、量測標準、量測單位、訊號讀取、資料簡報、數據的準確性與變異性、類比訊號量測、數位訊號量測、系統響應、感測器。
description.en: Introduction of Experiment and Measurement MethodExperiment is the essential tool for the research of science and engineering. The design of experiment and the analysis of data are the keys of the high quality of experiment. The course will introduce the materials of experiment and measurement. The procedures of measurement and the analysis method of data will be detailed investigated. And then the sensors to measure the interested physical parameters of pressure, temperature, flow rate and acoustic will be introduced. The technology of measurement and analysis of experiment will be built up in the course. The contents of the course are basic measurement, standards of measurement, dimension of measurement, access data, data presentation, accuracy and uncertainty of data, analog signal measurement, digital signal measurement, system response, and sensors.

notes: 蔡府伯

description.zh: 本課程主要包含四部份，分別為基本有限差分法、流體力學與熱傳方程式的有限差分法應用、有限體積法、格點產生法。
description.en: This course comprises four parts. Part one is fundamentals of finite-difference methods. Part 2 is the application of finite-difference methods to the equations of fluid mechanics and heat transfer. Part 3 is finite-volume method. Part 4 is grid generation.

description.zh: 能源工程主要為介紹現有能源供應系統包含熱能及電能，上課的內容為包含熱流原理導論及再生能源、傳統火力電廠與汽電共生系統的系統原理介紹。
description.en: The concepts of thermal energy and electrical energy will be included in the Energy Engineering; the different energy system which will be introduced is as follows: renewable energy, traditional thermal power plant and cogeneration power system.

description.zh: 本課程內容包括﹕熱力學第一定律、熱力學第二定律、結合兩定律之可用能、單相系統、可用能分析、多相系統、動力廠、冷凍、熱力最佳化、不可逆熱力學。
description.en: The contents of this course include the first law of thermodynamics, the second law of thermodynamics, the two laws combined in analysis: the destruction of exergy, single-phase systems, exergy analysis, multiphase systems, refrigeration, thermodynamic optimization, and irreversible thermodynamics.

description.zh: 中文概述：專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論。
description.en: Case study. Seminar. Group meeting.

notes: 碩二

description.zh: 本課程訓練學生熟悉電腦系統並應用電腦套裝軟體，作為研究分析之基礎，以進行教育研究工作，包含 SPSS、ERIC 及其他相關軟體。
description.en: This course emphasis the applications of computer in the educational research.

name.zh: 電腦在教育研究的應用

notes: 碩班

description.zh: 本課程首先探討學校評鑑理論與實務相關議題，其次瞭解各國技職學校評鑑現況，並提出相關資訊以作為修正與改進當前技職學校評鑑實務的指引。
description.en: This course first discusses the concept of school evaluation, followed by a presentation of case studies of school evaluation from across the World. We also provide information to project staff and key stakeholders as a guide for revision and improvement of project plans, management, utilization of resources and training activities

notes: 博碩課程

description.zh: 本課程在導引學生了解教師專業的相關概念與理論，協助學生探究教師專業的基本素養與評量標準，以及教師生涯各階段專業發展的再精進策略。
description.en: This course is to guide students to understand the relevant concepts and theories on teacher professionals；to explore the basic literacy of teachers and assessment of professional criteria；to investigate  the successful strategies of professional development for teachers in different career stages.

notes: 博碩課程

description.zh: 學術論文簡報的能力是學術專業人員所必備的專業知能，以清楚簡明的方法傳遞專業科學的內容，需要報告者展現清楚的語言溝通能力。而本課程即是在培養學生具備在國際會議場合上進行學術論文簡報的能力。課程內容包括：優化學生英文基本能力、熟悉學術英文簡報的架構、學習使用資料視覺化傳遞科學研究發現，以及建立個人簡報風格等循序開展。修課學生需要具備基本的英文能力，並具備閱讀英文撰寫之學術報告的能力。學期間授課教師以講授法與小組合作介紹學術論文簡報的架構、製作學術論文簡報的注意事項、介紹常用之學術英文表現句型，並帶領學生每週撰寫一篇 10 分鐘的英文演說稿，最後學生以英文進行個人學術論文簡報作為最終考核的成果。
description.en: In today's international scientific community, an academic professional is required to present his/her scientific works in a professional manner in English. It is necessary that a scientist can deliver his/her own idea in a clear and precise language.  This course is designed to prepare the students with the ability doing academic presentation in an international conference. The contents of this course include the improvement of students' English proficiency, the introduction of the academic presentation format, and the delivery of key findings by using data visualization skills.  It is required that the students should have basic English capacity and can read a scientific report written in English.  The course material would be delivered by the instructor through weekly class literature and the team work projects. By the end of semester, the students would know the popular sentences used to express their result findings. The students would also learn how to make their own academic p

notes: 博碩課程

description.zh: 公共關係為學校及企業之重要課題，本課程為將現代科技化、智慧化觀念及方法，融入於公共關係，作一時代性革新，使學習者對變化迅速之複雜人際關係及危機處理具備因應之能力。
description.en: Public relations skills are essential not only in business but also in academic spheres. The rise of technologies has changed the communication industry. This course will help you recognize major theoretical concepts of communication in the digital world and prepare you to analyze and apply public relations skills in a fast-changing environment.

notes: 博碩課程 孟繼洛教授授課

description.zh: 本課程在探究技職教育的本質、目標、歷史發展及相關哲學思潮，期培養學生發展批判思考能力分析技職教育相關議題。
description.en: This course is designed to investigate the purpose, essence, history,    and related philosophical thinking of Vocational and Technological Technical Education (VTE)；to develop students forming critical thinking to analyze the current issues in VTE.

name.en: Philosophy of Technological and Vocational Education

notes: 博碩課程

description.zh: 本課程旨在探討學習心理的特質、範圍與研究方法；課程重點包括認知學派、行為學派及其他相關學派之分析、學習心理學的應用及未來發展趨勢等。
description.en: This course aims to study the peculiarity, scope, theories, and research methodology on learning psychology. Topics include behavioral approaches, cognitive approaches and other related theories, types of learning, and applications of learning theories.

notes: 博碩課程

description.zh: （一）瞭解人力資源發展之定義、內涵與功能；（二）培養進行人力資源發展之基本能力。課程內容包括：人力資源發展之定義與內涵、人力資源發展之需求評估、人力資源規劃、學習理論、訓練方法、教材編撰、訓練發展評量及國際化人力資源發展等。課程實施方法為講解、討論、參觀訪問及專題討論。
description.en: The course aims to (1) understand the definition, essence, and function of human resources development, (2) cultivate the fundamental capability of human resource development. It covers the definition and essence of human resources development, demand evaluation of human resource development, planning of human resource, learning theories, training method; curriculum designing and compilation, evaluation of training development, and international human resource development. The course is conducted through lectures, discussions, field trip activities, and colloquia.

notes: 新聘專任教師，博碩課程，全英文授課

description.zh: 教育訓練是人力資源的一環，本課程探討教育訓練的種類及評估訓練需求的方法與程序，並了解人力部門在規劃員工訓練計劃之前，如何對員工進行調查以確實地掌握員工的需求及意願，同時亦能掌握企業之發展目標。
description.en: Educational training is part of the human resources. This curriculum will discuss the categories of educational training and evaluate the methods and procedures of the training needs, and understand how the human resource department investigates the employee's needs and will, and know the development aim of the enterprise as well before the planning of the employee educational training program.

name.zh: 教育訓練需求評估與規劃

notes: 博碩課程

description.zh: （一）瞭解生涯規劃與經營的理論及實務；（二）探討生涯規劃與經營模式；（三）應用生涯規劃與經營模式。課程內容包括：生涯規劃與生涯管理的定義、內涵與功能、生涯探究指引、生涯目標設定、生涯策略、生涯評估、生涯管理議題、人力資源支持系統及組織生涯管理系統。
description.en: The course arms to (1) Understand the theory and application Of career planning and management. (2) Explore the model of career planning and management. (3) Apply the career planning and management model. It covers the definition, essence, and function of career planning and management, a guide to career exploration, career goal setting, career strategies, career appraisal, and contemporary issues in career management, human resource support system, and organizational career management system.

name.en: Career Planning and Management for Employees

notes: 新聘專任教師，博碩課程，全英文授課

description.zh: 本課程將教授現行的科技教學工具如電子白板、按按按、電子書包等設計的學理基礎以及應用於教學中的特性及趨勢，並進一步講述如何融入於教學及學習。
description.en: The course is designed to explore how to apply technological tools effectively in the classroom. Concepts and strategies will be covered.

name.en: The use of technology in teaching and learning

notes: 博碩課程

description.zh: 探討網路線上教學的系統化教學設計與評鑑。內容包括線上教學的分析、設計、效益評估，以及線上教學策略、教師角色與任務、學生角色與任務、成功因素、線上教學經營管理、實際線上教學案例等。
description.en: To explore systematic design and evaluation of Web teaching including instructional analysis, design, and evaluation, and online teaching strategies, teacher roles and tasks, student roles and tasks, successful factor,online teaching management, practical online teaching cases etc..

name.en: Design and Evaluation of Web Teaching

notes: 博碩課程，日夜合開

description.zh: 探討數位學習方法與策略。內容包括情境學習、建構學習、合作學習、社會學習、自律學習、自我導向學習、專題學習、問題導向學習等。
description.en: To explore e-learning methods and strategies including situated learning, constructivist learning, cooperative learning, socil learning, self-regulated learning, self-directed learning, project-based learning, problem-based learning etc...

notes: 博碩課程

description.zh: 探討網路專題與問題導向學習之相關原理，以及實務應用。內容包括有網路學習專題與問題導向之理論基礎、優點、特性、限制、科技、媒體、設計與發展、環境、教師教學、學生學習、評量、實際案例、未來趨勢。
description.en: To explore  advanced issues on Web project-based and problem-based learning including their theoretical fundamental, advantages, characteristics, teacher teaching,student learning, assessment, practical cases, and future treand etc...

name.zh: 網路專題與問題導向學習
name.en: Special Topic on Web Project-Based & Problem-Based Learning

notes: 博碩課程

description.zh: 研究生透過個別化的學習方式，就其興趣對技職教育評鑑方案規劃領域，進行小型研究問題的探討與實作，以發展研究能力。
description.en: The selected topic course is planned to develop the skills and research for graduate students and guided by a professor. Analysis of current issues and conclusion or implications underlying major research in planning of evaluation project.

name.zh: 技職教育評鑑方案規劃
name.en: Planning of Evaluation Project in Technical -Vocational Educ

notes: 博碩課程

description.zh: 本課程將透過每週專題演講方式，讓學生了解有機材料之最新開發成品或最先進之研究成果。演講者之安排將以校外知名專家學者及校內各計畫執行者為主。
description.en: This course will provide important information regarding to the latest development or application on the organic materials. Speakers being invited are well-known scholars in organic area.  Graduate students or thesis advisors will also be invited to report any in interesting result from their graduate studies.

notes: 研一單號

description.zh: 本課程是針對已修習一年的大學有機化學的同學，因此課程規劃成反應、機構與結構式等三個主要部分。修畢本課程的同學應已具有瞭解有機化學相關論文與研究成果的能力。
description.en: This course is designed for students who have taken one-year undergraduate organic chemistry course. It is divided into the three fundamental aspects of the study of organic chemistry:reactions, mechanisms and structure. A student who has completed this course should be able to approach the literature directry, with a sound knowledge of modern basic organic chemistry.

description.zh: 本課程以高分子加工時所遇到之問題，分單元講述，其內容包括：(I) 高分子加工學之基礎 (a) 輸送現象 (b) 高分子黏彈學 (c) 高分子混煉。(II) 高分子加工學之應用 (a) 壓模法 (b) 沖模法 (c) 反應沖模法 (d) 絲線成形  等專題。
description.en: The course focuses on the "trouble shooting" in the polymer processing . Both theoretical and practical topics will be included. The main contents are devided into the following units :(I)Fundamental Studies:(a)Transport Phenomena (b)Viscoelastic Properties of  Polymer Melt (c)Polymer Compounding and Blending.(II)Practical Studies:(a)Compression Molding (b)Injection Molding (c)Reaction Injection Molding (d)Fiber Formation (e)Membrane      Formation.

description.zh: 本課程將介紹一系列的生物分子及這些生物分子所扮演的角色。課程從認識細菌、植物、動物細胞及各種細胞胞器開始，接著探討蛋白質、酵素、DNA、RNA 結構和功能及他們在生命中的重要性。再論及 DNA 複製及轉錄和 RNA 轉譯成蛋白質的重要性及機制。PCR 和 DNA 重組技術的重要性是安排在最後來介紹。
description.en: This course is to introduce a series of biomaterials and their functions. Begins from bacterial, plant, and animal cells and the differences between these cell organs. To learn of DNA, RNA, proteins, and enzymes base on their structures and functions. The phenomena of DNA replication and translation, and RNA translation will be studied. The PCR method and DNA recombinant technology also included in this course.

notes: 英語授課

description.zh: 課程兩個主要目標為光譜學方法及分離方法。光譜學方法內容含紫外、可見、紅光、核磁、x-ray 等光譜法。電子譜及質譜也將被討論。分離方法方面有液層、氣層、膠層等層析法。分離後串聯之光譜分析也會學習。
description.en: Two major goals of this course are spectroscopy and separation methods. Spectroscopy methods include ultraviolet, visible, infrared, nuclear magnetic, and x-ray spectroscopies.Election and mass spectrometry are also included. Separation methods are: gas, liquid, and gel chromatographies. In addition, GC-MS,LC-MS, GC-IR, etc. will be studied.

description.zh: 本課程主要探討高分子用於光電工業的原理及方法。主要分為�電子構裝高分子？電路成像高分子？光電子成像材料？最近的光電新材料。包括用於光碟、電變色、非線性光學、LB 薄膜、發光二極體材料，導電及半導電高分子。本課程探討這些材料的合成方法，應用原理以及對未來的展望，作詳細的探討。
description.en: This course is to elucidate the synthesis and application of polymer in optoelectronics.It includes�polymer for electron package?polymer for photoresist?polymer for photoimaging?The advanced material of optics disc, electronic chromic, nonlinear optics, LB film, organic photodiode,and conducting polymer.The synthetic scheme of these material and their application will be fully discussed.

description.zh: 總課程目標： 在學員原有專業基礎上，增加其深度與廣度，包含自實質與非 實質環境之探討與實踐等之能力。 研二課程目標： 透過設計課題培養自實質至非實質環境與實踐之總體操作能力 ，其深度與廣度將是評價判準。 課程概要： 就各學員所選定課題完成一設計成果及完整探討與實踐之過程 書面資料，以接受目標檢驗。
description.en: Goal for the Course : Base on the professional knowledge, the disciples learn to enhance the depth and width of ascertainment and practice in both substantial and non-substantial environments. 2nd Grade Through different design topics, the disciples accomplish the course goal－enhancing the ability of general manipulation and practice in both substantial and non-substantial environments. A complete presentation, which includes design result and a report of the process of ascertainment, will be required for evaluation. The evaluation will emphasize on the depth and width of ascertainment and practice.

description.zh: 本課程區分為四個實習，共一學年之都市設計實習，每學期應從事幾項實習，依該學期之情況而定：(一) 大型基地開發之建築規劃與都市設計實習：參照台北市都市發展局擬定之「都市設計與土地使用開發許可」之審議標準，練習建築、敷地與都市設計三者整合關係之設計實習。(二) 都市更新地區都市設計實習：以台北市更新地區為範例，選定基地範圍從事都市更新地區之改造，建立地區未來像，並擬定都市設計準則。(三) 都市計畫通盤檢討地區都市設計實習：依據都市計畫通盤檢討第八條規定，都市計畫通盤檢討地區必須依據該地區之交通、產業、文化、生態及基地等因素，擬定都市設計準則；以台北市都市計畫通盤檢討為例，練習都市設計準則之訂定，或以都市計畫細部計畫為例，研擬土地使用分區管制與設計準則。(四) 新發展區都市設計實習：選定一個地區，可能是擴大都市發展地區或新市鎮、新社區之規劃設計實習。
description.en: There are four exercises for one academic year. The exercises to be undertaken depend on when and how it is appropriate:(1) Exercise on building planning and urban design for large-scale land development project(2) Exercise practice on urban design for district renewal planning(3) Exercise of overall review district urban design out of the total urban design (4) Exercise on urban design for new development area

description.zh: 本課程為工程技術組必修，分為綠建築、建築構法、數位媒體、建築生產、建築在利用、環境控制等專題，每學期視任課老師專長輪流開設兩至三個專題，採用分組方式個別指導，每位學生必須修習兩個不同專題。本課程將針對建築實務中所面對之技術課題進行個案研究並模擬操作其設計至細部設計階段。
description.en: This is a design studio class, focused on the technical side for topics as Green Building, Building Systems, Digital Design Media, Building Production, Building Reuse, Environment Control, and others were be included. There will have only two or three topics in each semester, depends on the teacher's specialty, and each student needs take two topics in one year.

description.zh: 由於九零年代後，城市急速擴張與超越領域性 (de-terrorization) 的連結等新興狀態萌生，基礎設施 (infrastructure) 的定義逐漸開始難以精確認定，而身為城市興衰論述的經常主體，基礎設施自身的論述與再定義卻在空間學門中成為那缺落的一塊。基於此，本課程期望透過幾項特定學門角度，提供一個對於基礎設施為研究主題的論述框架，進而連結建築學門與相關空間學門間對於當代全球城市論述中之縫隙，能在跨學門田野研究中提出他種可能性 (alternatives)。 本課程將以兩種方項進行基礎設施當代性的 "實踐"; 部分課程內容將邀請德國杜賓根大學台灣研究中心，以空間社會學角度提供授課交流。另一部分將透過雙邊學生，以共同主題進行台北與德國城市的實際田野調查並以比較分析的方式進行合作討論。課程架構則以建築學與空間社會學為主軸剖析，分為五個部分：全球城市與多尺度論述，當代基礎設施與建築 / 地景對話，社會基礎設施的物質性與再生產，看不見的基礎設施與田野調查為總結。預計學生能透過不同學門角度的切入、於不同文化背景學生間合作討論、多種教學方式的引導，培養基礎辯證思考之能力並進一步對當代都市基礎設施的空間性研究之興趣。
description.en: In the contemporary word, especially in globalized cities, infrastructure is hard to define for many reasons and at some points infrastructure is also often invisible to its users.This class will therefore seek to rethink the subject of infrastructure from particular perspectives which frame the structure of this module. We then proposed a join-class with Taiwan study centre at University of T?bingen, Germany for wider debates and teaching possibilities as well. There will be two academic discourses-Architecture and sociology involved and formed into five sessions which can be seen in course syllabus. In so doing, it will focus on firstly by reading theory; secondly, by examining specific case studies that illustrates how these theories manifests themselves; and thirdly, by considering how these infrastructures may be changing the understanding of contemporary globalized cities and reproducing urban networks in different fields and countries.

name.zh: 當代城市中都市社會基礎設施再思
name.en: Rethinking urban social infrastructure in contemporary cities

notes: 建築四和建都所合開

description.zh: 該課程將研究在全球化與氣候變化下的永續與韌性城市發展策略；內容包括永續城市、創意城市、智慧城市、宜居城市、全球城市和後工業城市的各種概念。課程將引導學生參與學術性討論和永續與韌性的城市發展實務理解；提供在不同經濟、體制和文化環境下，探索其規劃政策和設計概念，並以實際案例借鑒不同城市之韌性的回復力規劃，以及說明如何促進城市韌性回復能力，減少社會失序和提高當地應變災害能力的積極策略，因此課程的目標包括讓學生參與永續城市發展的學術討論和韌性城市實踐方法，發展相關知識與了解促進韌性城市和永續性的國際實踐案例，期能將這些概念和經驗應用於規劃設計所需的研究和技能。
description.en: The course will examine strategies for sustainable and resilient urban development in the globalization and climate change. It will engage students in academic discussions and the practice of sustainable and resilient development. Planning policies and design concepts will be explored in different economic, institutional and cultural environments. Case studies draw on best practices in urban resilience planning in different cities, and will illustrate positive strategies to promote urban resilience, reduce social disruption, and improve local ability to deal with pressure. The objectives are to engage students in sustainable urban development, develop knowledge and understand good international practices that promote urban resilience and sustainability, and develop the research and skills necessary to apply these concepts and ideas to actual planning projects.

name.en: Special Topics on Sustainable and Resilient Cities

notes: 日職建都所合開

description.zh: 臺灣建築史的發展大約可分成受到漢民族影響的傳統建築，以及日本和西方世界影響的近現代建築，本課程主要探究臺灣近現代建築發展的歷程。本課程係以時間為軸，將台灣近現代建築分為三個主題：(1) 臺灣近現代建築的背景、(2) 臺灣殖民時期、(3) 二次大戰之後的臺灣建築。
description.en: This course mainly discusses the development of modern Taiwanese architecture since the Japanese colonial period. The historical development of Taiwanese architecture could be divided into traditional Han architecture and modern architecture with Japanese and western influences. Based on the timeline, three themes will be introduced: (1) the background of Taiwanese modern architecture, (2) Taiwanese architecture during the colonial period, (3) Taiwanese architecture after the Second World War.

notes: 建築四和建都所合開

description.zh: 有關建築歷史、理論、批評、構造、營建管理等相關主題討論。
description.en: A theme topic discussion on the field of architecture history, theory, criticism, structure, construction and management, etc.

notes: 建築四和日職建都所合開

description.zh: 說明古蹟及歷史建築之研究價值，研究對象，探討由古蹟建築之時代、地理位置、社會文化環境內容、人為環境內容、組織建築空間與構築建築實體，及其影響因素等各層面來進行研究之過程與方法。透過國內外相關理論與實物的個案分析，現場觀摩與實習，研討台灣古蹟保存與再利用的理論，法源與技術。
description.en: This course will systematically discuss various themes of historical building, including the building's architectural characters and the influent sectors of that social cultural circumstance (ex. historic period, site, or person…) . By way of the reading and discussing about the relative theory and works, that student can understand the though and technique of the architectural preservation and reuse.

notes: 日職建都所合開

description.zh: 我國古蹟與歷史建築之文化遺產防災計畫實施現況，至今因欠缺有系統之調查研究，因此難以了解問題點所在。此外台灣現有之古蹟與歷史建築多為日治時期所遺留下來，而日本至今已有相當多具有良好防災計畫之古蹟與歷史建築案例，應可作為我國相關研究參考，但國內對此課題亦缺少有系統之調查。本課程的授課內容如下：1. 概論 2. 文化遺產防災之重要性 3. 文化遺產防災之基本策略 4. 文化遺產防災之進行方式 5. 文化遺產之災害種類與對策。
description.en: Due to the lack of systematic research work carried out in Taiwan, it is difficult to find out the problems of the current disaster prevention plans for the cultural heritage. Taiwan has many existing vestiges and relics from Japanese colonial period at the moment. Despite the fact that there are numerous excellent examples of disaster prevention plans in Japan for us to consult and to research, little systematic work regarded the subject can be found in the literature in our own country. The course content about followings: 1. Introduction2. Importance of disaster prevention of cultural heritage3. Disaster prevention plans of cultural heritage 4. Approach of disaster prevention plans of cultural heritage5. Type of cultural heritage disaster and guideline

name.en: Disaster prevention plans of cultural heritage

notes: 日職建都所合開

description.zh: 為追求「永續發展與人本健康」之目的，使既有與新建的居住環境，配合我國「室內空氣品質管理法」規範下運作，提昇民眾居住環境健康品質效益，針對病態建築之環境問題，其涵蓋醫療、法律、建築、化學、生物等領域，綜合診斷以進行改善。本課程為第二階段之系列課程，其內容包括：一。孼疫學：探討關於病態建築症候群的因素與特定外來的致病物質與孼疫之關聯。二。家政事務：探討生活習慣、飲食生活的變化對環境、人體健康之影響。三。醫療領域：探討病態建築症候群與化學物質過敏症的差異與因應對策。四。日常領域：探討日常生活用品、居住行為對環境、人體健康之影響。
description.en: The main goal of this class is to pursue sustainable development and human health. In order to enhance the quality of residential and living environment in both existing and new-build dwellings, the course will cover important principles and topics in sick building environment, including medical, regulation, and architecture, chemical and biological. Specific contents include:(1)Immunology: to introduce the interactions between the immune system and the factors of sick building syndrome (SBS) and some specific pathogens.(2)Behavioral science: to investigate the influence of dietary and habit changes on environmental and human health.(3)Medical care: to introduce the difference and the response strategies between sick building syndrome (SBS) and Multiple Chemical Sensitivity (MCS)(4)Daily life: to investigate the influence of daily articles and resident behavior on environmental and human health.

notes: 日職建都所合開

description.zh: 專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論
description.en: Case Study, Seminar, Group Meeting.

notes: 碩士班

description.zh: 本課程的目的將藉由五個面向了解企業倫理的本質，分別為：從全球化角度認知社會可接受的商業行為，將待人和善深植於良好的企業中，企業形象再造，強化職業倫理以及投資於可持續發展和有社會責任的公司。本課程亦教導學生瞭解今日快速變化工商界，符合企業倫理的公司治理原則與方式。課程的教導將朝下列五個方向進行：（1）廠商的社會責任（如：產品綠化與環境保護），（2）消費者的保護（如：產品的安全性），（3）員工的權益（如：職業健康），（4）員工對公司的責任（如：利益衝突），（5）雇主與員工關係（如：性別平等）。
description.en: The objective of this course is to appreciate the essential of Business Ethics through five main faucets: recognizing socially acceptable business conduct from the global perspectives, embedding good business in treating people nice and fair, reengineering corporate image, enhancing professional ethics, and investing in sustainable and socially responsible corporations. This course also discusses with the students the corporate governance that follows business ethics in today's changing business society. Five major categories will be covered: (1) Corporate Social Responsibility (e.g., Green product and environmental protection), (2) Consumer protection (e.g., Product safety), (3) Employee's rights and benefits (e.g., Occupational health), (4) Responsibility of employee to the firms (e.g., Conflict of interest), and (5) Employer-employee relations (e.g., Gender equity).

notes: 英語授課

description.zh: 本課程在培養同學創業的知識與思維，以及了解營運模式如何應用在商業活動裡。本課程包含：創業精神的想法和行動、從失敗中學習、設計思考、市場測試、機會衡量、營運模式建立、價值主張、永續經營、企業倫理等議題。
description.en: The course is to encourage students to have the ideas of entrepreneurship and to establish the abilities of running a business. This course is focused on: entrepreneurial thought and action, learning from failure、design thinking、opportunity evaluation、market tests、the development of business model、value propositions、network、sustainable and business ethics.

notes: 經管三、經管所和創創合開

description.zh: 本課程在介紹如何運用企業內與員工之有關資源，包括其能力、知識、技術、態度和激勵，以配合企業整體競爭策略與形式。其內容有：人力資源分析、策略及目標、支援性作業之取得、發展及報酬、人力資源的維護。
description.en: This course introduce how to apply the resource of the inter-corporation and employee, such as capacity, knowledge, technology, attitude and incentive, in order to cooperate business integrate competitive strategy.

description.zh: 管理會計是整理和產生各種會計資料和情報以幫助各階層的管理人員完成管理任務。本課程共分三篇，第一篇是會計資料與企業決策之間的關係，其中共有五章分別介紹決策步驟與收集資料及選擇資料的近代會計方法論。第二篇是如何運用各項資料於企業決策，其至中包括四章，針對各項，各種特殊型態的決策需求，找出所需各項資料。第三篇是有關決策系統之各項計畫與控制制度，其中各章針對決策資料如何實用化與協調化。全文強調有關會計人員、經濟人員及財務人員皆可透過本書各項功能而達到分析與管理目的。
description.en: Management Accounting: Management Accounting is used to produce Accounting Information to help manager accomplishing managerial missions. In this Course, there are three subjects as follows: 1) The relationship between Accounting information and Business Decisions. 2) How to apply all types of information into Decision Model. 3) The planning and controlling of managerial decision will also be discussed, and 4) Case study.

notes: 英語授課 / 和 IMBA&IMFI 合開 / 823

description.zh: 本課程旨在介紹企業進行國際化策略以及多國籍企業營運與其功能性（價值鏈活動）之議題。期使學生瞭解當代企業國際化營運的重要性與其內涵，並建立整體的概念。同時，藉由精選案例之探討，提供學習者了解企業進行國際化與國際營運管理相關的實務作法。如此，將使學習者得將國企理論與概念運用於實際案例，培養分析能力。
description.en: The course is mainly for the students to understand the importance of international business strategies of MNC (Multi-Nation Company) which includes the business models, value chain and the functionality. In the mean time, the students will have a clear picture of MNC's daily operation by well-selected case study. The ultimate goal is to apply the theory into the real business world and to have an advanced analysis capability at the end of the course.

description.zh: 本課程將從傳播理論與社會互動探討互動性與消費者行為相關理論，並分析由互動性發展出的虛擬經驗，以及分析廠商藉由與顧客互動所產生的顧客知識要如何回應與管理，藉以建立良好的顧客關係。課程主要以個案討論方式進行。
description.en: 本課程將從傳播理論與社會互動探討互動性與消費者行為相關理論，並分析由互動性發展出的虛擬經驗，以及分析廠商藉由與顧客互動所產生的顧客知識要如何回應與管理，藉以建立良好的顧客關係。課程主要以個案討論方式進行。

description.zh: 透過專題討論方式，使學生對購併相關議題有確實的瞭解，包括 1. 合併的動機與理論介紹，2. 購併的型態與策略規畫，3. 公司購併時的法律規畫 4. 美、日、歐金融控股公司發展與比較，5. 美國與日本銀行購併案例之探討 6. 金融控股公司相關議題，7. 合併後之相關整合規畫等
description.en: To make students have a better understanding on various topics regarding Mergers and Acquisitions. Topics are as follows: 1.Theory of M&A, 2.Types of M&A and Strategic Planning, 3.Legal Planning, 4. Types of FHC in the U.S., Japan, and Europe, 5.Case Study on M&A of Japanese Banks and U.S. Banks, 7.Topics on Financial Holding Companies, 8 .Integration after M&A.

description.zh: 本課程主要運用最佳化方法解析動態成長、風險檢測、供應鏈調控等管理與決策問題，探討的主題包括：環球供應鏈問題、投資組合問題、生產規劃、配送規劃、排程規劃等。
description.en: This course mainly talks about how to use optimization methods to analyze the management and decision making problems such as dynamic growth, risk evaluation, and supply chain adjustment etc. The topics to be discussed include: 1.global supply chain management; 2.portfolio selection problems; 3.production planning; 4.distribution and transportation planning; 5.scheduling problems.

description.zh: 建立學生對各類顧客關係管理相關議題之基礎理論架構觀念，奠定學生日後從事顧客關係管理分析研究工作時之需。課程中將以個案實例為主，並配合各種資料探勘套裝軟體，以應用的觀點使學生更容易接受了解線上分析、資料倉儲與資料探勘分析的功用。
description.en: This course includes the fundamental theory of data mining techniques and the various applications in different enterprises. These techniques will include classification, association rule, forecasting, pattern recognition, etc.

description.zh: 本課程旨在培養學生創新服務設計能力，融合服務設計觀點完成服務藍圖。其中著重於智慧聯網應用場域所可能涵蓋的各類產品及其服務設計之學習與實作達成本課程之學習目標。課程中透過智慧聯網科技趨勢等智慧聯網服務與應用內涵、智慧化情境發想、關係人洞察、產品服務藍圖、可行性分析、產品概念設計、營運計畫書規劃等系統化流程與方法，搭配國內外指標案例解析及實務案例，使學生瞭解創新智慧化服務設計的內涵，具備規劃服務設計的能力。
description.en: This course is designed to develop students' innovative service design capabilities and integrate service design perspectives to complete the service blueprint. It focuses on the learning and implementation of the various products and service designs that may be covered by the Smart Connected Application Domain to achieve the learning objectives of this course.In the course, through the networked services such as smart networking technology trends and application connotation, intelligent situational thinking, relationship insight, product service blueprint, feasibility analysis, product concept design, operational plan planning and other systematic processes and methods, with Domestic and international indicators case analysis and practical cases enable students to understand the connotation of innovative and intelligent service design and have the ability to plan service design.

name.en: The Special Topics on Innovation and Service Design

description.zh: 本課程以 R 語言介紹資料科學和數據可視化。本課程注重於資料科學的實際應用，學生將學習到如何整理、探索、轉換和數據可視化。 學生以作業練習和獨立項目來獲得實數據科學的基本技能。
description.en: This course introduces data science and data visualization through the R language. Focusing on applied data science skills, students will be introduced to the methods to tidy, explore, transform, and visualize data. Students will practice them with real data in exercises and projects.

notes: 和大四合開 / 哈佛

description.zh: 進階設計相關專題，以文獻研讀，邀請專家專題演講，及論文討論為重點，參與者透過密集討論、書面報告、或舉行設計發表等方式，可以有效率地交換意見，獲得更深入而廣泛的體驗。本學期主要學習目標，幫助每一位同學有效完成研究計畫的審核。
description.en: Advanced Design project in studies, history, theory, and criticism of design. Under the above goals, inviting addresses for special topics will be arranged though the courses. The Participants are encouraged to have intensive discussion, written reports, or further design presentation. Efficient experience exchange would be also expected to derive more extensive interest.。 Hence, students are required to finish and pass the accessment concerning detailed research scheme.

notes: 碩一必修

description.zh: 本課程之目的在訓練學生，使學生熟悉經常使用之統計方法與理論，能利用已知之資料整理、分析未知之現象，打好修習其他相關學科之基礎。課程內容包括：機率理論、推定、假設檢定、迴歸分析、變異數分析等。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to train student and to provide a background in the theory and methodology of general statistical issues. Topic includes: probability theory, inference, hypothesis testing, regression analysis and variance analysis.

notes: 上限 40 人

description.zh: 本課程藉由跨領域合作，配合設計思考課程、及在地產業、藝師等產業接軌協作，引導學生發掘與分析產業與市場需求，進行產品開發與服務活動設計，培育大學生社會責任。
description.en: In this course, students will develop their ability to identify and analyze industry/market requirements, product development and service design skills, and sense of university social responsibility. Methods employed include interdisciplinary cooperation, design-thinking training, and collaborations with local industries and craft professionals.

name.zh: 跨域文創商品設計開發
name.en: Interdisciplinary Design and Development of Creative Products

notes: 工設一、訓四設一二、日職碩合開 (USR)，碩限 7 人

description.zh: 數據無處不在。隨著真實世界和數位世界交互影響，越來越多的設計決策有望得到數據分析的支持。本課程旨在培養設計師的數據素養技能。首先介紹對個性化產品和服務的需求，是如何從認知及情感面來創造更好的使用者經驗，並將數據資訊轉換為產品知識 / 服務設計 / 系統決策。大部分課堂時間將以研究導向的設計專題方式進行。完成本課程後，您將能夠：1. 區分批量生產及個性化設計 2. 了解如何將數據科學納入設計流程 3. 描述由不同來源（例如人類、機器或環境）生成的數據特徵和形式 4. 應用合適的工具 / 軟體來解釋小型或大型數據集 5. 了解在設計過程中使用數據的倫理與關鍵原則
description.en: Data is everywhere. As the physical and digital worlds have become intertwined, more and more design decisions are expected to be supported by data analytics. Hence, this course aims to build your data literacy skills as a designer. The course will begin by introducing the need for personalized products and services to create a better user experience. This concerns not only the cognitive but also affective aspects. The insights obtained from the data can then be translated to determine product/service/system requirements. Students will spend the majority of the class time on research-oriented projects.Upon completing this course, you will be able to:1.Distinguish the difference between mass production and personalization 2.Gain a better understanding of how data science can be incorporated into the design process 3.Describe the characteristics and forms of data generated by different sources such as humans, machines, or environments 4.Apply suitable tools/software to interpre

notes: 創新碩、設計博合開；上限 8 人

description.zh: 本課程經由邀請產官學界專家蒞校進行講座課程演講及論壇之方式，進行創意與創新思維之實例教學，使學生能儘早瞭解企業創新之模式及相關理論，以啟發學生之創意，促進學術與產業之互動與交流，縮短產學距離。
description.en: This course conducts the instances teaching of creativity and innovate thinking by invite industry, government and academic experts to give lectures and forums. The mine objective is to enable students to understand about the innovation model and related theories of enterprises as soon as possible, and to inspire students’ creativity. Furthermore, promote interaction between academic and industry; and to shorten the distance between academic and industry.

name.zh: 創新講座 - 創意與創新思維 (二)

notes: 工設四與日職碩合開，日碩限 35 人，科研國際會議廳，創創

description.zh: Innovation Design Workshop (IDW) 是 UDDC 華冑設計整合美國 GE 公司、IDEO 公司、史丹佛大學、卡內基美隆大學、荷蘭飛利浦公司等學術與業務單位，應用於產品與服務創新上，一系列的「使用者情境體驗導向、跨專業合作創新」方法（User-Oriented Innovative Design Process and Disciplinary Innovation），以市場策略導向的「使用者情境體驗」工作營方法進行創意激盪，引領企業邁入前瞻性規劃，激發新產品與服務創新價值（Innovalue），帶動產業之永續創新。藉由跨領域團隊協同共融，從工作營中洞悉、觀察及體驗使用者需求，找尋創新脈絡及契機，以有紀律、有效率的方式，策略性的激發產品創新概念。使用者導向的情境體驗法，為 21 世紀知識經濟時代針對產品、設備及服務，以宏觀時空環境及微觀使用者生活型態、生活行為為導向，從事產品創新設計研發的方法。在產品、設備與服務系統設計開發前及過程中，以情境預演與觀察的方式，從使用者的角度，先行訂定產品策略、市場定位，界定使用者特質，思想模式及生活情境，進而以體驗設計模式，進行使用情境的預想、觀察、分析，並將設計構想透過情境模擬體驗，驗證所設計的產品、設備與服務，是否能真正符合消費者與使用群族的需求。我
description.en: Provide a great opportunity to practice interdisciplinary collaborative design in product innovation. Encourage more flexible design approach that creates new innovative product value (innovalue) and emerging market perspectives.Using「user-oriented innovative design process」into this collaborative practice, in order to develop a broader range of design concept directions.  Strategy Mapping & Positioning _ Competitor product analysisDesign Feature Attribute Mapping(Scope/Target User/Quantity/Product & Design Definition)

name.zh: 使用者導向設計與跨專業合作創新
name.en: User Experience Design ＆ Interdisciplinary Collaborate Innovation

notes: 大學部上限 10 / 日碩博上限 20 / 職碩上限 12, 一教 1F, 創創

description.zh: 本課程將專注於創新產品與混合實境的設計研究實務，期望透過虛實整合與使用者經驗的核心概念，應用研究方法深入探究設計問題與使用者經驗中的痛點，探討實體端產品設計和虛擬端的服務設計之各種實務應用，進而透過設計方法與軟硬體技術落實創新概念，最終達到設計出符合與滿足使用者在未來生活中的各種設計服務與體驗。
description.en: This course will focus on the design research case study of innovative products and mixed reality. It is expected that through the core concepts of virtual-real integration and user experience, it will apply research methods to deeply explore design problems and pain points in user experience and explore physical product design and virtual reality. We will integrate various possibilities of service design with industry case study. Then, we intend to utilize the implemented innovative concept by design methods, software, and hardware technologies to achieve the design services and experiences that meet and satisfy users in future life.

name.zh: 產品與混合實境設計研究 (二)
name.en: Product and Mixed Reality Design Research (2)

notes: 日職合開；上限 7 人

description.zh: 專題報告 專題演講 研究小組討論
description.en: Case Study, Seminars, Group meeting

notes: 碩士班

description.zh: 本課程探討應用物件導向方法從事軟體設計的過程與步驟，透過課程專題製作，學者將學習以 UML 記載分析與設計之結果，並使用一個物件導向語言 (如 Java 或 C++) 實作之。課程內容: 1. 物件導向模型 -- UML 介紹 2. 物件導向程式語言與環境 3. 物件導向軟體發展週期 3.1 物件導向分析 - 需求分析，使用個案，觀念模型，有限狀態模型  3.2 物件導向設計 - 實際使用個案，合作圖，類別圖，設計模板，3.3 程式撰寫 - 設計與程式之應對  4. 專題
description.en: This course familiarizes the students with the principles and techniques for object-oriented software development. The students will use UML and an object-oriented language such as Java or C++ to complete a term programming project. Course contents: 1. Object-oriented modeling with UML  2. Object-oriented languages and environments  3. Object-oriented software development process 3.1 Object-oriented analysis - requirement analysis, use case analysis, conceptual models, finite state machine models 3.2 Object-oriented design - real use cases, collaboration diagrams, class design diagrams, design patterns 3.3 Construction - mapping design to codes 4. Term project.

notes: 資工四、資工所合開

description.zh: 使學生熟悉計算機圖的基本原理、方法、及工具，內容包括： （１）二維及三維幾何圖形之產生 （２）二維及三維何圖形之轉換 （３）隱藏面及隱藏線之處理（４）色彩原理 （５）光影及暗影技術 學生將需撰寫電腦程式或使用幾何算圖程式
description.en: The objective of this course is to familiarize the student with basic principles, methods, and tools of computer graphics. Topics include: 1.Generation of 2D and 3D geometric shapes 2.2D and 3D transformation 3.Hidden surfaces and hidden lines techniques 4.Color principles 5.Shading and shadowing techniques. The student will be required to write computer programs and/or use modeling and rendering packages

notes: 資工四、資工所和 AI 學程合開

description.zh: 1. 單元測試 2. 互動測試 3. 整合測試 4. 分析與設計模型測試 5. 功能測試 6. 圖形介面測試 7. 系統測試
description.en: 1.Unit testing 2.Interactin testing 3.Integration testing 4.Analysis and design model testing 5.Functional testing 6.GUI Testing 7.System testing

notes: 資工所和資安學程合開

description.zh: 1. 軟體架構總覽 2.Client-server 式架構 3.Model-view-controller 式架構 4.n 層式架構 5.Peer-to-peer 式架構 6. 式樣導向式架構 7.Pipes and filter 式架構特論
description.en: 1.Software architecture-overview 2.Client-Server 3.Model-view-controller 4.n-Tier design 5.Peer-to-peer 6.Pattern-oriented software architecture 7.Special Topics:pipes and filter

notes: 兼任

description.zh: Apple 推出 iPhone 以及 iPhone SDK 後，造成了一股不可擋的智慧型手機革命，由於相較於桌上型和筆記型電腦，手機是人們日常生活中更容易貼近使用的行動裝置，因此，手機中的 App 更可以幫助人們解決生活中的問題。本課程將由最基本的入門點切入，前段會先帶領同學針對 Objective-C 語法，委派設計 (Delegate) 模式等 iOS 入門的幾大難題上課，接著利用 Storyboard 建構出常見的 iOS app 使用者介面，最後再教導同學用 OpenGL es 實作有趣的 3D 應用程式。本課程大致如下：1. 導論 2. Objective-C3. iOS 系統架構 4.Xcode 開發工具安裝與使用 5. 基礎 UI 設計與多國語言 6. 核心應用程式設計 7. 感應器應用 8. 多媒體與相機功能 9. OpenGL ES10. 擴增實境 11. 專題實作及評鑑
description.en: In this course, you will get hands-on with the Apple SDK and learn how to use Objective-C to build the apps from scratch; You will be equipped to develop iOS apps, including 3D Apps through an understanding of the following course materials:‧Introduction to iOS‧How to program in Objective-C‧Using X-Code ‧The basics UI design of an iPhone/iPad application‧iOS MVC structure‧Use of sensors, the GPS, and cameras‧Multimedia functions – how to play audio and video files‧OpenGL ES for 3D/AR application‧Project Demo and Review‧How to publish an iPhone/iPad application

notes: 資工三、四資四和資工所合開

description.zh: 本課程介紹字體設計與文字編排學的基本概念，理解文字編碼原理，熟悉資訊處理技術。課程內容包括：1. 電腦字體設計 2. 書法運筆 3. 襯線體 4. 無襯線字體 5. 文字編排學 6. 字間微調 7. 字形替換 8. 可縮放向量圖形技術 9. TrueType 二次貝茲曲線 10. OpenType 三次貝茲曲線 11. 數字系統 12. 字集標準 13. 電腦字型格式 14. 編碼方法 15. 統一碼 16. 可變長度字元編碼 17. 中日韓統一表意文字。
description.en: This course introduces Computer Typography, Type Design, Character Encoding, and Information Processing Techniques. The course topics include: 1. Computer Type Design, 2. Calligraphy, 3. Serif, 4. Sans Serif, 5. Typography, 6. Kerning, 7. Glyph Substitution, 8. Scalable Vector Graphics, 9. TrueType Quadratic Bezier Curve, 10. OpenType Cubic Bezier Curves, 11. Number Systems, 12. Character Set Standards, 13. Font Formats, 14. Encoding Methods, 15. Unicode, 16. Unicode Transformation Format, 17. Chinese, Japanese and Korean (CJK) Unified Ideographs.

notes: 資工四、資工所合開

description.zh: 課程中主要的訓練可分為三個方向：一、人為環境管理；二、自然環境管理；三、環境系統分析。在此規劃方向的考慮下，將會邀請專家學者進行相關主題的演講。參與者透過密集討論、書面報告、或舉行口頭發表等方式，可以有效率地交換意見，獲得更深入而廣泛的認識。
description.en: Three categories are stressed in these basic training courses: the management of human environment, the management of natural environment, and the system analysis towards environment.  Under the above goals, inviting addresses for special topics will be arranged though the courses.  The Participants are encouraged to have intensive discussion, written reports, or further oral presentation.  Efficient opinion exchange would be also expected to derive more extensive interest.

description.zh: 課程中主要的訓練可分為三個方向：一、人為環境管理；二、自然環境管理；三、環境系統分析。在此規劃方向的考慮下，將會邀請專家學者進行相關主題的演講。參與者透過密集討論、書面報告、或舉行口頭發表等方式，可以有效率地交換意見，獲得更深入而廣泛的認識。
description.en: Three categories are stressed in these basic training courses: the management of human environment, the management of natural environment, and the system analysis towards environment.  Under the above goals, inviting addresses for special topics will be arranged though the courses.  The Participants are encouraged to have intensive discussion, written reports, or further oral presentation.  Efficient opinion exchange would be also expected to derive more extensive interest.

notes: 綜三演講廳

description.zh: 永續發展是妥善規劃與管理自然資源之最高指導原則，因此本課程依此宗旨討論土壤管理、有害物質處理與處置、水及廢水處理與管理；更將以實際例將面向擴及科技與社經整合層次，以期落實理論於實際應用之中。
description.en: This is intented as a brief introduction to the subject of the substainable development of natural resource. Main subject are soil management, hazardous waste treatment and disposal and water and wastewater treatment and management. Many overall regional case studies will be discussed. It must be technologic, economic and social environmental change or a new factural data are developed

description.zh: 能源在日常生活中以很多型態呈現，大量的能源使用於汽車動力、食物與用水加熱、產品製造、發電及其他不同事務。使用傳統能源會排放空氣污染物，因而引起鄰近地區、區域、跨國境空氣污染問題，甚至是全球的環境衝擊效應。本課程將檢視能源使用現況及其衍生的環境議題，並且探討能源使用之趨勢。傳統能源 (如煤、石油、天然氣、核能等)、及再生能源 (如太陽能、水力、風能、地熱能等) 及能源效率等內容，都將於課程中介紹
description.en: Energy enters our everyday lives in many ways. Prodigious amounts of energy are used to power automobiles, heat food and water, manufacture products, generate electricity, and perform various other tasks. The use of traditional energy will emit air pollutants that may result in regional air pollution problem as well as global effects. In this course we will look at the current energy situation, its environmental implications, and try to determine the patterns of energy use. We will look at energy use as coal, petroleum, natural gas, nuclear energy, and renewable energy, such as solar energy, hydroelectric

description.zh: 本課程著重於環境污染物之微量監測與分析內容，此包括有機有毒物、重金屬之儀器分析原理、化學理論及分析方法。修習本課程宜有化學基礎。
description.en: The course introduces monitoring and analysis for environment pollutants. It focuses the micro quantity analysis based on chemical theory. Modern instruments with high sensitivity will be also discussed.

name.en: Monitoring and Analysis for Environmental Pollutants

description.zh: 探討非均相觸媒應用於環境領域中之反應原理、反應動力學並進一步分析觸媒製造技術。
description.en: This course will involve mainly the theories, characterization techniques and applications of HETEROGENEOUS CATALYSIS in Environmental Science field..

description.zh: 氣候變遷儼然已為全球邁入 21 世紀所面對最嚴峻國際環保課題，對非聯合國氣候變化綱要公約締約國及屬於外銷型新興工業國家的台灣，正處在發展轉捩點上，為維持國家競爭力，國內應擬訂更積極之節能減碳政策，並著手研擬調適衝擊方案，同時加強與國際間合作，進行減碳政策、技術與經驗交流，以推動碳市場之國際接軌，並確保環境、經濟、社會之永續發展。本課程將介紹溫室氣體與氣候變遷之關連性、國際溫室氣體管制相關公約、我國溫室氣體管理現況、溫室氣體減量政策與經濟工具、及溫室氣體衝擊調適與節能新技術等，期藉由本課程使之瞭解全球暖化成因與後果與國內外溫室氣體管理現況與法規要求，以提升我國於氣候變遷因應之認知。
description.en: This class introduces scientific, economic, and ecological issues about the threat of global climate change, and the Policy Instruments of greenhouse gas management.  This course examines the interconnections of international politics and climate change.  It includes Green House Gas inventory, carbon tax and emission trading, Voluntary approach and other greenhouse gas management policy tools.  It explores an integrated approach to analysis the benefits of greenhouse gas and air pollution reduction measures, and related model development.

name.en: Green House Gas Management and Practice

description.zh: 專題報告，專題演講，研究小組討論。
description.en: Seminar  report ， seminar  speech ， seminar  discussion。

description.zh: 簡介，層狀認知網路，倒傳遞網路，學習向量量化網路，自組織映射網路，Hopfisld 網路，退火神經網路，應用與實做。
description.en: introduction, layer perceptron, back-propagation network, learning vector qvantization, self-organizing map, hpfield neural network ,annealed neuralnetwork, applications implements.

notes: 限 22 人，計中電腦教室

description.zh: 電腦運動控制課程包含下列課題：(1) 命令產生器設計 (2) 運動本體與回授系統介紹 (3) 基礎迴授控制器設計 (4) 前饋控制器設計 (5) 估測器設計 (6) 多軸路徑控制 (7) 案例探討 -- 半導體與 LCD 設備。學生從這門課程中可學到如何利用 PC_based 控制器去完成一套運動控制系統。
description.en: The course of computerized motion control includes the following topics:  (1) Command generator design (2) Introduction of motion control plant and feedback system (3) Feedback control loop design (4) Feedforward control loop design (5) Observer design (6) Multi-axis contouring control (7) Case study: semiconductor/LCD equipment。 The student will understand how to develop a PC_based motion control system by this course.

description.zh: 培養理論與實務兼備之自動化工程專業人才，除課堂講授與強化實驗實習課程外，更提供應用微處理器之自動控制實務與實習：包含電子儀器之使用說明、虛擬儀表設計、Arduino 單晶片之應用。使同學在自動化系統設計與機電整合等領域，加強實務能力。
description.en: Introduction to design for automatic system，control systems ，microchip，system on chip，virtual instruments and experiments for AD/DA, DIDO, and applications for automatic system.

name.zh: 自動化系統設計與實習
name.en: Experiments and Design for Automatic Systems

notes: 計中電腦教室

description.zh: 本課程在使學生瞭解物聯網 (Internet of Things) 的本基概念及其所應用的各種技術。本課程包含 (1) 簡介 (2) 物聯網的基本架構及其關鍵技術，(3) 物聯網感知層及其應用技術，(4) 物聯網感網路層及其應用技術，(5) 物聯網應用層及其應用技術，(6) 無線感測網路工作原理及實習，(7) RFID 工作原理及實習。
description.en: The goal of this course is to let students to understand the basic concepts and applied technologies in the field of Internet of Things. The main subjects of this course include :(1) Introduction .(2)The basic structure of Internet of Things and it key technologies.(3) The device layer of Internet of Things and it applied technologies. (4)The connect layer of Internet of Things and it applied technologies.(5)The application layer of Internet of Things and it applied technologies.(6)The principle and practice of wireless sensor network.(7) The principle and practice of RFID.

name.en: Applied Technology of the Internet of Things

notes: 限 20 人

description.zh: 認識科技文章及科技學術論文語法、文體、結構組織等特質，並探討技術報告及論文撰寫方式。
description.en: This course helps the learners recognize the syntax, style, and organization as far as the papers on technology and technical writings are concerned. Discussions include specific ways to technical presentation and technical writings.

description.zh: 演化計算最佳化與傳統最佳化的最主要差別在於演化式計算係透過迭代方式逼近最佳解。由於所使用的目標函數可以容忍對問題的不確定性，不精確性，部分正確性以及類似性，因此更適合處理實務的工程問題。演化式計算緣起於演化式規劃，基因演算法則透過數學模型的推導，驗證其可以使用在解決最佳化問題。本課程主要針對基因演算法 (GA) 與演進歸化法 (EP/ES) 進行討論，其他的方法如粒子群集 (PSO)，模擬退火法 (SA) 也在本課程介紹之列。
description.en: The differences between Evolutionary Computing and conventional computing in that it obtains the near optimal solution through iterations. Because of the characteristics of the fitness functions, the evolutionary computation is more tolerable for imprecision, uncertainty, partial truth, and approximation to achieve tractability, robustness and low solution cost.  As a result, the evolutionary computation can be more suitable for solving engineering problems. The origin of the evolutionary computation is from the Evolutionary Planning.  Through a formal mathematic modeling, the Genetic Algorithm is proved to be used to solve optimization problems. The main focus of this course will be in Genetic Algorithm (GA) and Evolutionary Programming/Evolutionary Strategy (EP/ES). Other methods such as Particle Swarm Optimization (PSO), Simulated Anneal (SA) will also be discussed.

description.zh: 1. 波導光學 2. 光纖光學 3. 光子光學 4. 光子與原子 5. 雷射放大器 6. 雷射
description.en: 1. Guided-Wave Optics2. Fiber Optics3. Photon Optics4. Photons and Atoms5. Laser Amplifiers6. Lasers

notes: 需 80 人教室

description.zh: 專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論
description.en: Case Study. Seminar. Group meeting.

notes: 綜三演講廳 (專討教室)，光電系必修

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。   1. 多模光纖實驗 2. 單模光纖實驗 3. 位置量測實驗 4.Doppler 測速實驗 5. 全像術 6. 全像干涉術 7. 疊紋術 8. 疊紋干涉術 9. 電腦輔助雷射切割程式製作 10. 雷射切割實驗 11. 快速原型三 D 加工 NC 程式製作 12. 雷射輔助快速原型製造 13. 基本光電週邊實習 13-1. 光資訊輸入：數位相機、掃瞄器、影像捕抓 13-2. 光資訊輸出 14. 光資訊儲存實習 14-1.MO 的用法與控制 14-2.CD/RW 的用法與控制 15. 基本光資訊處理實習 15-1. 光計算圖形辨認實習 15-2.MRI 醫學影像處理
description.en: 1.Experiment on multi-mode optical fiber 2.Experiment on single-mode optical fiber 3.Position measurement 4.Doppler velocity measurement 5.Holography 6.Holography interferometry 7.Moire method 8.Moire interferometry 9.Computer assisted programming for laser cutting 10.Experiment of laser cutting 11.NC programming for the three dimensional fabricator of rapid prototype 12.Laser assisted rapid prototyping 13.Basic Electro-optical peripheral  13-1.Optical Input devices：digital camera、scanner、Image capturer  13-2.Optical output devices：LCD display、LED display、3D-TV display 14.Optial information storage  14-1.Usage and control of MO  14-2. Usage and control of CD/RW 15.Dasic optical information processing  15-1.Optical compating and pattern recognition  15-2.MRI medical image processing

notes: 必選，大學時如已修過可申請改修其他專業選修抵學分

description.zh: 先修課程：電磁學、工程數學、近代物理。   由電磁學之理論推展光波之運行，並經由近代物理之量子論推導出之原子及分子能階與固態晶體之能帶理論，加以說明電磁波與物質間之作用。介紹共振腔、活化性介質及各種雷射之激發形式等雷射三個基本組成。並針對雷射光之種類、特性及其應用，加以說明。
description.en: Combining the propagation of optical wave been deduced from the electromagnetic theory and the quantum theory introduced by modern physics such as energy level of atom and molecular and the energy band of solid state, the interaction between electromagnetic wave and matter is introduced. The three fundamental components of laser: resonator, active medium, and pumping method are explained. Also the types, characteristics, and applications of various laser are introduced.

notes: 光電四和光電所合開，需 Matlab 基礎，可抵雷射工程 B

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。1. 光電元件製造 2. 光纖製造 3. 光纖種類及特性 4. 光纖通訊系統 5. 光電控制電路 6. 電荷耦合元件 7. 液晶顯示元件
description.en: 1.Fabrication of optoelectronic devices 2.Fabrication of fibers 3.Fibers and their characteristics 4.Optical fiber communication systems 5.Optoelectronic control circuits6.Charge-coupled devices 7.Liquid crystal display

notes: 與電資外所合開，111 學年入學新生修可抵光電科技概論二

description.zh: 1. 簡介 2. 視覺與色彩 3. 陰極射線管顯示器 4. 電漿顯示器 5. 液晶顯示器 6. 電致發光顯示器 7. 場發射顯示器 8. 有機發光顯示器
description.en: 1.Introduction2.Sight and color3.Cathode-ray tube(CRT)4.Plasma panel display(PDP)5.Liquid crystal display(LCD)6.Electrolumisence display(ELP)7.Field emission display(FED)8.Organic light emitting device(OLED)

notes: 光電系所和電資外所合開，C

description.zh: (1) 光纖電纜混合系統 (2) 個人通訊系統 (3) 光纖電話系統 (4) 光纖電纜混合電話系統 (5) 有線電視固網 DWDM 系統 (6) 信號間非線性作用 (7) 類比數位通道的干擾 (8) 脈衝雜訊
description.en: (1)Wire Access in HFC Systems (2)Personal Communication Systems (3)Optical Fiber-Based Phone Systems (4)Hybrid-Fiber-Coax BAsed Phone Systems (5)A Hybrid DWDM System for CATC & Fixed Network System (6)Nonlinear Interaction Between Optical Signaals (7)Crosstalk From Analoy Channels to Digital Channel (8)Clipping-Induced Impulse Noise

name.zh: 光纖有線電視固網信號傳輸系統
name.en: Fiber system for CATV, fixed network

notes: 限 30 人

description.zh: 本課程的主題將集中於奈米薄膜的光學性質，討論介質以及金屬鍍膜材料所製作的奈米結構。本課程將介紹許多新穎的應用，包括完美抗反射、偏極轉換器、偏極分光器與完美波片。進一步根據局部電漿效應對於金屬與介質複合薄膜的影響可發展超穎材料薄膜。本課程包含設計、製程與量測，透過課程學習，學生可學會奈米光學薄膜的完整知識。(1) 課程簡介 (2) 斜向沉積技術技術 (3) 光學非均向薄膜 (4) 等效介質理論 (5) 表面電漿理論 (6) 長程表面電漿 (7) 超穎材料 (8) 完美抗反射與波板 (9) 感測技術 (10) 仿生薄膜 (11) 偏極態量測 (12) 橢圓偏光儀
description.en: The topics of this course will focus on optical properties of nanostructured thin films. The discussed nanostructures are made of common used dielectric and metal coating materials. Many novel applications including perfect antireflection, polarization converter, beam splitters, and perfect waveplate will be introduced here. Furthermore, deposited metamaterial thin films are developed based on local plasmon effect within the metal-dielectric composite films. This course involves design, fabrication and measurement. The students should have learned and passed the course.(1) Introduction (2) Oblique angle deposition (3) Optical anisotropic thin films (4) Effective Medium Approximation (5) Plasmonics (6) Long range surface plasmon (7) Metamaterials (8) Perfect antireflection and waveplate(9) Sensing technique (10) Bioinspired and biomimetic thin films (11) Polarization measurements (12) Ellipsometry

description.zh: 超快雷射由於其脈衝寬度在皮秒 (10-12) 之下，它在軍事科技、工業應用、生醫檢測與學術研究所扮演的角色日益重要，本課程將介紹超短脈衝雷射的種類，尤其著重在光纖短脈衝雷產生的原理、脈衝壓縮的技術與超短脈衝寬度與相位量測的技術，此外也將介紹超快雷射的各種應用包括光譜量測、泵 - 探量測與非線性光學量測等技術。
description.en: Due to relative short pulse below one picosecond, ultrafast lasers have been widely used in various fields including military, industry, biomedical diagnosis and scientific research.  In this course, it will introduce various kinds of the ultrafast lases, especially on the principle of mode-locked fiber generation, pulse compression technique and the method of the ultrashort pulsewidth measurement as well as phase retrieval.  Various applications of ultrafast laser including fluorescence, pump-probe and nonlinear optical measurement have also been introduced in this course.

description.zh: 繞射光學是基於光波繞射的原理，研究如何利用繞射現象設計光學元件來實現各種光學功能。繞射光學元件可以應用在改良光學系統的像差，為特定的波長實現聚光、分光等功能以取代傳統的光學透鏡、分光鏡等，此外利用傅光原理製作出傳統的光學元件無法實現的功能，在近代的光學系統、此類的微光學系統佔有極重要的地位。本課程中，我們將討論其基本原理、設計方法、以及應用。主要課程內容為：1. 光學繞射原理 2. 傅式光學 3. 繞射光學元件之設計方法 4. 繞射光學元件之應用 5. 繞射光學元件之實現與製作
description.en: This course is designed to introduce the principle of diffraction of optical wave and study the means of using the diffraction to perform optical setups in modern optical systems. Diffractive optical element (DOE) can be applied to correct aberrations, light focusing, light splitting, and other novel functions that traditional optical components difficultly or impossibly perform. DOE plays an important role in modern optical technology. The content of this course includes: 1. Principle of optical diffraction, 2. Fourier optics, 3. Design methods of DOE, 4. Applications of DOEs, and 5. Implementation of DOEs.

name.zh: 繞射光學原理與應用含實習
name.en: Theory and Application of Diffractive Optics with Lab practice

description.zh: 導論、積體電路生產介紹、半導體基礎、晶圓製造、加熱製程、微影蝕刻、電漿的基礎原理、離子佈植、化學氣相沉積與介電質薄膜、金屬化製程、化學機械研磨、製程整合、CMOS 製程
description.en: Introduction、Introduction to IC Fabrication、Semiconductor Basics、   Wafer Manufacturing、Thermal Processes、Photolithography and Etch、Plasma Basics、Ion Implantation、CVD and Dielectric Thin Film、  Metallization、CMP 、Process Integration、CMOS Processes

description.zh: 高階光學鏡頭是目前探索太空、發展醫療及曝光設備極為重要的關鍵技術，此技術可應用到生活各項領域，包括：拍照攝影、星空宇宙探索、智慧監控及商用鏡頭 (望遠鏡、相機和顯微鏡) 等。本課程主要授課內容針對工程背景學生跨領域選修，以瞭解奈米級精度系統設計、製造、檢測、組裝及驗證。為使學習效果顯著成效，除了以講授方式闡述重要基礎觀念外，選修學生將實際製作產品及最終上台報告，使課程學以致用為本課程最大宗旨。
description.en: High-end optical lenses are leading edge technology for the medicine, semiconductor, mobile phone, surveillance, machine vision, and space industry. This course will teach students how to design optical systems, transform those designs into real optical components, and test them. All the selected students in this course are required to report their results on the stage in the final examination.

name.zh: 光機電系統概論與實務製造
name.en: Introduction to optical electromechanical system and manufacturing technology

notes: 光電系所和電資外所合開

description.zh: 邀請校內外學者專家至校針對某一專長領域進行專題演講，讓學生藉由聽講及心得報告之寫作，開展視野，並與時代之脈動相契合。
description.en: Invited speakers from different disciplines give speech in their specialized area. Thus students can broaden their eyesight and also keep updating the technology and its applications of the generation.

notes: 限生化碩選課；和博班生化組合開

description.zh: 每週三小時一學分的專業必修課，旨在教導碩一新生學習各種生化工程相關的實驗原理與操作技術，以增進學生在未來進行生化實驗研究的知識與技巧；此外，課程中安排工廠參觀實習，結合學術與產業，豐富學生視野，促進學生對產業界的瞭解。
description.en: The three-hour per week course is designed to teach the 1st year graduate students a variety of biochemical engineering principles and hands-on skills to strengthen their knowledge and skills of the field; The course comes with 1-2 visits to industrial plants to further enrich the students' understanding of the industrial process.

description.zh: 利用基因工程，生物化學、微生物學之原理，培養變種之微生物（或改良過的微生物），動、植物細胞，以製造生物活性物質（如抗生素、免疫體、酵素、毒素、激素、特殊結構之蛋白、脂肪、醣類、脂肪酸、氨基酸、生長因子、藥理活性成份、抗體等等）；結合生物技術與化工原理來進行微生物、動、植物細胞之培養、酵素之提取、反應動力學、生物反應器的操作與相關參考數之獲取法、產品之分離程序等。
description.en: By the application of genetic engineering, biochemistry and microorganisms or animal or plant cells and how to produce living organisms. In combination of biotechnology and chemical engineering to learn cell incubation, enzyme purification, bioreactor operation, and product separation, etc.

description.zh: 精準醫療 (Precision Medicine) 又稱為個人化醫療，該詞最早於 2011 年由美國國家研究委員會所提出，意指除了藉由傳統診斷方法如病患症狀描述及常規生化、影像檢查之外，加上新式生物醫學檢測如基因檢測等，並整合個人資料，如性別、身高、體重、種族、基因特異性、過去病史、家族病史等完整綜合信息，透過人體基因資料庫進行比對及分析，進而藉以選出最適合病患的治療方法及藥物治 療，如細胞治療、基因治療和標靶治療等。精準醫療最終的目的是希望透過個體差異性的深入診斷，來找出治療效果最大化及副作用最小化的最佳個人化醫療方案。2015 年美國前總統歐巴馬在國情咨文演講中提出「精準醫學計畫 (Precision Medicine Initiative)」， 率先投入二億美元以建立百萬人次的醫療記錄、基因、生活習慣等數據資料庫，並找尋誘發癌症的基因及相應新藥開發，訂定相關法規並 研究如何保護隱私與個資安全。此後各國無不競相投入精準醫療之發展，精準醫療也是當前台灣生技重點產業之一。開課綱要：本課程希望增進同學對精準醫療領域發展的認識與理解，上課內容涵蓋：精準醫療紹介、基因檢測發展及其應用、基因晶片發展及其應用、次世代定序發展及其應用、基因治療發展及其應用、伴隨診斷及
description.en: Precision Medicine is also known as Personalized Medicine. This term was first proposed by the National Research Council in November 2011. In addition to traditional diagnostic methods such as patient symptoms and imaging examinations, it also integrates with new biomedical tests such as genetic testing and comprehensive personal information like gender, height, weight, race, gene specificity, past medical history, family medical history, etc. The genetic and personal information is analyzed through searching known human gene database and used to select the most suitable treatments and medicines for patients, for example, cell therapy, gene therapy, and targeted therapy. The ultimate goal of precision medicine is to find out a personalized medical plan with maximum therapeutic benefits and minimum side effects through in-depth diagnosis of individual differences. President Obama has launched "Precision Medicine Initiative" in January 2015. It is estimated that $215 million US dollars w

description.zh: 課程內容包括擴散原理、兩相之間的質傳理論，亂流的質量傳遞，涉及化學反應的質傳，同時發生質量與熱量的傳遞，以及多成分的擴散現象。
description.en: Topics covered include theory of diffusion, interphase mass transfer theory, mass transfer in turbulent flow, mass transfer with chemical reaction, simultaneous mass and heat transfer, multicomponent diffusion.

notes: 核心七選二

description.zh: 本課程的目的是提升學生的科技英文技能和協助他們進階職場的實用英語需求。此課程著重於科技英語之閱讀、聽力、口語、寫作、理解、語法規則、詞彙，發音，對話，商務溝通，和專業演講技巧。本課程包括撰寫履歷，面試技巧，軟技能如溝通技巧，職場禮節；email 及電話技巧，出差英語，判斷力，了解國際科技職場環境及工作需求，專業項目策劃及執行。輔導學生如何展現自己優勢及作好個人職業規劃，從而順利邁向成功目標.
description.en: This course aims to educate students in Information Technology English and prepare students for their career advancement. This course focuses on IT science and technology English reading, listening, speaking, writing, comprehension, grammar rules, vocabulary, pronunciation, conversation, communication, and professional presentation skills. This course also covers soft skills such as interview tips, communication, business etiquette, travel English, email English, decision making, understanding international business, global working environment, project management planning and execution. In addition, this course offers personal development for students to discover their personal advantage and perform their career planning for achieving career goals.

notes: 化工碩必修

description.zh: 邀請校內外學者專家至校針對某一專長領域進行專題演講，讓學生藉由聽講及心得報告之寫作，開展視野，並與時代之脈動相契合。(在職專班)
