description.zh: 1. 影像處理教學基礎 2. 影像輸出入系統 3. 點處理運算 4. 範圍影像處理 5. 頻域影像處理 6. 影像幾何轉換 7. 影像編碼 8. 影像分析
description.en: 1.Mathematic background of image processing2.Input and output systems for the image processing 3.Point processes4.Area processes5.Image processes in the frequency domain6.Geometric transformation7.Image coding 8.Image analysis

notes: 電機三甲乙丙合開，計中電腦教室

description.zh: 1. 簡介 2. 電力系統簡介 3. MATLAB 簡介 4. 電力潮流分析 5. 最佳化調度 6. 電力系統故障之研究 7. 電力系統穩定度分析
description.en: 1. Introduction2. Power system matrix3. Introduction to MATLAB4. Power flow studies5. optimal Dispatch6. Fault Studies7. Power system stability

name.zh: 計算機在電力系統之應用

description.zh: 1. 概論 2. 鐵路變電所設計 3. 電力遙控系統 4. 電車線系統設計 5. 干擾與防護 6. 動力車的電力供應 7. 動力車的電力控制 8. 未來發展
description.en: 1. Introduction2. Railway substation design3. Power remote control system4. Catenary system design5. interference and protection6. Power supply of locomotive7. Power control of locomotive8. Future development

description.zh: 1. 數位通訊系統簡介 2. 隨機程序 3. 數位調變與多工技術 4. 最佳接收器 5. 載波與符碼同步 6. 消息理論 7. 訊源編碼 8. 通道編碼 9. 展頻通訊系統 10. 行動通訊系統
description.en: 1. Introduction 2. Random Processes3. Digital Modulation and Multiplexing4. Optimal Receiver5. Carrier and Symbol Synchronization6. Information Theory7. Source Coding 8. Channel Coding9. Spread Spectrum Systems10. Mobile Communication Systems

description.zh: 本課程專為研究生所設計，提供機器人全方位之分析與應用，課程主題如下所示：1.         空間描述與座標轉換 2.         機械手臂運動學 3.         機械手臂反向運動學 4.         賈氏矩陣：速度與靜力 5.         機械手臂動力學 6.         軌跡規劃 7.         機械手臂控制 8.         機器視覺 9.         工業自動化應用 10.      實驗項目：機械手臂及機器人操控、結合視覺感測之機械手臂自動化系統、機器人導航與控制註：大四生須經授課教師同意方可選修。
description.en: This course is designed for graduate students and will provide a solid analytical and practical experience on a variety of aspects in robotics. Topics in the course are as follows.1.         Spatial descriptions and transformations 2.         Manipulation kinematics3.         Inverse manipulator kinematics4.         Jacobians: velocities and static forces5.         Manipulator dynamics6.         Trajectory generation7.         Control of manipulators8.         Machine vision9.         Industrial automation applications10.      Laboratory work: control of manipulators and mobile robots, automatic manipulation with vision sensors, navigation and control of mobile robotsSenior undergraduate students are allowed to take this course in case they are approved by the instructor.

name.zh: 高等機器人與自動化應用

notes: 電機所、自動化所、電資、機械外生班和 AI 學程合開

description.zh: 資料探勘是從大量資料中尋找有用的資訊，是一個跨越統計、資料庫和人工智慧的學門。本課程著重在從資料庫的觀點來看資料探勘的意義，並深入探討幾種資料探勘功能及其技術，最後並以實例討論來驗證資料探勘的應用價值。探討議題包括資料探勘概念、資料探勘功能、資料探勘步驟、資料倉儲、決策樹分析集群分析、關聯分析與購物籃分析等。
description.en: The data mining (DM), which involves in Statistics, Database and Artificial Intelligence fields, prospects to seek Useful information from a great deal of data. This course emphasizes at the view of the database, besides go deeply into several data mining techniques. Finally, the practical case studies will also be discussed. The topic includes the concept of DM, the function of DM, the step of DM, data warehouse, Decision Trees Analysis, Clustering Analysis, Association Rule and Basket Analyzes, etc.

notes: 電機所和電資外生所合開

description.zh: 本課程目標為提升學生英文之閱讀能力與聽力。包含增加英文單字數量，科技論文文法、句型、結構等特質，及訓練聽力習慣。
description.en: This course aims to leverage up the ability of English reading and listening for students. It includes vocabulary amount increasing, grammar recognition, sentence style and organization, and listening comprehension.

notes: 電機系碩博班英文門檻

description.zh: 電源轉換器 (Power Converter) 設計須滿足高效率及高功率密度的要求，因應此需求需搭配轉換器架構的選用、新型寬能隙元件的應用、高頻磁性元件的設計、柔性切換技術 (Soft Switching Techniques)。在本次課程將會介紹這些技術的原理及設計方法及高效能轉換器的技術核心：變壓器 (Transformer) 與磁性元件的設計要領及寬能隙元件應用的介紹。藉由理論探討與模擬實作，加強學生的理論知識與實作能力。
description.en: The design of power converters is being pushed to meet the requirements of high efficiency and high power density. In response to this demand, the selection of converter architecture, the application of new wide bandgap devices, the design of high-frequency magnetic components, and soft switching techniques are needed. This course introduces the principles and design methods of these technologies and the core technical aspects of high-efficiency converters, including the design of transformers and magnetic components, and the application of wide bandgap devices. This course is aimed at graduate students. Students can strengthen their theoretical knowledge and practical ability through theoretical discussion and simulation practice from this course.

name.zh: 進階電源轉換器設計實務
name.en: Advanced Power Converter Design and Practices

description.zh: 數位電源為目前各大電源轉換電路公司研究的議題。本課程將介紹數位電源轉換器的動作模式、控制與實作考量，配合模擬軟體驗證理論，最後以數位電源設計實例進行探討。本課程藉由理論探討與模擬實作，加強學生的理論知識與實作能力。
description.en: Digital power supply design is a major industrial topic. This course introduces the operation and control of digital power converters, and discusses the design principles and their implementation considerations. Simulation is used to validate the theory learned in this course. Also, digital power supply design examples are discussed in detail. Students can strengthen their theoretical knowledge and practical ability through theoretical discussion and simulation practice from this course.

name.zh: 數位電源控制與電路設計
name.en: Digital Power Supply Control and Circuit Design

description.zh: 本課程將探討錯誤診斷系統理論與相關控制系統工程知識，將以馬達與鋰電池為例，實際應用錯誤診斷理論，並學習錯誤診斷的實現與應用技巧。本課程藉由理論推導與程式模擬實作，協助學生專精控制工程領域知識，並透過期刊文章研讀與討論，進一步加強學生創新思考與簡報專業論文之能力。
description.en: This course investigates fault diagnosis system algorithms and their relevant control system engineering knowledges. This course takes motors and lithium-ion batteries as examples to implement the fault diagnosis algorithms and to learn the implementation skills of fault diagnosis algorithms. The goal of this course is to improve students’ control engineering domain knowledge though algorithm derivation, coding and simulations; also, to enhance students’ innovative thinking capabilities and presentation skills through journal paper reviewing and discussions.

notes: 電機所和電資外生所合開

description.zh: 本課程探討無線通訊系統基頻演算法設計，主要包含多輸入多輸出傳輸系統中接收端與傳送端之聯合最佳化問題。課程綱要：1. 基本矩陣運算 2. 多輸入多輸出接收機設計 3. 多輸入多輸出天線選擇 4. 多輸入多輸出前置編碼器設計
description.en: This course aims at the baseband algorithm design for wireless communication systems. Much attention will be focused on the joint multiple-input multiple-output (MIMO) transceiver optimization.Course outline:1.Basic matrix operations.2.MIMO receiver design.3.MIMO antenna selection.4.MIMO precoder design.

notes: 電機所和電資外生所合開

description.zh: 讀書報告、專題討論、製造科技相關技術及產品介紹與討論、Seminar 心得等，可重覆修習。
description.en: Case Study, Workshop, Group discussion, Seminars, Manufacturing Technology in Modern Industries.

notes: 限博士班修習，製科所和機電博專題討論合開，英文授課

description.zh: 專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論。
description.en: Literature Study, Seminar, Group meeting.

notes: 博士班

description.zh: 本課程之目標為增進研究生之英文表達能力。
description.en: Objective of this course is to improve oral presentation ability.

description.zh: 專題報告專題演講 研究小組討論
description.en: Case Study.Seminar.Group meeting.

notes: 博士班

description.zh: 專題演講或書報討論
description.en: In this course, we will invite speakers from the academia, industry and government to lectures on topics in computer science and information engineering.

notes: 博士班

description.zh: 認識通俗科技文章及科技學術論文語法、文體、結構組織等特質，並探討技術報告及論文撰寫方式。
description.en: This course helps the learners recognize the syntax, style, and organization as far as the papers on technology and technical writings are concerned. Discussions include specific ways to technical presentation and technical writings.

notes: 博班必修，碩士不計學分，須面談加簽

description.zh: 以演講，討論，口頭及書面報告方式，探討土木與防災之相關課題，如結構檢測評估與補強，水土防災技術，防災體系與資訊，都市防災，消防防災，施工災變，環境防災規劃與管理等。
description.en: By means of addresses discussion, oral presentations and reports to learn and investigate the related civil and disaster prevention subjects, such as structure testing, evaluation and repairing, soil and water disaster prevention, urban precaution, fire fighting, construction safety, environmental planning, and management for disaster prevention.

notes: 博士班

description.zh: 本課程將透過每週專題演講方式，讓學生了解環境工程與管理之最新理論，技術及最先進之研究成果。演講者之安排將以校外知名專家學者及校內各計畫執行者為主。
description.en: This course will provide important information regarding to the latest development or application on the environmental engineering and management. Invited Speakers are well-known scholars in areas related to environmental engineering and management. Graduate students or thesis advisors are also invited to report research results of their graduate studies.

description.zh: 專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論。
description.en: Case Study. Seminar. Group meeting.

description.zh: 專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論。
description.en: Case Study. Seminar. Group meeting.

description.zh: 加強學生之學習研究心得報告，集體討論，以訓練學生研究之能力。
description.en: Group Discussion. Literature Study, Seminar, Group meeting.

notes: 碩二修讀

description.zh: 本課程將有系統的介紹專業英文論文的寫作格式，以及文件編修的技巧，且用深入淺出的例子作為示範，並輔以實際寫作練習與錯誤訂正。學員學習研究論文組織寫作，包含修改本身論文結構之基本技巧，正確組織文章的各個片段，避免口語用字寫字的陋習，使所作之文章能掌握其涵意，亦即能更有效率的利用英文寫出科技論文之佳作。
description.en: The goal of English Thesis Writing is to help students developing the writing skills through the manipulation of scientific and technical data. Students will learn a variety of rhetorical principles that guide the writing process, apply these principles to scientific and technical writing, and write papers in their own academic fields. Lectures on the writing principle, students' presentations on the reading sections and follow-up activities, pair and individual work on writing practice will be the major activities in the class.

notes: 英文授課

description.zh: 專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論。
description.en: Case Study. Seminar. Group meeting.

notes: 博班修讀

description.zh: 本課程將有系統的介紹專業英文論文的寫作格式，以及文件編修的技巧，且用深入淺出的例子作為示範，並輔以實際寫作練習與錯誤訂正。學員學習研究論文組織寫作，包含修改本身論文結構之基本技巧﹐正確組織文章的各個片段，避免口語用字寫字的陋習，使所作之文章能掌握其涵意，亦即能更有效率的利用英文寫出科技論文之佳作。
description.en: The goal of English Technical Writing is to help students developing the writing skills through the manipulation of scientific and technical data. Students will learn a variety of rhetorical principles that guide the writing process, apply these principles to scientific and technical writing, and write papers in their own academic fields. Lectures on the writing principle, students' presentations on the reading sections and follow-up activities, pair and individual work on writing practice will be the major activities in the class.

notes: 博士班必修

description.zh: 邀請校內外學者專家至校針對某一專長領域進行專題演講，讓學生藉由聽講及心得報告之寫作，開展視野，並與時代之脈動相契合。
description.en: Invited speakers from different disciplines give speech in their specialized area. Thus students can broaden their eyesight and also keep updating the technology and its applications of the generation.

name.zh: 專題討論 - 化學工程組

notes: 限博士班化工組選課，和化工碩合開

description.zh: 邀請校內外學者專家至校針對某一專長領域進行專題演講，讓學生藉由聽講及心得報告之寫作，開展視野，並與時代之脈動相契合。
description.en: Invited speakers from different disciplines give speech in their specialized area. Thus students can broaden their eyesight and also keep updating the technology and its applications of the generation.

name.zh: 專題討論 - 生化與生醫工程組

notes: 限博士班生化組選課，和生化碩合開

description.zh: 自由度、(平面與空間) 運動幾何分析、彈簧、避震器、力傳遞分析、撓性、電腦輔助懸吊系統分析與設計。
description.en: Degree of Freedom, (2D and 3D) Kinematic Analysis, Springs, Dampers, Force Analysis, Compliance, Computer Aided Analysis and Design of Suspension Systems.

notes: 車輛四、日、職車輛所合開

description.zh: 導論（含系統概論、資料表示法），微電腦結構－中央處理單元，組合語言－指令型定址法，模組化程式，位元組和字串處裡，I/O 程式，DOS 功能常式，多元程式規劃，系統匯流排結構，I/O 介面，半導體記憶，多元處裡器組態。
description.en: Introduction (Overview of Microprocessor System, Data Representation), Microprocessor Architecture-CPU etc., Assembler Language-Instruction Format, Addressing Modes, Modular Programming, Byte and String Manipulation, I/O Programming, DOS Function Multiprogramming, System Bus Structure, I/O Interface, Semiconductor Memory, Multiprocessor Configurations.

notes: 車輛三、四合開

description.zh: 「鐵道車輛系統與維修基地」課程，乃為培養具有鐵路車輛分析設計及檢修技術操作能力之人員，掌握鐵道裝備設計製造、檢修的基礎知識與應用能力，具有鐵道車輛製造、檢修、運用、管理等綜合職業能力和創新精神的高素質技能型專門人才。本課程將從鐵道車輛基本結構開始介紹，並探討鐵道車輛與鐵道基礎之互制關係。而後導入各式特殊鐵道車輛設計之原理與用途，如：高速客車、傾斜式列車、自導向系統…. 等，並研討各種車型之行駛穩定性與脫軌風險計算方式。最後介紹鐵道車輛維修之概念與實務，並介紹維修基地之設計與配置，再導入先進預兆健康預防檢修法與 AR 技術於檢修之應用與發展。
description.en: This course of "Railway Vehicle System and Maintenance Depot" will cover the basic design criteria of the railway vehicle, its sub-systems and integration. We will discuss factors that affect the design, sizing, manufacturing and maintenance of the sub-systems of the railway vehicle, including their integration with other sub-systems to work as one complete train. Various factors affecting reliability, accessibility and maintainability will be addressed. Then several types of vehicle (high-speed-vehicle, tilting train, self-guide bogie will be introduced to determine the dynamic stability and derailment risk. Finally, the design of maintenance depot will be studied and the latest technologies (PHM, AR) on railway vehicle maintenance will be introduced.

name.zh: 鐵道車輛系統與維修基地
name.en: Railway Vehicle System and Maintenance Depot

notes: 車輛三、四合開

description.zh: 先修課程：4402014 或負責教授同意一維及多維穩定態熱傳導及非穩定態熱傳導；對流原理，強迫對流及自然對流經驗和實驗關係式；輻射熱傳遞；凝結與沸騰；熱交換器；熱傳遞中的特殊論題。
description.en: Steady-State Conduction-One Dimension, Steady-State Conduction- Multiple Dimensions, Unsteady-State Conduction, Principles of Convection, Empirical and Practical Relations for Forced-Convection Heat Transfer, Natural- Convection Systems, Radiation Heat Transfer, Condensation and Boiling Heat Transfer, Heat Exchangers, Special Topics in Heat Transfer.

notes: 車輛三、四合開

description.zh: 介紹各種潔淨且高效率的先進車輛動力系統的型式及其工作原理並分析技巧。項目包含車輛能源所面臨的一些問題及可能的解決方案、優良動力源的特性、電動系統、複合電動系統、複合氣動系統、氫燃料電池動力系統、金屬燃料電池動力系統、各種替代性燃料的特性及優缺點、太陽光電輔助動力系統等。
description.en: This course introduces various kinds of clean and high-efficiency vehicular power systems, their operation principles, and analytical skills.  Topics include: problems and possible solutions the vehicular power system faces, characteristics of a good vehicular power system, electric power system, hybrid electric power system, hybrid pneumatic power system, fuel cell power system, metallic fuel-cell power system, substitutive fuels, and solar-energy auxiliary power system.

name.en: Special Topics on Clean Power System

notes: 日、職車輛所合開

description.zh: 噪音基礎，噪音分析實驗法，汽車噪音法規與標準，基本噪音控制程序，車輛噪音與噪音控制基本，引擎噪音與控制，車輛噪音源，車輛噪音與改良，心理聲學與最佳化
description.en: Fundamentals of Acoustics, Experimental Methods of Acoustic Analysis, Automotive Noise Legislation and Standards, Basic Noise Control Procedure, Basics of Vehicle Noise and Noise Control, Engine Noise and Its Control, Vehicle Noise Sources, Vehicle Noise and Its Refinement, Psychoacoustic Analysis and Optimizations.

notes: 英文授課，日、職車輛所、能源與車輛外生合開

description.zh: 本課程以介紹複合動力車輛概念、設計、能量分析及最佳化控制為主，結合內燃機及馬達兩種複合動力之能量管理及配合道路狀況，教導學生熟識複合車輛動力系統。
description.en: This course presents fundamentals of Hybrid Electric Vehicles: HEV concepts and design, energy analysis, unified modeling approach, optimization and control.  The power consumption side of vehicles. Conventional power generation: IC engine overview, concepts of hybridization, general model of energy form and energy flows, on-board energy storage (fuels and batteries). Overview of electrochemical converters: motors, transmissions for HEVs, principles of fuel cells, HEV application. Principles of energy optimization in HEVs.

description.zh: 講授透視圖的基本原理、種類與方法及透視陰影，並以設計實例透視圖練習應用，培養靈活應用透視圖法於設計表達。
description.en: This course aims to provide the student with theories and skills of perspective drafting by specifically introducing perspective theories and ways of drawing, and being concurrent with the practice of drawing in industrial design.

notes: 家室組；上限 30 人；新聘

description.zh: 將試作技術課程內所習之試作技術應用發揮，以產品設計圖為依據，應用各種材料及加工技術完成產品之立體表達。
description.en: To practice product model building techniques . Based on product engineering drawing , let techning design students to practice model making techniques with difference material and working methods .

notes: 家室組；上限 30 人

description.zh: 讓學生學習電腦 2D 與 3D 軟體之技能，俾能應用於工程製圖，並配合其他各種參數式 3D 與材質編修電腦軟體之整合。
description.en: The study of 2D and 3D computer software which could be applied to the engineering drawing, and the integration with parametric 3D and materials edit computer software.

notes: 家室組；上限 40 人

description.zh: 應用快速手繪觀念結合數位技術等工具軟體，使設計作品之發表及簡報方式能達到視覺上更豐富而生動的表達效果。
description.en: Teaching student to use digital software to simulate design proposal for a perfect presentation.

notes: 上限 40 人

description.zh: 以國外設計競賽 (if & reddot) 為主軸，輔導與協助學生積極的參與國外設計競賽，訓練學生獨立思考與問題解決能力。
description.en: This course aims to focus on domestic and international design competitions(if & reddot), guide and help students ' active, and let students have independent thinking and problem-solving skills.

notes: 上限 20 人

description.zh: 建立設計專業用日文基礎；日文發音、拼音、基本句型、詞類文法及設計專業日文導讀，用以唸讀及理解設計專業相關日文。
description.en: Introducing the alphabet pronunciation, phonation, sentence structures and the ten parts speech grammar of Japanese to building the capability of reading and understanding the design based Japanese.

notes: 新聘 1

description.zh: 藉由大量的人物寫生，從人性關懷的角度速寫記錄人生百態，速寫重點要「神」、「形」兼備。下一步是靜態單人速寫練習，體態美見於動、靜、張、弛的表現，且比例要正確。下筆速、簡、精、準、是練習重點。接下來是靜態雙人、多人速寫練習。除了依循單人速寫練習要點，並加入空間透視感，使畫面構成更生動有趣。
description.en: The course begins with a lot of figure sketching. You have to care about all walks of life, and actively observe and record their figures. Try to master both the charm and the form of the model.  Next focusing on static mono-figure sketching, you have to demonstrate your techniques in presenting either the static or the dynamic, the state of tension or looseness. You also have to be precise in proportion when you do your sketch. Stress definitely on the practice of speediness, simplicity, accuracy, and preciseness. Also work on static twin-figure and multi-figure sketching. Besides incorporating guidelines from the previous activity, you have to add the sense of spatial perspective to make your sketch more vivid and

notes: 工設二三四合開；上限 55 人

description.zh: 本課程之目的係協助學生進行設計意象相關主題之研究與實務專題分析，以培養各種意象理論與分析方法之能力。
description.en: The objective of this course is to help the students whose topics of graduate projects are related to design image to prepare their preliminary studies. This course provides the necessary theoretical tools and case analysis, and its contents contain image of material, image of shape, image of content, to establish the ability about theory of image and analysis method.

notes: 創新碩與設計博合開

description.zh: Brundtland 報告在 1987 年將永續發展定義為「在不損害後代子孫滿足其自身需求的能力的前提下滿足當前需求的發展。」17 個永續發展目標依循千禧年共同訂定發展目標的成功基礎上延展，其中包括諸如氣候變化，經濟不平等，創新，可持續消費，和平與正義等新領域。17 個永續發展目標更於 2016 年 1 月成為聯合國致力發展推動政策及生效直至 2030 年。本課程旨在探討研究「永續發展」新概念和理論基礎。課程論述著重於工業化國家（尤其是台灣地區）的永續性問題，例如人口老齡化，可持續消費等。課程中透過創新產品設計與開發方法來系統化引導學生探索有關可持續性，經濟和技術層面以及相關知識社會學，並嘗試帶領學生提出具可行性的新產品、系統及服務概念，為當前狀態下提供更好的友善環境解決方案。課程期待學生透過修習該課程，應可以掌握跨學科永續發展的設計原理，並教導如何藉由創新產品設計和開發方法來引導不同永續相關背景和設計背景的專業人員合作以瞭解開發市場上成功之環境友善產品之關鍵課題，針對環境需求，提出創新友善環境解決方案並進而產生創新環境友善產品。
description.en: Sustainable development is defined by Brundtland Report (1987) as “development that meets the needs of the present without compromising the ability of future generations to meet their own needs.” There are 17 Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs) build on the successes of the Millennium Development Goals, while including new areas such as climate change, economic inequality, innovation, sustainable consumption, peace and justice, among other priorities. The 17 SDGs came into effect in January 2016, and they will continue to guide UNDP policy and funding until 2030. This course aims to explore alternative conceptions and theoretical underpinnings of the notion of “sustainable development.” It focuses on the sustainability problems of industrial countries, especially in Taiwan such as aging of populations, sustainable consumption, etc. It intends to use IPDD approach systematically to explore the sociology of knowledge around sustainability, the economic and technological dimensions a

notes: 創新日職碩、設計博合開

description.zh: 產品設計專案包含研究與設計。設計專案透過工業設計的理論、方法及程序，以研究的手段形成設計決策，或以實證的方式將研究成果應用於設計實務。設計專案之設計成果必須建立在相關的研究基礎上。
description.en: This course is directed toward an approved product design project withresearch and design completed under supervision of the director. Theory andpractice in research and development dealing with the design project isreviewed in the study. Projects must represent a meaningful contribution tothe field of design base on supportive research.

notes: 日職合開

description.zh: 本科目主旨在於加強學生使用語言的表達能力、並促使學生更加容易瞭解學術論文。每週的課程是由一系列連貫性的論文來引導學生去學習即分析論文，並能以口語、寫作正確地表達出所分析論文的含義。這些所提供的研究論文都具備可精闢分析的要素。這些文章的內容有包含習慣的不同、事件的相對面、意見的分歧、喜好的差異、演繹法即歸納法得的結論等等。
description.en: This course aims to enhance oral and written communication skills and in the process provide a greater understanding of the philosophy underlying academic discourse. Weekly units are oriented around a progressive series of tasks which consider academic texts in context and require learners to understand, analyse and produce spoken and written texts appropriate to the context of academic English. The contextualisation of these tasks is the philosophical aspects of critical analysis. Themes, such as the difference between convention, fact, opinion and preference; deductive and inductive proof; validity and truth; evidence; and the ethics of persuasion, are the basis on which the skills are taught.

notes: 日職合開

description.zh: 藉由國內外設計競賽主題與產學合作設計案進行實際演練，著重於資料蒐集、商品分析、創新構想與成果表達之進階能力養成，期讓學生在國內外設計競賽舞台上展現光芒，在產學合作中習得實務經驗並獲致產業界肯定。因此本課程旨在以實際演練達成兼具創新性與商品化專業設計能力養成。
description.en: Advanced Integrated Design educates students to identify and resolve design problems - innovatively and with sensitivity to the social, physical and ecological environment. Students learn to analyze and solve diverse design problems from technical, aesthetic, social and ecological viewpoints. Students are given the resources to identify, expand and test personal and professional development through an intensive exploration of design ideas. Innovation is stressed, along with the ability to refine formal design issues. There are numerous opportunities for students to work with industry through corporate-sponsored studio projects and design competitions.

name.zh: 進階整合設計研究與實務專題 (二)
name.en: Advanced integrated design research and practice project(II)

notes: 日職合開

description.zh: 本課程將介紹程式設計的基礎，透過腳本式語言及基礎程式語言的應用，培養學生程式設計的基本能力。本課程除加強技術開發能力外，也將導引學生，如何透過獨立思考來面對問題及分析問題，並透過程式的撰寫來解決問題。
description.en: This course will introduce the fundamental of computer programming design. Student will learn the capability of programming design using script language and basic programming language. This course will also provide the knowledge and methods for students to realize and analyze specific problem independently. So that they can using computer program to solve the problems.

notes: 家室組 (請勿選錯組)，計中電腦教室

description.zh: 此課程旨在協助學生建立相當於美國大學入學測驗的高階字彙，亦即相當於接受高等教育之英語系國家人士所具備的用字能力。此課程將通過故事方式介紹此類字彙，其中也包括字形學之解析。學生修習此課程後應能將高階字彙使用於正確的上下文中，因此可達成下列諸目的："	提昇高階字彙數量"	加強英文閱讀能力 "	習得重要字源解析"	避免上下文中的用字錯誤 "	提高英語表達能力"	加強英文寫作能力 "	精進英語文溝通技巧
description.en: This course aims to help students build a more powerful vocabulary on the SAT (the qualifying exam for US college admission) level, i.e. the level of proficiency of an educated native speaker's. Students will be introduced to the lexical use through story scenes. Morphological analysis of the words will be included in the course. At the exit of this course, students are expected to use them in their proper contexts and hence reach the following goals:"	Develop a powerful vocabulary"	Improve reading skills"	Learn important word roots"	Avoid word usage error in context"	Become a better speaker"	Strengthen his/her writing ability"	Improve communication skills

name.zh: 高階英文字彙習得與應用
name.en: The Acquisition and Application of Advanced English Lexical Use

description.zh: 本課程藉由不同情境之英語錄影帶，以及專題的語彙題目來提供一個英語談話的情境使學生能學習合宜的詞句。小組討論、角色演練、口頭報告皆為主要教學技巧，俾能增強學生之聽說能力。
description.en: This course aims at providing an English-speaking environment to allow students learn about the speaking strategies and common expressions used in different situations through viewing video films and oral practice. Small-group/pair discussion and role-playing are also parts of the methodologies.

notes: B 組，僅限英文系學生修讀

description.zh: 本課程藉由不同情境之英語錄影帶，以及專題的語彙題目來提供一個英語談話的情境使學生能學習合宜的詞句。小組討論、角色演練、口頭報告皆為主要教學技巧，俾能增強學生之聽說能力。
description.en: This course aims at providing an English-speaking environment to allow students learn about the speaking strategies and common expressions used in different situations through viewing video films and oral practice. Small-group/pair discussion and role-playing are also parts of the methodologies.

notes: C 組，僅限英文系學生修讀

description.zh: 本課程旨在幫助學生熟稔運用基本重要文法以寫出正確自然，表達清晰之句子。內容包括語法結構和錯誤分析，例如不完整句、誤置修飾語、不連結修飾語、散漫句、錯誤平行結構、易混淆字、贅詞等常見問題。
description.en: This course is intended to provide a review of essential grammar skills as a background for students to construct sentences that convey ideas effectively and clearly.  The main content includes the correction of sentence fragments, run-on sentences, misplaced modifiers, dangling modifiers, and faulty parallelism.  Further focus is placed on varying syntactical structure, and on avoiding errors related to commonly confused words, slang, pretentious wording, cliches, and wordiness.

notes: B 組，僅限英文系學生修讀

description.zh: 本課程旨在幫助學生熟稔運用基本重要文法以寫出正確自然，表達清晰之句子。內容包括語法結構和錯誤分析，例如不完整句、誤置修飾語、不連結修飾語、散漫句、錯誤平行結構、易混淆字、贅詞等常見問題。
description.en: This course is intended to provide a review of essential grammar skills as a background for students to construct sentences that convey ideas effectively and clearly.  The main content includes the correction of sentence fragments, run-on sentences, misplaced modifiers, dangling modifiers, and faulty parallelism.  Further focus is placed on varying syntactical structure, and on avoiding errors related to commonly confused words, slang, pretentious wording, cliches, and wordiness.

notes: C 組，僅限英文系學生修讀

description.zh: 本課程目的在啟發學生英語聽力，分析及思辨能力。本課程自報紙，雜誌及電視選取豐富的新聞及媒體教材，以訓練聽力及筆記的技巧。 此外，在課堂上將討論一些有爭議性的或者有趣的議題，以培養學生獨立思辨能力。
description.en: The course aims to develop the student's techniques of listening, analyzing and critical thinking in English. A variety of journalistic and media texts will be selected from newspapers, magazines and T.V. to reinforce listening training and note-taking skills. Besides, some controversial or interesting issues will be discussed in class to encourage the student's independent and critical thinking.

name.zh: 新聞英語及聽力訓練（二）

notes: B 組，僅限英文系學生修讀

description.zh: 本課程幫助學生習得敘述、描寫、推論、議論、省思、說明等文體方面的寫作技巧，並指導學生從閱讀、圖片、日常生活事件，及課堂討論內容中取材，以加強邏輯思考和流暢寫作能力。
description.en: This course aims to develop and reinforce students' strengths to create unified and coherent pieces of composition in a variety of styles--narrative, descriptive,  argumentative, reflective, and expository.  Students will be guided to write in response to readings, pictures, events in their daily lives, and discussions from the class.  Thought-provoking topics dealing with current issues are used to stimulate and foster critical writing strategies. This course enables students to write and discuss logically and clearly; they also need to incorporate grammatically newly-built vocabulary into their writing.

notes: B 組，僅限英文系學生修讀【停開】

description.zh: 本課程幫助學生習得敘述、描寫、推論、議論、省思、說明等文體方面的寫作技巧，並指導學生從閱讀、圖片、日常生活事件，及課堂討論內容中取材，以加強邏輯思考和流暢寫作能力。
description.en: This course aims to develop and reinforce students' strengths to create unified and coherent pieces of composition in a variety of styles--narrative, descriptive,  argumentative, reflective, and expository.  Students will be guided to write in response to readings, pictures, events in their daily lives, and discussions from the class.  Thought-provoking topics dealing with current issues are used to stimulate and foster critical writing strategies. This course enables students to write and discuss logically and clearly; they also need to incorporate grammatically newly-built vocabulary into their writing.

notes: C 組，僅限英文系學生修讀【停開】

description.zh: 本課程欲提升英文系學生之溝通能力，並著重於簡報部份。中高階英語能力之學生須發表口頭報告，藉此增進有效之語言使用策略。
description.en: This course aims to enhance English-major students’ communicative competence with special emphasis on business presentations and meetings. By developing effective skills, strategies and tactful language use, students with high-intermediate proficiency level of English will be able to prepare as well as present verbal reports to achieve career goal.

notes: B 組，僅限英文系學生修讀

description.zh: 本課程欲提升英文系學生之溝通能力，並著重於簡報部份。中高階英語能力之學生須發表口頭報告，藉此增進有效之語言使用策略。
description.en: This course aims to enhance English-major students’ communicative competence with special emphasis on business presentations and meetings. By developing effective skills, strategies and tactful language use, students with high-intermediate proficiency level of English will be able to prepare as well as present verbal reports to achieve career goal.

notes: C 組，僅限英文系學生修讀

description.zh: 此筆譯入門課程旨在使學生熟悉中英翻譯的基本概念、技巧與原則。課程中亦將介紹中英對比分析與翻譯之關聯，並協助學生將語言對比知識應用於翻譯實務中。學生將能於本課程中習得各類型翻譯所需之策略。
description.en: This is an introductory course aiming to familiarize students with basic concepts, skills and principles of Chinese-English translation. Moreover, the relevance of Chinese-English contrastive analysis to translation practices will be introduced, and students will learn how to apply the linguistic knowledge to practical work. By the end of the course, student will develop useful and appropriate translation strategies to deal with a range of translation tasks.

notes: B 組，僅限英文系學生修讀

description.zh: 此筆譯入門課程旨在使學生熟悉中英翻譯的基本概念、技巧與原則。課程中亦將介紹中英對比分析與翻譯之關聯，並協助學生將語言對比知識應用於翻譯實務中。學生將能於本課程中習得各類型翻譯所需之策略。
description.en: This is an introductory course aiming to familiarize students with basic concepts, skills and principles of Chinese-English translation. Moreover, the relevance of Chinese-English contrastive analysis to translation practices will be introduced, and students will learn how to apply the linguistic knowledge to practical work. By the end of the course, student will develop useful and appropriate translation strategies to deal with a range of translation tasks.

notes: C 組，僅限英文系學生修讀

description.zh: 本課程主要在培養進階寫作能力，採用功能導向的方式，諸如書函，文章／書本摘要，評論，創作，學術專技報告等專項進行演練。
description.en: This course, using a functionally-oriented approach, aims at increasing university-level EFL writing students' English writing skills and developing them into more fluent, confident writers. To achieve this goal, students in this course will have ample opportunities to compose a wide variety of extended writing pieces, including letters, memos, abstracts, reviews, creative writings, and technical reports.

notes: B 組，僅限英文系學生修讀【停開】

description.zh: 本課程主要在培養進階寫作能力，採用功能導向的方式，諸如書函，文章／書本摘要，評論，創作，學術專技報告等專項進行演練。
description.en: This course, using a functionally-oriented approach, aims at increasing university-level EFL writing students' English writing skills and developing them into more fluent, confident writers. To achieve this goal, students in this course will have ample opportunities to compose a wide variety of extended writing pieces, including letters, memos, abstracts, reviews, creative writings, and technical reports.

notes: C 組，僅限英文系學生修讀【停開】

description.zh: 為什麼要閱讀或研究莎士比亞？Catherine Belsey 回答道：是為了莎翁的獨特性。如她所言：「莎士比亞不僅是英語世界上流社會文化的精華，亦為其整體文化的精髓。」因為莎劇的辭彙，迄今仍通用於英語世界，並已融入日常生活之結構中。這現象不僅發生在現在的英國，自莎翁的時代開始，莎翁的語彙在全世界就從未停止流通過。何況，莎翁震撼人心的詩歌和劇場藝術，無人出其右的人性掌握，以及非凡的人生哲學思維與洞見，向來受到世人的珍愛。如世人常謂：莎士比亞的語言可觸發我們的想像力，為我們在人生的各個層面 (包括職業層面) 提升溝通效率。為了這些重要的理由，本課程將引導學生欣賞莎士比亞的若干劇作。
description.en: Why Shakespeare? Catherine Belsey answers that it is because of his singularity. As she observes, "Shakespeare is part and parcel of English-speaking culture, and not only high culture." For "phrases from the plays are still current, woven into the fabric of everyday life" in Britain now and have, in fact, been circulated in the world since the early modern era. Besides, Shakespeare has been cherished for his powerful poetry and stagecraft, his nonpareil grasp of human nature, and his remarkable philosophical insights into life. As people often observe, Shakespeare may trigger our imagination with his language and promote effective communication in every aspect of our life, including that of our careers. For these important reasons, this course aims to guide students to appreciate Shakespeare by focusing on a number of his plays.

description.zh: 本課程旨在讓學生具備國際新聞編譯之相關知識，並透過實務演練培養新聞編譯之能力。課程內容主要含括 (一) 國際新聞編譯之介紹（如新聞編譯現況、製作流程、專業條件與譯者相關知能）；（二）新聞編譯之策略與技巧（如刪除、重組、整合新聞訊息）；（三）新聞編譯之模擬與實務練習。
description.en: This course aims to help students build up the basic knowledge of news trans-editing and develop students’ trans-editing skills through practical training. The course covers the following areas: (1) an introduction to news trans-editing (e.g. the current state of the news trans-editing field, the production workflow, professional qualifications and personal traits of news translators); (2) strategies and skills of news trans-editing (e.g. the strategies of deletion, restructuring, abridgement and synthesis); (3) practical training of news trans-editing in a simulated or real environment.

description.zh: 本課程旨在介紹英語全球化、不同種類英語的出現，以及英語作為通用語言之發展、相關概念與論述。經由閱讀與課堂討論，學生將有機會檢視與英語全球化和全球英語相關的重要議題。
description.en: This course aims to provide students with an overview of the spread of the English language around the world, the emergence of English varieties, and the development of the popularization of English as a lingua franca. Through readings and class discussion, students will have the opportunity to examine key issues arising from the spread of English as well as the development of Global Englishes.

description.zh: 駭客是一門非常廣泛的學科，涵蓋了廣泛的主題。 本課程將提供駭客攻防的各種概念，並解釋如何在即時環境中使用它們。本課程將包括駭客的類型，駭客的優勢 / 劣勢，駭客的目的，駭客的工具，駭客的技能，駭客的流程等。
description.en: Hacking is a very broad discipline, which covers a wide range of topics. This course will provide the various concepts of Ethical Hacking and explain how you can use them in a real-time environment.This course will include the type of hacking, advantage /disadvantage of hacking, the purpose of hacking, tools of hacking, skill of hacking, process of hacking, etc.

description.zh: 本課程將介紹程式設計中面臨的安全議題。學生將透過這堂課程，理解各種不良撰寫習慣與不考慮安全下所撰寫的程式所造成的漏洞與基礎知識；同時，理解惡意者攻擊的原理。在本課程結束時，學生能夠具備安全開發程式應用之基本能力。
description.en: This course will introduce security issues in programming. Through this course, students will understand the vulnerabilities and basic knowledge caused by various bad programming habits and programming without considering security. Students will understand the principles of malicious attacks. After this course, students will be able to securely develop programming applications.

description.zh: 本課程在介紹數位多媒體的基本概念與使用技術。課程內容包含: 1. 數位多媒體概論 2. 網路多媒體與資訊傳播 3. 影像處理原理與方法 4. 視訊剪輯原理與 DV 使用方法 5. 網路串流媒體影音同步 6. 電腦圖學與卡通動畫 7. 多媒體影像資料庫 8. 隨選服務與網路現場轉播 9. 互動式多媒體標準 MPEG-4, MPEG-7 10. 數位多媒體案例實作
description.en: The goal of this course is to introduce the basic concepts and techniques of digital multimedia. The outline of this course includes: 1.Introduction to Digital Multimedia 2.Networked Multimedia and Information Communication 3.Principle and Methods of Image Processing 4.Principle of Video Editing and Usage of Digital Video Equipments 5.Network Streaming Media and Audio/Video Synchronization 6. Computer Graphics and Cartoon Animation 7.Multimedia Database 8.On-Demand Service and Network Live Broadcast 9.Interactive Multimedia Standard MPEG-4 and MPEG-7 10. Some Case Implementation in Digital Multimedia

notes: 電資二主開，與資工二合開

description.zh: 本課程介紹機器視覺之基本概念、原理及衍生應用，同時輔助以開放的影像函式庫來實作訓練；課程中由基礎的基本影像分析入門，並逐步導入機器視覺理論與方法，二維影像校正與立體視覺等內容；課程中將介紹機器視覺系統的相關資源與實作能力的培養，並進一步延伸至影像量測、機器學習與機器人領域的範例應用。
description.en: The field of machine vision has been growing at a fast pace. As in most developing fields, not all aspects of machine vision that are of interest to active researchers are useful to the designers and users of a vision system for a specific application. This course is intended to provide a balanced introduction to machine vision. Basic concepts are introduced with only essential mathematical elements. The details to allow implementation and use of vision algorithms in practical applications are provided, and engineering aspects of techniques are emphasized.

description.zh: 在各種應用領域中，非結構化的文件相當普遍。如何精確有效地從文件中擷取出重要資訊並分析語意，將有助於彙整不同想法。本課程介紹基本的自然語言處理技術，包括：語彙組成、語法分析、語意分析等，以及常見的文件探勘方法。除了介紹詞性標註 (POS tagging)、關鍵詞擷取 (keyterm extraction)、中文斷詞 (word segmentation) 之外，也將探討不同的字詞與文件表達方式，並應用深度學習方法進行有效的語意分析，如：情緒分析、意見探勘等。
description.en: Unstructured text docuemnts are very common in various applicaton domains. How to extract important information from texts and analyze their meanings is very helpful to aggregate various ideas. In this course, we are going to introduce the basic techniques in Natural Language Processing including: lexical, syntactic, and semantic anlaysis, and common text mining methods. In addition to POS tagging, keyterm extraction, and word segmentation, we are going to discuss different word and document representations, and apply deep learning methods in effective semantic analysis such as sentiment analysis and opinion mining.

name.zh: 自然語言處理與文件探勘
name.en: Natural Language Processing and Text Mining

description.zh: 開源軟體 (open-source software) 對於資訊世界的發展極其重要，尤其是系統軟體與中介軟體。在 1990 年代快速發展的 GNU/Linux，1990 年代末期進入互連網時代，世界上最多伺服器使用的開源碼網頁伺服器 Apache HTTP Server 應運而生，之後更衍生出傳奇性的開源碼 Apache Project。迄今，各個開源碼社群持續改進、優化既有的軟體，並且不斷地開發出有巨大影響力的新計畫，包括廣泛用於建構雲端服務與巨量資料運算的 OpenStack、Hadoop 和 Spark，世界上最多人使用在智慧手機和平板的 Android 作業環境。開源系統軟體與中介軟體更成為物聯網和巨量資料分析時代的重要基礎，高效率、即時性、機器與機器之間良好的溝通與合作是這個時代應用開發的關鍵，除了需要有高效率、穩定、安全的作業系統之外，還需要更多高品質、優化度高的系統軟體與中介軟體。
description.en: Open-source software is extremely important to the development of the information world, especially system software and middleware. GNU/Linux developed rapidly in the 1990s and entered the Internet era in the late 1990s. The open-source web server Apache HTTP Server, which is used by the most servers in the world, came into being, and then the legendary open-source Apache Project was born. So far, various open-source communities have continued to improve and optimize existing software, and continue to develop new projects with great influence, including OpenStack, Hadoop and Spark, which are widely used to build cloud services and massive data computing. The most widely used Android work environment on smartphones and tablets. Open-source system software and intermediary software have become an important foundation in the era of Internet of Things and massive data analysis. High efficiency, immediacy, and good communication and cooperation between machines are the keys to application d

description.zh: Apple 推出 iPhone 以及 iPhone SDK 後，造成了一股不可擋的智慧型手機革命，由於相較於桌上型和筆記型電腦，手機是人們日常生活中更容易貼近使用的行動裝置，因此，手機中的 App 更可以幫助人們解決生活中的問題。本課程將由最基本的入門點切入，前段會先帶領同學針對 Objective-C 語法，委派設計 (Delegate) 模式等 iOS 入門的幾大難題上課，接著利用 Storyboard 建構出常見的 iOS app 使用者介面，最後再教導同學用 OpenGL es 實作有趣的 3D 應用程式。本課程大致如下：1. 導論 2. Objective-C3. iOS 系統架構 4.Xcode 開發工具安裝與使用 5. 基礎 UI 設計與多國語言 6. 核心應用程式設計 7. 感應器應用 8. 多媒體與相機功能 9. OpenGL ES10. 擴增實境 11. 專題實作及評鑑
description.en: In this course, you will get hands-on with the Apple SDK and learn how to use Objective-C to build the apps from scratch; You will be equipped to develop iOS apps, including 3D Apps through an understanding of the following course materials:˙Introduction to iOS˙How to program in Objective-C˙Using X-Code ˙The basics UI design of an iPhone/iPad application˙iOS MVC structure˙Use of sensors, the GPS, and cameras˙Multimedia functions – how to play audio and video files˙OpenGL ES for 3D/AR application˙Project Demo and Review˙How to publish an iPhone/iPad application

notes: 資工三、資工四和資工所合開

description.zh: 本課程介紹字體設計與文字編排學的基本概念，理解文字編碼原理，熟悉資訊處理技術。課程內容包括：1. 電腦字體設計 2. 書法運筆 3. 襯線體 4. 無襯線字體 5. 文字編排學 6. 字間微調 7. 字形替換 8. 可縮放向量圖形技術 9. TrueType 二次貝茲曲線 10. OpenType 三次貝茲曲線 11. 數字系統 12. 字集標準 13. 電腦字型格式 14. 編碼方法 15. 統一碼 16. 可變長度字元編碼 17. 中日韓統一表意文字。
description.en: This course introduces Computer Typography, Type Design, Character Encoding, and Information Processing Techniques. The course topics include: 1. Computer Type Design, 2. Calligraphy, 3. Serif, 4. Sans Serif, 5. Typography, 6. Kerning, 7. Glyph Substitution, 8. Scalable Vector Graphics, 9. TrueType Quadratic Bezier Curve, 10. OpenType Cubic Bezier Curves, 11. Number Systems, 12. Character Set Standards, 13. Font Formats, 14. Encoding Methods, 15. Unicode, 16. Unicode Transformation Format, 17. Chinese, Japanese and Korean (CJK) Unified Ideographs.

notes: 資工四和資工所合開

description.zh: 本課程將深入介紹檔案系統與儲存系統之作用原理，課程主軸將涵蓋 1. 輸出 / 輸入設備 2. 磁碟陣列與資料可靠性 3. 檔案系統基礎與設計原理 4. 分散式檔案系統 5. 新興儲存裝置 與 6. 鍵值儲存系統。修習本課程之學生將須要具備下列基礎知識，包含作業系統、C 語言以及基礎 Linux 指令。同時，本課程也將依照課程進展介紹最新的新興儲存裝置、檔案系統與儲存系統之相關研究以及大數據管理等議題。
description.en: This course will detail the working principles and design philosophy of file and storage systems and with prime focus on (1) I/O Devices, (2) RAID and Data Integrity, (3) File system Basics and Designs, (4) Distributed File System, (5) Emerging Storage Devices, (6) Key Value Stores. Please be noted that the knowledge of Operating System, C language, and the use of basic Linux command are required before taking this course. Depending on the current research trends, the course also discusses the latest applied storage topics, especially related to scalable and dependable big data management.

notes: 電資外、資工四和資工所合開

description.zh: 資料科學是個跨領域的重要興新學科，其基本知識含括資訊、線性代數、機率與統計等，相關技術可應用在許多領域上，包含教育領域。本課程從學科整體介紹開始，討論資料科學中各主要階段的相關議題：包含資料搜尋擷取、資料整理與問題發想、數理知識回顧與討論、資料分析建模與方法、資料呈現與視覺化等。除課堂上講授與討論外，課程亦著重如何實際應用所學，將使用教育資料並以小組方式進行議題發想與分析實作的學期專題。此外，為強化健全資料視覺呈現課題，在實作專題中課程亦著重學生報告能力的培養，希望培育出全方位的資料科學人才。
description.en: Data science is an emerging interdisciplinary field that explores how to produce or create the valuable information and knowledge from large, multi-typed, or unstructured data and provides effective feedbacks to many applications, including education. The related topics include data processing and computing, data storage, statistics and probability, linear algebra, and data analysis. This course introduces the rapidly growing field, discusses the state-of-art techniques, and provides students with the fundamental related knowledge as well as the ability to use software tools. The major phases on data manipulation- collection, preparation, analytics, and presentation, in data science will be discussed. The training of this course is toward equipping students with the general mindset and the ability to solve problems practically with the learned techniques on educational data with project groups. In addition, the students also need to practice the presentation for the findings and result

name.zh: 資料科學原理與教育數據應用
name.en: Data Science Principles with Applications on Educational Data

notes: 電資外、資工四和資工所合開

description.zh: 區塊鏈技術 (作為比特幣等數位貨幣的核心) 已重塑了金融交易與分散式交互方式之未來。同時它也被期待帶給我們一個更自組與可提供事實證明的數位化世界。抽象化區塊鏈構造是非常精巧的，它倚賴輕量化密碼學工具搭配分散式系統概念，完成了開放、安全且有效率的系統 (如比特幣)。本課程為區塊鏈技術與應用上之概念介紹，包含：比特幣與區塊鏈設計、相關基礎密碼學工具、分散式網路與共識、區塊鏈應用。
description.en: Blockchain techniques (the core of cryptocurrencies such as Bitcoin) have reshaped the future of financial transactions and decentralized interactions. They are also expected to bring us a more self-organizing and dependent digital world. The abstraction of blockchain is very delicate. It relies on cryptography tools and decentralized system concepts to achieve an open, secure, and efficient system (such as Bitcoin). This course aims to introduce the concepts of blockchain techniques and applications, including Bitcoin and blockchain design, basic cryptography tools, decentralized networks and consensus, and blockchain applications.

notes: 資工四和資工所合開

description.zh: 本課程旨在教授學生瞭解雲端環境及物聯網系統架構並進一步教授雲端環境及物聯網安全需求，課程內容除介紹雲端環境及物聯網系統的基本概念外，亦將由 OWASP 的雲端安全及物聯網安全重點進行說明，培養學生有能力分析雲端及物聯網環境中的各式潛在安全威脅，並具備設計與實作具安全防護能力的雲端及物聯網系統。課程內容包含：●雲服務技術簡介●雲服務安全●雲服務資安標準●物聯網技術簡介●工業物聯網潛在威脅●工控資安●物聯網資安檢測●物聯網資安標準●資安安全與隱私保護
description.en: This course aims to guide students understanding cloud environments and IoT systems and their corresponding security requirements. In addition to introducing basic concepts of cloud environment and IoT system, the course contents will focus on OWASP's cloud security and IoT security. All practical techniques will be explained. Students are able to analyze various potential security threats in the cloud and Internet of Things environments, and to learn security protection capabilities for cloud and IoT systems. Course contents including:●Introduction to cloud technologies●Introduction to cloud security●Security standards for cloud services ●Introduction to IoT technologies●Potential threats of industrial IoT systems●Industrial Cyber Security introduction●IoT security detection●IoT security standards●Information security and privacy protection

notes: 電資外、資工四和資工所合開

description.zh: 本課程主要探索分析不實訊息的方法，透過這門課將學習到異常訊息、社交工程、傳播路徑及深度造假等對不實訊息分析的技術，包含語意分析、帳號識別分析及傳播路徑對不實訊息的影響分析。
description.en: This course is mainly to explore the methods of analyzing false information. Through this course, you will learn the techniques of analyzing false information, such as abnormal information, social engineering, propagation path and deep fake, including semantic analysis, account identification analysis and propagation path. Analysis of the impact of false information.

notes: 電資外、資工四和資工所合開

description.zh: 安全程式設計是資訊安全領域中的關鍵技術。不良的「程式設計習慣」和「不考慮安全保護的程式設計」很容易導致可有心人士所利用。本課程除了建立安全程式設計的基礎知識外，特別著重於同學的實務能力、漏洞測試、與安全程式開發能力。同時，透過分享最新的論文研究與相關技術報告，協助研究生在研究階段獲取最新的領域知識。
description.en: Security programming is a key technology in the field of information security. “Bad programming habits” and “programming without security consideration” can easily lead to the use of malicious people. Four major themes will be explored.In addition to establishing the basic knowledge of security programming, this course focuses on student's practical ability, vulnerability testing, and security programming development ability. At the same time, by sharing novel research papers and related technical reports, the students can obtain the newest and complete domain knowledge in their research stage.

notes: 資工所和資安學程合開

description.zh: 區塊鏈技術 (作為比特幣等數位貨幣的核心) 已重塑了金融交易與分散式交互方式之未來。同時它也被期待帶給我們一個更自組與可提供事實證明的數位化世界。抽象化區塊鏈構造是非常精巧的，它倚賴輕量化密碼學工具搭配分散式系統概念，完成了開放、安全且有效率的系統 (如比特幣)。本課程為區塊鏈技術與應用上之概念介紹，包含：比特幣與區塊鏈設計、相關基礎密碼學工具、分散式網路與共識、區塊鏈應用。
description.en: Blockchain techniques (the core of cryptocurrencies such as Bitcoin) have reshaped the future of financial transactions and decentralized interactions. They are also expected to bring us a more self-organizing and dependent digital world. The abstraction of blockchain is very delicate. It relies on cryptography tools and decentralized system concepts to achieve an open, secure, and efficient system (such as Bitcoin). This course aims to introduce the concepts of blockchain techniques and applications, including Bitcoin and blockchain design, basic cryptography tools, decentralized networks and consensus, and blockchain applications.

notes: 資工四、資工所和資安學程合開

description.zh: 1. 組合分析 2. 機率公設 3. 條件機率與獨立 4. 離散隨機變數 5. 連續隨機變數 6. 結合分佈隨機變數 7. 期望值性質 8. 極限定理 9. 模擬
description.en: 1.Combinatorial Analysis 2.Axioms of Probability3.	Conditional Probability and Independence4.Discrete Random Variables5.Continuous Random Variables6.Jointly Distributed Random Variables7.Properties of Expectation 8.Limit Theorems 9.Simulation

notes: 本班 EMI 英文授課、資工二和電資二合開，中英文二擇一

description.zh: 本課程旨在探討英語與漢語在結構與功能上的主要異同，涵蓋語意、語音、音韻、詞法、句法、語用與社會文化等特徵，同時類比與對比這兩個語言使用何種語言策略達到溝通的目的。本課程之本質在訓練學生往後如何解決語言對比分析的問題，在學期結束時，學生需要針對英語與漢語某一特定語言現象獨立完成對比分析。
description.en: This course aims at investigating the major structural and functional differences and similarities of Chinese and English. The differences and similarities identified include semantic, phonetic, phonological, morphological, syntactic, pragmatic, and sociocultural features. We will also compare and contrast linguistic strategies the two languages employ to achieve communicative purposes. This course is exploratory in itself, directed toward providing students with keys to tackling linguistic issues they may encounter in their future careers. Students will be required to present an ultimate Chinese-English contrastive analysis in a certain aspect at the end of this course.

name.zh: 中英對比分析應用研究

description.zh: 西方文化的交流是建立在故事上的。即使這些故事相當久遠，但每個人卻都非常熟悉，又或者是因為這些故事相當久遠，所以每個人都非常熟悉。本課程將探討近代主要西方作家 — 喬瑟及莎士比亞 — 作品中的核心主題及文化的意象。研讀這些近代西方主要作家的作品是發展西方文學素養及思想的基石，同時，也為任何概括了以西方文化為主體的研究提供了不可或缺的背景知識。
description.en: Conversation in Western culture is built on stories. Everybody knows the stories even though the stories are very old, or rather everybody knows them because they are very old stories. This course introduces students to some of the stories that have been most influential in the English-speaking world. Knowing these stories provides essential background knowledge for understanding Western culture in general.

description.zh: 本課程旨在引導學生如何以批評的角度閱讀小說。課程討論有兩個重點：（一）小說的技巧：如情節、結構、人物塑造、敘事者與敘事策略、背景鋪陳、象徵與意象等。（二）小說與文學理論的關係：如何將文學理論運用到小說的閱讀與分析。
description.en: This course will introduce students to critical approaches and principles in the study of fiction.  We will discuss such features as plot, structure, characterization, narrator, narrative strategy, setting, symbol, image, etc..  We will also examine various theoretical approaches that can be brought to bear on the study of fiction.  There will be a particular emphasis on the application of theories to hone students' critical reading skills.

name.en: Studies in English and American Fiction

description.zh: 本課程旨在研討專業英文研究及應用，課程包括專業領域英語文之語域分析，探討各領域中的語法及詞彙特點，並進一步分析不同領域中之修辭及言語萹章使用，進而研討語言溝通目標功能分析並結合策略研究，以將理論應用於專業實務及研究中。
description.en: This course is intended for graduate students who are pre-experienced in working in specific fields of professions. For other students who are inexperienced in the workplace are required to have consolidated knowledge and observations of the world industries. It aims to address the applicability of theories in EPP and the plethora of situations raised from such applications. The course will provide theoretical studies for applications in respect to register analysis, rhetorical and discourse analysis, functionality analysis and skills and strategies. It is also expected that the course will describe other models in EPP studies.

name.en: Theories and Practice in English for Professional Purposes

description.zh: 本課程通過理論與實際案例介紹 3D 創作與空間設計軟體：3DS MAX 的概念與應用範圍，接續將 3D 環境建構的方法導入實務案例練習操作，最後透過專題設定進行學生自己的內容創作。課程目的是訓練學生在運用 3DS MAX 軟體進行 3D 模型、空間和相關物件的建構能力，並接續應用在空間展示的動畫效果和表現。
description.en: This course is about 3D creation and space design software through theoretical and practical cases: 3DS MAX - the concept and application scope, and then the teacher introduces the methods of 3D environment construction into practical case practice operations, and finally creates students' creative projects. The purpose is to train students to use the 3DS MAX software to construct 3D models, character modeling, space, and related objects, and use the result and performance in space animation.

notes: 上限 30 人

description.zh: 本課程主要介紹質性研究中傳統的研究法，藉由深入探討採用不同質性研究方法的研究報告、以及實地進行質性研究以幫助學生掌握各項質性研究方法的運用與分析方法的技巧。
description.en: This course aims at introducing fundamental qualitative research methods to help students acquire skills and experiences in adopting a wide range of methodological and analytical techniques through studying qualitative research reports and conducting the qualitative study.

description.zh: 本課程講解衛星的電機系統，包括指令與資料處理、電力、通訊、飛行軟體及電機介面等，並以國內衛星的實例說明發展程序。建議先修電子學或電子電路相關課程。
description.en: This course introduces the satellite electrical systems, including instructions and data processing, power, communications, flight software, and electrical interfaces. This course also uses the example of domestic satellite systems to illustrate the development procedures. It is recommended that students have taken courses related to Electronics or Electronic Circuits.

description.zh: 針對地理資訊系統 之概念與技術基礎作一基本瞭解。學習範圍包括城市資訊系統、天然資源及環境管理系統、緊急救援系統等。並學習地理資訊系統 軟體操作與技巧之訓練。
description.en: Conceptual & technical foundations of geographical information systems. Applications covered include: urban information systems, natural resources & environmental management systems & emergency response systems. Laboratory sessions focus on acquiring basic skills in using GIS software with real world data.

notes: 材資三、四乙合開，計中電腦教室

description.zh: 本課程提供所有博士生共同參與研究討論的園地。將進行設計專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論。
description.en: This course is a joint seminar for all the doctoral students, which will be progressed by paper presentation of special topics on design issues, giving lectures, and group meeting.

notes: 博二選課，請依分組 & 共同討論上課時間

description.zh: 課程主要介紹在計算機科學中常見或基本的資料結構，探討的主題包括: ADT (抽像資料型態) 及複雜度，靜態結構與儲存表示，陣列，堆疊，佇列，串列，樹狀結構，遞迴，排序，搜尋。
description.en: This course is mainly aimed at introducing the data structures commonly used in programming languages which include ADT (abstract data type) and complexity, static structures and their storage representations, arrays, stacks, queues, linked lists, trees, recursion, sorting, and searching.

notes: 六教 226，智動科限 15 人，與機械四甲乙丙合開

description.zh: 通論，基本理論，傳輸線參數，傳輸線的數學模式，變壓器的數學模式及標么值系統，對稱成分，對稱三相故障，非對稱故障，負載潮流分析與控制，電力系統之經濟運轉，發電機之數學模式，電力系統穩定度，電壓控制系統，電力控制系統，系統保護。
description.en: Introduction, Basic principles, Transmission line parameters, Line model, power flow analysis, optimal dispatch of generation

notes: 六教 226，兼任老師曾大修，15 人，與機械四甲乙丙合開

description.zh: 一。電力設備的故障二。比壓器，比流器三。保護電驛的構造及動作原理四。常用的保護電驛五。發電機與電動機的保護六。變壓器的保護七。線路保護八。異常電壓的預防九。熔絲十。保護協調
description.en: <一>INTRODUCTION<二>WHAT REALLY IS THE MVA METHOD<三>THE ABC OF THE MVA<四>WHY THE MVA METHOD<五>COMPARISON OF THREE METHODS<六>CAN PHASE-GROUND FAULT BE SOLVED <七>MVA METHODS FOR INSTANTANEOUS VOLTAGE ESTIMATE<八>THE SIMPLE COMPUTER TIME SHARE PROGRAM<九>CONCLUSION

description.zh: 車輛的應用中包含許多的化學反應，例如噴漆和塗料的使用，要了解車用塗料的操作原理、和研發特用的功能，需要具備基礎化學、有機化學、高分子化學和塗料的知識。本課程針對漆的化學概念，介紹車輛中所使用化學品相關的化學理論，進一步連結到學生在現場時會遇到的實際案例，解釋所觀察到的化學反應現象。
description.en: The applications of vehicles include many chemical reactions, such as the use of paint spraying and coatings. To understand the operation principle and to develop special chemical function, it is necessary to have knowledge of general chemistry, organic chemistry, polymer chemistry and coatings. This course aims at teaching key chemical concepts, introduces chemical theories related to chemicals used in vehicles, further links to actual cases that students will encounter on the scene, and explains the chemical reaction phenomena observed.

notes: 車輛四、日、職車輛所、技優專班三合開

description.zh: 車輛的應用中包含許多的化學反應，例如噴漆和塗料的使用，要了解車用塗料的操作原理、和研發特用的功能，需要具備基礎化學、有機化學、高分子化學和塗料的知識。本課程針對漆的化學概念，介紹車輛中所使用化學品相關的化學理論，進一步連結到學生在現場時會遇到的實際案例，解釋所觀察到的化學反應現象。
description.en: The applications of vehicles include many chemical reactions, such as the use of paint spraying and coatings. To understand the operation principle and to develop special chemical function, it is necessary to have knowledge of general chemistry, organic chemistry, polymer chemistry and coatings. This course aims at teaching key chemical concepts, introduces chemical theories related to chemicals used in vehicles, further links to actual cases that students will encounter on the scene, and explains the chemical reaction phenomena observed.

notes: 車輛四、日、職車輛所、技優專班三合開

description.zh: 本課程以落地產業應用技術𠏉主題，導入德國工業大學任務導向學習模式，課程教導學生從建置雲端資料庫伺服器到撰寫三機一體網頁控制程式進行工廠 CPS 產銷戰情資訊管理系統，串聯工廠人機物料及生產線與品管，並實務教導開發 AI 瑕疵檢測模型，再利用人機操控 PLC 達到機聯網，進行工廠整廠資訊連線。
description.en: The theme of this course is industrial application technology, and it introduces the task-oriented learning model of the German University of Technology. The course teaches students from building a cloud database server to writing a three-in-one web control program for factory CPS production and sales information management system, connecting factories Human-machine material, production line and quality control, and practical teaching and development of AI defect detection model, and then use human-machine control PLC to achieve machine networking, and conduct factory-wide information connection.

name.zh: 數位製造結合 AI 科技應用 (二)
name.en: Digital manufacturing integrated with AI technology application II

notes: 機械三四甲乙丙合開，限 60 人

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。本課程目的在介紹蓬勃發展中的微機電系統 (micro-electro-mechanical systems, MEMS) 工程與最新應用。其內容包括 : MEMS 之概念與特性、微觀設計原則、跨領域模擬分析、加工材料分類、主要製程技術介紹、CMOS-MEMS 整合製造、封裝與測試技術、微感測器與微致動器、智慧型元件與 SOC、工程應用實例介紹
description.en: The course contents include concept and characteristics of MEMS, principles of micro system design, inter-disciplinary simulation and analysis, materials for MEMS, main-stream MEMS processing technologies, CMOS-MEMS process integration, package and test techniques, micro sensors and actuators, smart devices and SOC, and closure with a number of engineering applications.

notes: 機械三甲乙合開，限 40 人

description.zh: 本課程主要在介紹綠色科技及其在二十一世紀對人類生活的影響，內容包括現今幾個最重要的「潔能」與「節能」科技，以及一些「環保」相關科技。「潔能科技」包括風力能、太陽能、水力能、地球內部能源、生質能、路面能、聲音能、燃料電池、電動車等；「節能科技」包括節能住宅、變頻空調等；「環保科技」則包括碳回收主題。介紹內容包括各項技術原理介紹及其發展概況。
description.en: This course aims to introduce green technologies and their influences on human life in the 21st century. The contents consist of the most important topics about the clean energy and energy conservation technologies. The clean energy technology consists of wind energy, solar energy, hydraulic energy, earth interior energy, bioenergy, roadway energy, sound energy, fuel cell, electric vehicles, and so on. The energy conservation technology consists energy save buildings, variable frequency air-condition, etc.. The environmental protesting technology includes carbon recapture etc.. This course will talk the technical principles and their general developing situations.

notes: 機械三四甲乙丙合開，限 70 人

description.zh: 3D 列印（英語：3D printing），又稱加法製造、積層製造（Additive Manufacturing，AM），可指任何列印三維物體的過程。3D 列印主要是一個不斷添加的過程，在電腦控制下層疊原材料。3D 列印的內容可以來源於三維模型或其他電子資料，其列印出的三維物體可以擁有任何形狀和幾何特徵。本課程將介紹其原理及配合實機操作，使學生能對 3D 列印技術有正確的認識。(本課程鼓勵學生參加經濟部 iPas 的 3D 列印工程師考試)
description.en: 3D printing, also known as additive manufacturing (AM), refers to processes used to create a three-dimensional object in which successive layers of material are formed under computer control to create an object. Objects can be of almost any shape or geometry and are produced using digital model data from a 3D model or another electronic data. This course will introduce the principle knowledge of 3D printing and giving the opportunity to practice the use of 3D Printing.

name.en: The theory and practice of 3D Printing

notes: 機械四甲乙丙合開，含億光 4F 的 IPAS 考場實作，限 30 人

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意瞭解原子結構乃是起碼的科技素養，本課程主要的目的是建立學生將來可以以 X 光作為研究工具的能力。本課程主要可分成四部份：一是結晶學原理、二是 X 光繞射的原理、三是 X 光繞射的基本應用、四是材料的結構分析。除此之外，並將進行一小部份實驗以驗證學理，同學可從實驗中學習檢驗製程中材料所發生問題，從而解決製造的問題。
description.en: Topics covered include properties of X-rays, geometry of crystals, directions of diffracted Beams, intensity of diffracted beams, orientation and quality of single crystals, structure of polycrystalline aggregates, determinations of crystal structure, phase diagram determination, and Experiments.

notes: 限 25 人

description.zh: 本課程主要介紹奈米結構材料之合成及其製程技術。內容大綱包括三部分：第一、奈米材料基本物理與化學特性，第二、奈米粉末和薄膜結構材料之化學合成，物理合成製程原理與特性，奈米塊體材料的性能與製備，第三、奈米結構材料應用。
description.en: This course is divided into three sections. The first four chapters deal with those chapters which are the principles of nanostructured Material. The next two chapters describe the engineering options currently available for the synthesis, processing and fabrication of nanostructured materials. The last two chapters deal with different application of nanostructured materials.

notes: 製科所必選課程之一，限 50 人

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。以 C 語言為主的計算機應用程式設計，得包含：人機界面程式、即時多工程式、輸出入界面程式、多媒體程式、通訊及網路程式。
description.en: Computer programming using C language: programming of human-machine interface, real-time multi-task programming, input/output interface programming, multimedia programming, communicational and network programming.

notes: 機械二甲乙合開，限 45 人

description.zh: 先修課程：3001051 或負責教授同意。本課程係以商用繪圖 CAD 軟體（如 TCAD 或 ACAD 等）為教學範本、內容包括二維製圖、三維製圖、修訂功能表、命令腳本（Script）以及圖組 (Block)、圖形功能表等之製作，以輔助機械製圖為主要目標。
description.en: Use commercial CAD softwares (e.g.: Turbo CAD or Auto CAD) as the tutorial examples for Mechanical Drawings, including 2-D and 3-D drawings, to edit and modify the Menu, Script and Block etc..

notes: 計中電腦教室，機械一甲乙合開，限 45 人，智動科新聘專案

description.zh: 本課程涵蓋的範圍包括基礎的雷射物理與工程、雷射光束的傳播、高斯雷射光束、光學共振腔的原理、設計與分析等等。內容包含：1. 基本光學  2. 雷射基本原理  3. 各種雷射介紹  4. 雷射動態特性  5. 雷射的應用
description.en: The lectures will cover the fundamental aspects of laser physics and engineering of lasers of all kinds, including ray tracing, Gaussian beams, principles of the optical cavities design and analysis...etc. The lecture outline is as follows:1.Basic optics  2. Laser principles  3. Specific types of lasers  4. Laser dynamics  5. Laser applications

notes: 限 50 人，一般教室

description.zh: 先修課程：3002013 或負責教授同意。簡易連桿組之合成（圖解法與解析法）、耦曲線在設計上之應用、同耦曲線族、機構之靜力與動力分析、轉子之平衡、機構之平衡、飛輪設計、引擎動力學與平衡、凸輪動力學、臨界轉速、球面與空間連桿組之簡介。
description.en: Synthesis of Four-bar linkage (Graphical and Analytical Method) , Application of Coupler careers in Design , coupler cognate Mechanisms static and dynamic analysis of Mechanisms. Balancing Rotating Masses, Flywheels, Balancing Reciprocating Masses, dynamics of Cams, critical Whirling speeds, Introduction of spherical and spatial linkages.

notes: 機械三甲乙丙合開，限 50 人

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。導論（含系統概論、資料表示法）、微電腦結構－中央處理單元、組合語言－指令型定址法、模組化程式、位元組和字串處裡、I/O 程式、DOS 功能常式、多元程式規劃、系統匯流排結構、I/O 介面、半導體記憶、多元處裡器組態。
description.en: Introduction (Overview of Microprocessor System, Data Representation), Microprocessor Architecture-CPU etc., Assembler Language-Instruction Format, Addressing Modes, Modular Programming, Byte and String Manipulation, I/O Programming, DOS Function Multiprogramming, SystemBus Structure, I/O Interface, Semiconductor Memory, Multiprocessor Configurations.

notes: 機械二甲乙和機電二合開，限 30 人，須先修數位電路

description.zh: 控制理論及應用簡介、線性空間及線性運算子、線性動態方程式及反應、可控制性可觀測性及穩定性、狀態回授及狀態預估、多變數 I/O 控制器設計及應用。
description.en: Introduction, Linear spaces and linear operators, linear dynamic equations, controllability, observability, stability analysis, state feedback and state prediction, multi-input multi-output systems, controller design and application.

notes: 限 21 人

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意介紹雷射加工之理論及實務，注重製程參數之研究，教導學生如何掌握製程，以達到精密製造的要求。內容包括雷射輔助製造程序、雷射加工設備、雷射加工原理、系統分析、實驗設計、雷射加工實例。
description.en: Introducing theory and practice of laser material processing. Emphasizing the study of manufacturing factors. Letting the students know how to control manufacturing process, and fulfill the demand of precision manufacturing. The course content is : laser assisted manufacturing processes, facilities for laser material processing, the principles of laser material processing, system analysis, examples of laser material processing.

notes: 機電所和製科所合開，限 22 人

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意本課程介紹有限元素分析法基本原理及其在各種工程問題上之應用。1. 有限元素分析法之基本觀念 2. 利用變分原理建立有限元素模式 3. 形狀函數及等參數元素 4. 一維問題：桿、桁架、樑及骨架等 5. 二維問題：平面應力應變及板殼問題。6. 三維問題：一般實體 7. 有限元素分析之計算機程式處理 8. 有限元素分析於動態問題之應用 9. 相關有限元素分析套裝軟體簡介
description.en: To introduce the basic principle of the finite element analysis and its application in solving various types of engineering problems.1. Introduction to the basic concepts of the finite element analysis2. Formulation of the finite models through the use of variational principles3. Shape functions and isoparametric elements4. One dimensional problems: rod, truss, beam, frame, etc.5. Two dimensional problems: plane stress, plane strain and plate, etc.6. Three dimensional problems: typical solids7. Implementation of the FEM computation by computer8. Finite element applications in dynamic problems9. Survey of some finite-element software systems

notes: 製科所必選課程之一 / 製科所、機電博和外生班合開

description.zh: 先修課程：3002010 或負責教授同意。晶體結構、鋼之變態、相平衡原理、退火與正常化、淬火與回火、表面硬化處理、構造用鋼、工具鋼、其它鋼料及鑄鐵之熱處理。
description.en: The contents of this course can be categorized as followings: 1. fundamental metallographic concepts.2. The effects of alloying elements in steel.3. Hardenability 4. General heat treatment processes: annealing, hardening, tempering, and normalizing. 5. Special heat treatment process : tool steels hardening and tempering. Quenching and tempering of constructional steels, case hardening, nitriding, carbonitriding, induction hardening, and flame hardening.

notes: 機械三甲乙丙合開，限 39 人

description.zh: 現代控制理論簡介、線性空間分析、狀態方程式及響應、可控制性及可觀測性、穩定性分析、狀態回授及估測、控制器設計及應用、觀測。
description.en: Introduction of Modern Control Theory﹒Linear space Analysis, State equation and Response, Controllability and Observability, Stability Analysis, State Feedback and Estimation, Controller Design and Applications, Observer Design and Applications, Nonlinear systems, Time varying Systems, Applications of Modern Control theory.

notes: 限 50 人

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。使學生瞭解如何由自動控制理論與概念，轉化成控制系統的實務設計與實踐。課程內容包括：機構、致動器、感測器、與控制器等元件及其整合技術介紹，配合 LabView + myRIO 及周邊設備進行控制系統實務設計與測試，使同學由實驗中體會與培養控制系統的實務設計能力。
description.en: The object of the course is to let students understand how to transform the theory and concept of automatic control into a design and practice for a control system. Course contents include: introduction to mechanism, sensors actuator and controller elements, as well as the needed integration technique. LabView + myRIO and peripheral devices are used in the course to design a practically useful controller and to verify its effectiveness. Students therefore can gain the practical controller design experience via this learning by doing approach。

name.en: Design and Practice of  Control System

notes: 機械三甲乙丙合開，限 24 人

description.zh: 本課程主要概括性介紹分為三部分：第一、奈米基本理論－介觀物理奈米微粒、奈米碳管與奈米線、奈米薄膜的結構特性、奈米塊體材料的性能等；第二、奈米加工與檢測；第三、奈米材料之應用。
description.en: This course is divided into three parts. Part 1: the fundamental of nanostructure materials. The topics include: nanoparticles, carbon nanotube, nanowire, nanostructure coating, bulk materials, etc. Part 2: fabrication of nanomaterials. The topics include: self-assembled, scanning probe microscope. The measurement of nanomaterials include scanning probe microscope, scanning tunneling microscope, Raman spectroscopy, etc. Part 3: the state-of-the art review the application of nanomateria.

notes: 機械四甲乙丙合開，限 50 人

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。1. 超音波技術簡介 2. 基礎彈性力學 3. 彈性動力學 4. 平面波 5. 平面波的反射 6. 平面波的折射 7. 表面波 8. 藍姆波 (平板波) 9. 超音波於非破壞檢測之應用 10. 超音波於材料性質量測之應用 11. 超音波於醫學診斷與治療之應用 12. 超音波於感測器及通訊應用之應用 13. 超音波於加工應用之應用
description.en: 1.Introduction to ultrasonics 2.Basic elasticity for ultrasonics 3.Elastodynamics 4.Plane waves 5.Reflection of plane waves 6.Refraction of plane waves 7.Surface waves 8.Lamb waves 9.Ultrasonics in nondestructive testing  10.Application of ultrasonics to material characterizations 11.Application of ultrasonics in medical diagnostics and treatments 12.Application of ultrasonics to sensors and telecommunications 13.Application of ultrasonics to machining

notes: 製科所必選課程之一 / 機電所和製科所合開，限 25 人

description.zh: 本課程探討人工智慧 (AI) 與工程應用相關議題，並討論其解決方案與技術發展趨勢。內容由淺入深，包含基礎 python 程式設計、資料預處理、資料探索、機器學習、深度學習、AI 工程應用介紹 (分子性質預測、設備預測性維護、混凝土強度預測，PM2.5 預測、房價預測等案例應用分析) 及專題製作。在本課程中，學生可了解 AI 之基本原理及 AI 在工程上的應用，本課程也藉由 AI 程式撰寫的實作實習，提昇工程背景學生撰寫與理解 AI 應用程式設計的技能，以幫助學生將人工智慧導入產業應用實務中。
description.en: This course will introduce artificial intelligence (AI) and its applications in engineering fields. Topics covered include basic python programming, data prepossessing, data exploration, machine learning, deep learning, AI applications in engineering fields (e.g. predicting molecular properties, predictive maintenance predicting compressive strength of concrete, prediction of PM2.5, and prediction of house price, etc.) and final project. Students can learn about the basic principles and engineering applications of AI. Coding will be required to improve their programming competence in AI. The course intends to help the students implement AI concepts in their industrial practices.

name.zh: 人工智慧與工程應用實作
name.en: Artificial Intelligence for Engineering Applications in Practice

notes: 大研合開

description.zh: 本課程探討人工智慧 (AI) 與工程應用相關議題，並討論其解決方案與技術發展趨勢。內容由淺入深，包含基礎 python 程式設計、資料預處理、資料探索、機器學習、深度學習、AI 工程應用介紹 (分子性質預測、設備預測性維護、混凝土強度預測，PM2.5 預測、房價預測等案例應用分析) 及專題製作。在本課程中，學生可了解 AI 之基本原理及 AI 在工程上的應用，本課程也藉由 AI 程式撰寫的實作實習，提昇工程背景學生撰寫與理解 AI 應用程式設計的技能，以幫助學生將人工智慧導入產業應用實務中。
description.en: This course will introduce artificial intelligence (AI) and its applications in engineering fields. Topics covered include basic python programming, data prepossessing, data exploration, machine learning, deep learning, AI applications in engineering fields (e.g. predicting molecular properties, predictive maintenance predicting compressive strength of concrete, prediction of PM2.5, and prediction of house price, etc.) and final project. Students can learn about the basic principles and engineering applications of AI. Coding will be required to improve their programming competence in AI. The course intends to help the students implement AI concepts in their industrial practices.

name.zh: 人工智慧與工程應用實作
name.en: Artificial Intelligence for Engineering Applications in Practice

notes: 大研合開

description.zh: 先修課程：3002015 或負責教授同意。認識標準與規範、規範的應用、軸承設計實務、密封裝置設計、移位齒輪、潤滑設計實務、旋轉機件的慣性及啟動問題、驅動元件之選用。
description.en: Introduction to Standards and Codes, Practice of Bearing Selection, Seal Design, Shifted Gears, Practice of Lubrication Design, Mass Moment of Inertia and flywheel effects, and Driving Device Selection.

notes: 機械三甲乙丙合開，限 40 人

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。1. 應力、應變、能量、及失效。2. 厚壁圓筒。3. 圓盤對稱彎曲。4. 撓曲、反力、及能量法。5. 扭轉。6. 非對稱彎曲、剪力中心、及薄壁梁。7. 曲梁。8. 塑性崩潰、及極限分析。9. 梁 - 柱、挫曲、及非線性。
description.en: 1. Stress, strain, energy, and failure. 2. Thick-walled cylinders. 3. Symmetric bending of circular plates.  4. Deflection, reactions, and energy methods. 5. Torsion. 6. Unsymmetric bending, shear center, and thin-walled beams. 7. Curved beams. 8. Plastic collapse and limit analysis. 9. Beam-columns, buckling, and nonlinearity.

notes: 機械四甲乙丙合開，限 50 人

description.zh: 工程分析概論，有限元素模型建立，進階模組技巧，實體模型的建立，一維元素分析，二維元素分析，三維元素分析，進階範例。
description.en: Introduction to Engineering Analysis, Finite Element Model Constructing, Advanced Techniques of Module, Solid models  Constructing, One-dimensional Analysis, Two-dimensional Analysis, Three-dimensional Analysis, Advanced Examples.

name.zh: 電腦輔助工程分析及實習
name.en: Computer Aided Engineering Analysis and Lab.

notes: 機械四甲乙丙合開，限 24 人

description.zh: 本課程主要探討本課程主要探討智慧生活科技相關議題。這是一門整合不同領域的新興課程，透過最新論文的閱讀與研討，學習智慧生活科技。
description.en: The goal of the course is to provide students with topics related to smart living technologies. In this course, we will take an interdisciplinary look at smart living topics and ubiquitous computing by reading and discussing recent literature.

name.en: Research Topics in Smart Living Technologies

description.zh: 全球化製造體系的形成，使得合約製造商必須以更積極的態度，從策略面出發，藉由各種電腦與網路的技術，整合內部與外部的流程與資訊，打造數位化工廠。數位化製造的目的，是希望藉由資訊透明化，提升整個製造體系的競爭優勢。課程的設計，是以概念介紹的方式，說明數位製造的應用現況與相關技術。本課程的內容包括：數位化製造概論、數位化製造實例說明、商業模型分析、知識管理、企業知識入口網站、產品資料管理、交易系統、資料倉儲、企業資訊入口網站、工作流程管理、最新數位化相關技術介紹。
description.en: Globalization has lead contract manufactures more active on seeking new strategies to survive. To increase competition, new technologies, such as computer and network technology, have applied. Computer and network technology can integrate internal and external information to establish a so-called "e-factory." This course covers different issues related to e-Manufacturing, such as Concept of e-Manufacturing, Case Study, Business Model Analysis, Knowledge Management, Enterprise Knowledge Portal (EKP), Product Data Management (PDM), Concept of Trading Systems, Concept of Data Warehousing, Enterprise Information Portal (EIP), Workflow Management, State of the Art Technologies, etc.

notes: 製科所必選課程之一 / 限 30 人

description.zh: 全球化製造體系的形成，使得合約製造商必須以更積極的態度，從策略面出發，藉由各種電腦與網路的技術，整合內部與外部的流程與資訊，打造數位工廠。數位製造的目的，是希望藉由資訊透明化，提升整個製造體系的競爭優勢。課程的設計，是以概念介紹的方式，說明數位製造的應用現況與相關技術。本課程的內容包括：數位製造概論、數位製造實例說明、商業模型分析、企業知識入口網站、產品資料管理、交易系統、資料倉儲、企業資訊入口網站。
description.en: Brief: Globalization has lead contract manufactures more active on seeking new strategies to survive. To increase competition, new technologies, such as computer and network technology, have applied. Computer and network technology can integrate internal and external information to establish a so-called "e-factory." This course covers different issues related to e-Manufacturing, such as Concept of e-Manufacturing, Case Study, Business Model Analysis, Knowledge Management, Enterprise Knowledge Portal (EKP), Product Data Management (PDM), Concept of Trading Systems, Concept of Data Warehousing, Enterprise Information Portal (EIP), Workflow Management, State of the Art Technologies, etc

notes: 機械四甲乙丙合開，限 50 人

description.zh: 本課程為本校「智慧鐵道學程」的進階基礎課程。課程開授之目標，是希望藉由先進智慧鐵道系統的介紹，使修課學生能夠清楚瞭解鐵道產業的未來發展方向，並引領學生積極投入各種先進智慧鐵道應用系統之研究。本課程是以同時段合院授課的方式、針對選讀學程之學生、邀請智慧鐵道系統相關、學有專精的技術研發人員、以業師的身份共同參與授課。本課程會要求修課同學於期末報告時進行實作系統的展示，並邀請鐵道產業專家擔任評審。修習本課程前，不同學系之學生須先修習的課程清單另訂定之。
description.en: This course is one of the advanced core courses for the Intelligent Railway Curriculum. The aim of this course is, via the introduction of advanced intelligent rail system, to have the students realize thoroughly the development trend of futuristic rail industry, and subsequently, to encourage the students into the research and development of various application systems for intelligent railway. This course is a joint lecture among departments inside our college with synchronized class hours. The industrial instructors to our participant students include R&D experts from relevant fields in intelligent rail industry. In their term reports, the students will have to demonstrate the prototypes of their projects and to be reviewed by the invited senior professionals from rail industry. The prerequisites for taking this course will be determined based on the background of students with different majors.

notes: 機械三四甲乙丙合開，限 50 人

description.zh: 先修課程：3001051 或負責教授同意。本課程係以商用繪圖 CAD 軟體（如 TCAD 或 ACAD 等）為教學範本、內容包括二維製圖、三維製圖、修訂功能表、命令腳本（Script）以及圖組 (Block)、圖形功能表等之製作，以輔助機械製圖為主要目標。
description.en: Use commercial CAD softwares (e.g.: Turbo CAD or Auto CAD) as the tutorial examples for Mechanical Drawings, including 2-D and 3-D drawings, to edit and modify the Menu, Script and Block etc..

notes: 限 45 人

description.zh: ECA 課程專為大一非英語母語的學生設計，加強英語語言技能，特別強調溝通能力和社會、文化、及專業實務應用。 通過整合四種語言技巧能力（閱讀、聽力、口語和寫作），將課堂英語文教學連結至與實務溝通情境之英語文使用。以下為課程設計及教學法之主軸：溝通語言教學（CLT）、任務型導向（TBL）和內容導向教學（CBI），培養學生的英語語言能力為進階專業英文之基礎。
description.en: The ECA courses are designed for the first-year (freshman), non-native English speaking students to strengthen their English language skills, with particular emphasis on communicative competence and practical application in social, cultural and professional contexts. By integrating the four skills (reading, listening, speaking and writing), the primary objective is to connect the classroom ELT with the real-life communicative situations. To that end, the courses adopt the following approaches: communicative language teaching (CLT), task-based learning (TBL), and content-based instruction (CBI), building a holistic pedagogy to English instruction and developing students’ English language proficiency for the next level ESP courses.

name.en: English Communication and Application II (ECA Courses)

notes: 高級 1

description.zh: 本課主旨在培養學生職場英語文溝通能力，如提案、企劃案提寫、時事討論、公司產品行銷、書信寫作，希冀能夠藉由本課程之修習，加強學生進入職場前的競爭力。
description.en: This course is designed to provide students with a firm foundation in business communication skills. Students will learn how to present a proposal, start a discussion, and promote company products in English. It is hoped that by the end of this course, students are equipped with sufficient knowledge of general and business English.

class.name: 專業職場英文銜接計畫

notes: ◎無法計入英文畢業門檻

description.zh: 本課主旨在設計課程，提供練習，俾使學生嫻熟各式的英語測驗，如全民英檢、托福測驗、TOEIC 測驗或類似性質的測驗，希冀能夠藉由本課程的修習，提升學生不斷的學習外國語的興致，並且，藉由通過考試取得證照，增加未來職場的競爭力。
description.en: This course is designed to familiarize the students with various kinds of language proficiency tests such as GEPT, TOEFL, TOEIC and many others to the same end. It is our hope that the students who finish taking the course will go on with their enthusiasm on studying foreign languages; besides, through the acquisition of the certificate when the students pass the tests, they are sure to enhance their capability in the increasingly competitive job markets.

name.en: Course in English language Proficiency Tests

class.name: 專業職場英文銜接計畫

notes: 以 CEFR B1 為目標，新制多益
