description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。材料性質、製程與結構之關係、機械基礎 - 彈性行為、塑性基本理論。冶金基礎 - 單晶的塑性變形、差排理論、強化機構、材料的破壞。
description.en: Mechanical Fundamentals: Introduction, stress and strain relationships for Elastic Behavior, Elements of the theory of Plasticity, etc.. Metallurgical Fundamentals: Plastic Deformation of Single Crystal, Dislocation Theory, Strengthening Mechanism, Fracture, etc..

notes: 機械四甲乙丙合開，限 39 人

description.zh: 本課程將教導學生韓文字母結構、發音方法及基礎詞彙、文法與句型、韓國現況及文化等，透過文化與語言的習得，培養學生與韓籍人士溝通或在韓國生活所需要的最基本的溝通能力。
description.en: This course aims to introduce beginners to basic spoken and written skills in Korean. Students will develop basic skills with a focus on effective communication and enjoyment through listening, speaking, reading and writing. By the end of the course, students will be able to hold a simple conversation in Korean, comprehend basic Korean texts and write about their everyday lives.

name.en: Development of global perspective: Korean I

description.zh: 課程藉由傳授馬來西亞語言以協助學生拓展東南亞的就業版圖，旨在培養學生的馬來西亞語基本溝通能力，運用馬來語與當地母語者打招呼、了解馬來文化、建立人際關係、購物、敘述事物等，以此來協助學生前往馬來西亞就業，作為兩國的經濟橋樑。
description.en: In order to embrace economic development of globalization, especially in Asian and Southeast Asian countries, there is a need to introduce and equip our students not only with the basic local language but also to understand the local culture so as to strengthen the economic tie between Taiwan and the Asian countries and to enhance the employment opportunities of our students in these Asian countries. This course aims to help students to understand and develop basic communication skills by utilizing Bahasa Malaysia (Malaysian language) to communicate with Malaysian in terms of greeting, business contact establishment, interpersonal communication, etc. Historical and geographical backgrounds of Malaysia and their local cultures will also be introduced.

name.zh: 國際觀培養：馬來文化與語言
name.en: Emerging Market Series: Getting to know Malaysia

description.zh: 本課程使學生具有基礎德語能力，並加強會話及閱讀能力訓練。
description.en: The focus of this course is to enable students to have basic German abilities and to strengthen the training or drilling of conversation and reading comprehension of the German language.

name.en: Feast for the global perspective: German Ⅰ

description.zh: 本課程為基礎法文，主要是幫助學生學習從字彙，文法，到日常會話的法文能力。
description.en: This class introduces basic French vocabulary, grammar, and conversation to the students.

name.en: Feast for the global perspective: French Ⅰ

description.zh: 本課程為法文一的進階課程，將持續就字母結構、發音方法及基礎詞彙、文法與句型、法國現況及文化等，透過文化與語言的習得，培養學生與法語系人士溝通或在法國生活所需要的最基本的溝通能力。
description.en: This course aims to introduce beginners to basic spoken and written skills in French. Students will develop basic skills with a focus on effective communication and enjoyment through listening, speaking, reading and writing. By the end of the course, students will be able to hold a simple conversation in French, comprehend basic French texts and write about their everyday lives.

name.en: Feast for the global perspective: French II

notes: ◎第一週共同確認程度後完再人工簽核

description.zh: 為了迎接全球化的亞洲國家與東南亞國家之間的經濟發展，藉由傳授印尼語言，讓學生掌握印尼語同時也了解印尼文化作為兩國的經濟橋樑，以此來協助學生前往印尼就業。本課程是培養學生的溝通能力，以運用印尼語來跟印尼母語者打招呼、建立人際關係、購物、敘述事物… 等。
description.en: In order to embrace economic development of globalization, especially in Asian and Southeast Asian countries, there is a need to teach Indonesian (Bahasa Indonesia) and equip students not only with the language but also to understand the culture as an economic bridge between the two countries. And, it is hoped that assisting students in employment in Indonesia. This course will aim to help students to develop communication skills by utilizing Indonesian language to speak to native speakers in terms of greeting, business contact establishment, interpersonal communication, and descriptive usage…etc.

name.zh: 國際觀培養：印尼文化與語言
name.en: Development of global perspective:Indonesian culture and language

description.zh: 1. 在臺灣與東南亞交流日益增加的情況下，東南亞語言的學習需求也會隨之提高。而「泰國」所擁有的社會經濟條件優勢，以及泰國政府有意推動的文化創意產業，相信也將為臺灣帶來一陣「泰語學習風潮」。 2. 課程以培養基礎泰語溝通能力、激發學習泰語興趣，以及跨文化理解為宗旨。課程架構包括泰國語言教學及元化議題討論，使其在具備泰語溝通基本實力之外，更能對泰國各方面情勢與文化、思想、禮節、風俗習慣、宗教禁忌等，都具有深度認識。 3. 泰語教學方面，秉持聽、說、讀、寫同時並進的教學理念，由字母的發音、寫法、唸法、聲調、順序及拼字系統的學習開始，奠定良好的泰語基礎，搭配最常用的單字、句型、文法與日常實用會話，使學生可以拼寫、閱讀泰文短文，並能以泰語進行日常對話。 4. 泰國文化方面，以專題的方式，講述政治、經濟、社會、地理、歷史與文化等各個層面的泰國，呈現出不同於一般刻板印象中的泰國，培養學生對泰國的正確認識及態度。本學期先針對泰國目前的經濟與文化面進行概說；下學期則探討泰國歷史、地理、政治與社會。
description.en: 1. With the interaction between Taiwan and Southeast Asia getting more and more frequent, the need for learning Southeast Asian languages has been highly increasing. Thailand owns the advantages of social economy; moreover, Thailand government intends to promote cultural creativity industries. Hence, learning Thai definitely becomes a new trend in Taiwan. 2. This course aims to help students build the foundation of speaking basic Thai, and arouse students’ interests in learning Thai. Also, it helps students get to know cross-cultural differences. In addition to learning Thai, students have to discuss the issues related to Thai culture. Accordingly, students are not only able to make conversations, but have further understanding of Thai culture, thinking, manners, customs and religious taboos etc. 3. In terms of learning Thai, listening, speaking, reading and writing, these four skills are equally important. Student will be trained to learn all these four skills together. At first, s

name.zh: 國際觀培養：泰國文化與語言 (一)
name.en: Development of global perspective: Thai culture and language I

description.zh: 在全球金融海嘯後，已開發國家經濟成長趨緩，新興亞洲國家 - 東協國家經濟成長迅速，本課程將以越南語教學為主，越南經貿、觀光文化及越語字母拼音教學，讓學生在學習越語的同時，深入了解越南文化，協助學生拓展東南亞的就業版圖。
description.en: This series of courses aim to provide students with opportunities to understand emerging markets in a global context. Global economy in the post-recession world relies heavily on emerging economies, in particular countries in Southeast Asia known as ASEAN. Seeing the greater potential for economic gains and development, we build up the courses from introducing the fundamentals, including but not limited to, their economy, culture, tourism and people with special emphasis on the use of the language for communication along with its relevance to Taiwan as a trading partner.

name.zh: 國際觀培養：越南文化與語言 (二)
name.en: Development of global perspective: Vietnam culture and language II

notes: ◎第一週施測完再人工簽核

description.zh: 本課程提供學生養成基本日語聽說讀寫技能，並能夠面對在各種情境下，表達出適當的日語，足以應付日常生活簡單狀況。此外，並運用多媒體等工具，介紹日本文化，歷史，人文等多種面向，讓學生能更多元地了解日本，有效提升學習興趣及效率。
description.en: This course provides a comprehensive approach to developing the four basic language skills (listening, speaking, reading, and writing) in order to cultivate your overall Japanese language ability to a level sufficient for various occasions and everyday life.In addition , using multimedia to introduce a variety of Japanese culture, history , and humanities. The students can learn more about Japan in many different perspectives, and effectively enhance interest in the learning process.

name.zh: 國際觀培養：日語與文化 (一)

description.zh: 本課程為日語與文化 (一) 之進階課程，提供學生養成進階日語聽說讀寫技能，並能夠面對在各種情境下，表達出適當的日語，足以應付日常生活簡單狀況。此外，並運用多媒體等工具，介紹日本文化，歷史，人文等多種面向，讓學生能更多元地了解日本，有效提升學習興趣及效率。
description.en: This course is designed for students who has basic Japanese knowledge or who passed the language course: Japanese (I) in the previous term. This course provides a comprehensive approach to developing the four basic language skills (listening, speaking, reading, and writing) in order to cultivate your overall Japanese language ability to a level sufficient for various occasions and everyday life. In addition, using multimedia to introduce a variety of Japanese culture, history , and humanities. The students can learn more about Japan in many different perspectives, and effectively enhance interest in the learning process.

name.zh: 國際觀培養：日語與文化 (二)
name.en: Development of global perspective: Japanese Ⅱ

notes: ◎第一週施測完再人工簽核

name.en: Development of global perspective: Vietnam culture and language I

description.en: The focus of this course is to enable students to have intermediate German abilities and to strengthen the training or drilling of conversation and reading comprehension of the German language.

notes: ◎修課者需先行線上檢測，網址詳教學大綱

description.zh: 本課程目的在增進學生英文學術寫作與口語簡報及討論能力，以適應全英語授課環境，內容包括多元化的學術寫作與口說練習活動，並由各類文本中分析並熟練英文句型結構及段落結構；亦包含簡報製作、內容架構以及實用線上資源應用等內容，以增強學生學術英文表達技巧。
description.en: This course is designed for undergraduate students to develop their academic English language skills for success in English-medium courses. Students will be engaged with active participation in a variety of academic writing and speaking activities that they would encounter in real-life academic university lectures and professional workplace environments. Students will also learn the structure, vocabulary, as well as strategies of delivering a successful presentation for academic purposes.

notes: * 第一週施測完再人工簽核，網址詳教學大綱

description.zh: 先修課程：3002014 或負責教授同意。一維及多維穩定態熱傳導及非穩定態熱傳導、對流原理、強迫對流及自然對流經驗和實驗關係式、輻射熱傳遞、凝結與沸騰、熱交換器、熱傳遞中的特殊論題。
description.en: Steady-State Conduction-One Dimension, Steady-State Conduction-Multiple Dimensions, Unsteady-State Conduction, Principles of Convection, Empirical and Practical Relations for Forced-Convection Heat Transfer, Natural- Convection Systems, Radiation Heat Transfer, Condensation and Boiling Heat Transfer, Heat Exchangers, Special Topics in Heat Transfer.

notes: 機械三甲乙丙合開，限 39 人

description.zh: 本課程希望在一學年中，能使學生對微分及積分有充分的瞭解、培養邏輯推理、啟發思考創造、強化計算演繹並注重應用與作圖，以建立同學未來學習工程數學及相關專業課程之數學基礎，充分達到學以致用的目的。課程內容包括：1. 極限與連續，2. 導數及其應用，3. 不定積分與定積分，4. 超越函數及其反函數，5. 積分法則，6. 不定型與瑕積分，7. 定積分的應用，8. 空間幾何與向量微積分，9. 偏導數，10. 重積分，11. 級數。
description.en: This course aims at developing comprehension of Derivation and Integral、activating capabilities of Logic Inference and Induction、enlightening confidence and independence、strengthening calculating abilities with an emphasis on its application and diagram、furnishing a sound basis for future specialty. The content includes: 1.Limits and Continuity, 2.Derivative and Application, 3.Indefinite and Definite Integral, 4.Transcendental Functions and their Inverses, 5.Techniques of Integration, 6.Indeterminate Forms and Improper Integral, 7.Application of Integration, 8.Basic Vector Analysis, 9.Partial Derivative, 10.Multiple Integration, 11.Infinite Series.

notes: ◎限技優學生修習

description.zh: 電腦模擬是解決現今工程問題不可或缺之工具，但常用的商業模擬軟體不但價格昂貴，其功能常不足以應付前瞻研究所需。本課程旨在培養學生設計專業領域之模擬程式與分析工具的能力，強化軟體開發工程實務的素養。課程訓練分兩階段進行：第一階段確認學生具備基本程式設計能力。首先使其熟悉 Linux 平台及開源軟體的使用，運行不須理論基礎的簡易粒子模擬，針對收集到的數據進行統計分析，資料視覺化，資料定量分析及洞察等任務。以任務導向的學習方式，刺激同學針對特定問題和需求而快速擬定演算法，系統性地解決問題。第二階段將模擬工具開發的能力應用在各科系的專業上。在進行短暫的文獻回顧後，與修課學生討論其專業領域中可用模擬解決或加速的學術研究及產業問題。針對主題制定計畫內容後，以選定的程式語言撰寫相關的應用程式，並以開發成開源軟體為最終目標。註一、課程函授上以 GNU Fortran 和 Python3 為主要程式語言選擇，但學生可自由選擇所熟悉的語言作為工具。註二、修課基本條件為修畢工程學院各系一年級程式設計相關之基礎課程，且具基本撰寫程式的能力。
description.en: This course aims to provide complete training for developing modeling and simulation tools in engineering applications. Students will obtain the ability to analyze problems, formulate algorithms, write code, and implement the developed open-source programs in their fields of study. The first part of the training focuses on task-oriented coding experiences. Students will get familiar with the Linux platform and open-source programs. They will perform simple, particle-based simulations. The collected data will be analyzed, visualized, and interpreted based on the programs written by students.The second part of the training applies the coding knowledge to students’ fields of study. After the literature survey, students will select the topic based on theirexpertise, where research or industrial problems can be accelerated by computer modeling. The final goal is to create software based on the course project.

name.en: Development of Simulation Tools  for Engineering

notes: (希望使用 PBL 教室) 大研合開

description.zh: 電腦模擬是解決現今工程問題不可或缺之工具，但常用的商業模擬軟體不但價格昂貴，其功能常不足以應付前瞻研究所需。本課程旨在培養學生設計專業領域之模擬程式與分析工具的能力，強化軟體開發工程實務的素養。課程訓練分兩階段進行：第一階段確認學生具備基本程式設計能力。首先使其熟悉 Linux 平台及開源軟體的使用，運行不須理論基礎的簡易粒子模擬，針對收集到的數據進行統計分析，資料視覺化，資料定量分析及洞察等任務。以任務導向的學習方式，刺激同學針對特定問題和需求而快速擬定演算法，系統性地解決問題。第二階段將模擬工具開發的能力應用在各科系的專業上。在進行短暫的文獻回顧後，與修課學生討論其專業領域中可用模擬解決或加速的學術研究及產業問題。針對主題制定計畫內容後，以選定的程式語言撰寫相關的應用程式，並以開發成開源軟體為最終目標。註一、課程函授上以 GNU Fortran 和 Python3 為主要程式語言選擇，但學生可自由選擇所熟悉的語言作為工具。註二、修課基本條件為修畢工程學院各系一年級程式設計相關之基礎課程，且具基本撰寫程式的能力。

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。技術的關鍵特性和技術之生命週期，企業核心技術、來源和取得，技術的管理與風險，國家科技政策之影響，企業與技術生存之道，全球創新產品之開發，全球創新產品的技術策略與戰略，未來趨勢和走向。
description.en: Technological Innovation: Process, Content, and Types, Organization & Organizing for Innovation, Planning and Discontinuous Innovation, Concurrent Engineering and Interface Management, Human Resource Management, Technology Strategy, Dominant Design, Standard, and Compatibility External R&D and Alliances, Competencies and Knowledge Management in R&D Setting, Design and Product Innovation, Global R&D and Product Development, Industrial Research & Development, Assessment and Performance Appraisal, Perspective.

notes: 限 30 人

description.zh: 本課程目的在於建立學生有關於軟性半導體與元件應用之相關技術與知識，並在學期中讓學生實際動手製備與量測有機半導體元件，以對於有機半導體應用有更深入的認識。課程主題主要 (1) 有機半導體物理介紹；(2) 有機半導體元件製程與封裝技術；(3) 有機發光二極體 (OLED) 元件應用；(4) 有機場效應電晶體應用；(5) 有機太陽能電池；(6) 有機記憶體元件應用；(7) 有機感測器應用；(8) 奈米碳材元件。
description.en: The goal of this class is to build basic knowledge about organic semiconductors and device applications. Students will also learn how to fabricate organic electronics and have further understanding. The main topics of this class include (1) physics of organic semiconductors; (2) device fabrications and processes; (3) organic light-emitting diodes; (4) organic field-effect transistors; (5) organic solar cells; (6) organic memory; (7) organic sensors; (8) carbon nanomaterial devices.

name.zh: 軟性電子材料與元件應用
name.en: Soft Electronic Materials and Device applications

notes: 網路預選限 25 人 (研究所)；大三四化工所合開

description.zh: 本課程在教授學生藥用及化妝用高分子材料之相關產業製程及配方技術的實務知識，課程設計將首先介紹高分子材料的基本合成方法、物理化學性能、界面活性劑、乳化膠體及生物分解安全性。並教授高分子材料之應用區分為兩大類：其一是指在製藥之劑型加工時所用的和為改善藥物傳輸性能而採用的輔助材料 (Excipients)，例如稀釋劑、潤滑劑、黏合劑、崩解劑、助流劑、緩和劑、穩定劑、保濕劑、膜包衣及膠囊殼等。藥用及化妝用輔助材料本身並不具有藥理作用，只是在藥品及化妝品的製造和使用中起從屬或輔助的作用。另一類高分子藥物則不同於前一類，它依靠連接在聚合物分子鏈上的藥理活性基團或高分子本身的藥理作用，進入人體後，能與機體組織發生生理反應，從而產生醫療美容或預防性效果。
description.en: The course is to provide the core knowledge for the development of pharmaceutical and cosmetic technology. It aims to educate and train students with the fundamental principles and applications of biodegradable polymers, surfactants, colloids, emulsions and their related physico-chemical properties. Then potential prospects of pharmaceutical and cosmetic polymers will be taught in two parts to help students understand the future frontiers in polymer science and technology. The first part of lectures will cover the wide range of polymer excipients such as diluents, lubricants, binders, disintegrants, glidants, demulcents, stabilizers, humercants, coatings, and capsules etc, which are inactive pharmaceutical ingredients used for assisting drug delivery. The second part will focus on polymer drugs, which are active pharmaceutical ingredients conjugated to polymer matrices such as polymeric micelles, liposomes, colloidosomes, and solid phase nanoparticle

name.zh: 藥用及化妝用高分子材料

notes: 網路預選限 30 人；大三合開

description.zh: 本課程之重點在於將熱力學機基本定律，應用於較為實際的化工問題上。主要內容包括：熱力學及輸送現象性質之估算方法，氣液相平衡及液液相平衡在分離製程的應用等.
description.en: The objectives of this course are to apply principles of thermodynamics in practical chemical processes. The contents of the curricula are 1) estimation of the thermodynamic and transport properties of fluids and solids, 2) vapor-liquid equilibrium as well as liquid-liquid equilibrium for separation processes application.

notes: 化工三四合開

description.zh: 本課程涵蓋：化妝品實際上是各種學識的利用，除了製造之化學須了解之外，還要知道相關領域的知識，又因皮膚學的發展，對化妝品的安全性、有效性已成為關注的重點。所以有關於化妝品之學識在求學過程有必要更深入的和更專業的了解與討論。化妝品研究的方法、理論依據以及最新的研究結果介紹都是本教學的目的所在。
description.en: This course covers:The cosmetics are the application of knowledge. The students not only learn the manufacturing technology, but also to study the relatively knowledge. Since the development of skin science, the safety and effectiveness of cosmetics were be concerned. According to this reason, the research of cosmetics needs to be studied deeply. The main goals of this course are contained the introduction of research methods, basic theory and the newest studied results.

notes: 網路預選限 45 人；大三合開

description.zh: 本課程目的在於建立學生有關於軟性半導體與元件應用之相關技術與知識，並在學期中讓學生實際動手製備與量測有機半導體元件，以對於有機半導體應用有更深入的認識。課程主題主要 (1) 有機半導體物理介紹；(2) 有機半導體元件製程與封裝技術；(3) 有機發光二極體 (OLED) 元件應用；(4) 有機場效應電晶體應用；(5) 有機太陽能電池；(6) 有機記憶體元件應用；(7) 有機感測器應用；(8) 奈米碳材元件。
description.en: The goal of this class is to build basic knowledge about organic semiconductors and device applications. Students will also learn how to fabricate organic electronics and have further understanding. The main topics of this class include (1) physics of organic semiconductors; (2) device fabrications and processes; (3) organic light-emitting diodes; (4) organic field-effect transistors; (5) organic solar cells; (6) organic memory; (7) organic sensors; (8) carbon nanomaterial devices.

name.zh: 軟性電子材料與元件應用
name.en: Soft Electronic Materials and Device applications

notes: 網路預選限 25 人 (大學部)；大三四化工所合開

description.zh: 介紹化工廠廢棄物對安全、健康、環境之影嚮及化工產品之生命週期評估。舊程序之製程改善及建立完整的廢棄物管理體系，以達廢棄物最少化之目的，新程序之設計則對反應器、分離程序、熱交換器之程序整合及公用設施等，實施源頭減廢及回收，以達潔淨生產之目的。
description.en: Introduction to the safety, health and environmental impact of wastes of chemical process industries and life cycle assessment of chemical engineering products. Waste minimization of existing process through changes in industrial process and setup of waste management hiarachy. For the new process, focus are on the source reduction and recycle of reactors, separators, heat exchange networks and utilities, etc.

notes: 網路預選限 25 人 (大學部); 大三四化工所合開

description.zh: 本課程為培育學生創業與品牌智財管理能力的課程。課程規劃一系列主題講座，邀請不同領域的專家學者組成授課團隊，分享自己的創業與品牌智財管理經驗，著重培養學生的創業管理能力，品牌管理能力與智財管理能力。
description.en: The objective of this course is to develop the management abilities of entrepreneurship, brand, and intellectual property for students. The curriculum is designed to include the special lectures given by the experts in various fields. The lecture will focus on the experience sharing and case studies.

name.en: Management of entrepreneurship, brand, and intellectual property

notes: 網路預選限 20 人 (大學部)；大四化工所合開

description.zh: 製造聯網整合技術配合感測器、控制器、網路系統等，讓人、機器人、原物料、零組件、重要物品或設備，取得人、機、料、法、環的訊息，透過大數據分析與人工智慧，執行各種事前診斷預防、維護、事發處置及事後重建與改善的動作。本課程著重於製造聯網整合技術與實施方法，特別在智能工廠技術包含 IoT、感測器設計與選擇、機電整合、數據分析、預防診斷與維修、智慧適應控制等。
description.en: Integration technology for networking manufacturing systems integrates sensor, controller, networking system, etc.. This technology uses big data analysis and artificial intelligence to communicate among human, robot, raw material, parts, important article or equipment, which can do prediction, protection, and improvement, etc.. This course focuses on integration technology for networking manufacturing systems and its practical implementation. The intelligent factory consists of IoT, design and selection of sensors, integration of electromechanics, data analysis, preventive diagnosis and repair, intelligent adaptive control, etc..

name.en: Integration Technology for Networking Manufacturing Systems

notes: 機械三四甲乙丙合開，限 40 人

description.zh: 課程介紹雲端資訊計算與運用相關技術，使學生對雲端平台、架構、服務、程式設計有一全面性瞭解。課程內容包括： 1. 雲端儲存系統架構、儲存網路與虛擬化技術， 2. 業務持續運作儲存技術，3. 儲存架構安全與管理 ，4. 雲端排程技術、效能與安全，5. 虛擬化資料中心建置 - 虛擬計算、儲存、網路、桌面與應用，6. 雲端服務與管理，7. 雲端運算發展概論與企業應用，8. 大量資料運算及案例分析，9.Hadoop 與 Mapreduce，10. 雲端運算之 SaaS 架構，11. 實習課程與專題計畫。
description.en: This course focuses on information storage management, infrastructure, service management, security, and migration strategy for Cloud computing as well as the practice of cloud application through readings, lectures, and class projects. Course topics include: 1. Storage Networking Technologies and Virtualization, 2. Business Continuity, 3. Storage Security and Management, 4. Cloud Scheduling, Performance and Security, 5. Virtualized Data Center building blocks - Virtual Compute, Storage, Network, Desktop, and Application, 6. Cloud Services and Management, 7. Cloud Computing Overview and Business Application, 8. Big Data Computing and Case Study, 9. Hadoop and Mapreduce, 10. Cloud SaaS, 11. Lab. and Final Project.

description.zh: 探討各種電機特性及工作原理，內容包含：(1) 磁路分析 (2) 電機 - 機械能量轉換 (3) 繞組及氣隙磁動勢 (4) 繞組電感及電壓方程式 (5) 繞組因數 (6) 直流機 (7) 感應機 (8) 同步機。
description.en: Course Title:Electric MachineryDescription:Principles, Construction and Application of transformer,DC motors, DC generators, induction motors, induction generators,synchronous motors and synchronous generators.

description.zh: 本課程欲讓應用英文系學生了解改變社會結構之全球議題與趨勢。特此希望學生在參與討論的過程中，能夠產出對世界有正面效益之改善之道。課堂限制之關係，課程內容將著重於閱讀、答辯，和研討篩選後之報告及新聞，藉以達到上述之目的。
description.en: This course aims to engage English major students in understanding current issues and events taking place in the world that are redefining our global reality and restructuring the world order. A greater goal of such studies of global issues and activities is to urge students to participate in the dialogues and actions to change and to make better of the world. The course content centers on reading, discussing and debating on selected reports and news to uphold all that matters for the aforementioned pursuits.

notes: 大二多元英文上限 22 人 (僅限英文系學生修讀)

description.zh: 本課程將透過閱讀各種文本（包括新聞文章、社論、報告和研究論文）來檢視當代文化中之社會和政治動態。 透過引導學生觀察、分析和理解當代 / 流行文化的複雜性和模糊性是如何與文化傳統同步或是超出文化傳承。本課程將介紹及討論引人入勝的文化故事、事件、議題和趨勢，旨在培養學生的批判性分析能力和文化素養。
description.en: This course examines the social and political dynamics of contemporary culture by reading a variety of texts, including news articles, editorials, reports, and research papers. Students will be guided to observe, analyze and understand the complexity and ambiguity of how contemporary / popular cultural phenomena may move in lockstep with the cultural traditions or fall out of sync in the cultural continuity. The course introduces plenty of fascinating culture stories, event, issues and trends to be studied, aiming to develop students’ critical analysis ability and cultural literacy.

notes: 大二多元英文上限 22 人 (僅限英文系學生修讀)

description.zh: 本課程適合修過工程數學及基礎熱流的大學生選修。使用 Ansys 或其他商用軟體，來計算一維穩態，一維暫態，二維穩態，二維暫態，之熱傳導問題，邊界層之偶合性流場問題，燃燒場之數值計算，電子熱傳相關系統。
description.en: This course is suitable for the undergraduate students who have taken fundamental courses of engineering mathematics and thermofluid sciences.  By using software of Ansys or other CFD packages to compute the one dimension steady, are dimension unsteady, two dimension steady, two dimension unsteady heat conduction problems, boundary layer compling flow's problems, combustion calculations, electronic heat transfer problems.

notes: 機械三甲乙和四甲乙丙合開，，限 30 人

description.zh: 透過自駕車理論與實務的課程講述，以及搭配業師實作經驗分享，除可以使修課同學對自駕車研究有基本概念之外，也可以藉本堂課引發對新興車輛技術研究領域與其實際應用之興趣。本課程涵蓋內容為自駕車軌跡規劃與控制、先進駕駛輔助控制設計、自駕車感知資料處理及物件偵測演算法、及 AI 技術應用於自駕車相關功能設計。本課程根據授課主題搭配實驗單元與期末專題，配合使用 Matlab/Simulink、CarSim、Python、AI ToolBox 等工具軟體，讓修課同學可應用課堂所學來進行自駕車演算法與技術開發，及透過模擬結果分析與驗證。
description.en: This course aims to teach the lessons of autonomous vehicle (AV) theory and practical applications. Moreover, with the experience sharing and cooperative lecturing from industrial experts, students can gain more knowledge about the fundamental concepts of AV research. The course introduces major contents including path planning and tracking control design, advanced driver-assistance systems (ADAS), perception data processing and detection algorithms, and AI-based technologies in the applications of AV. The course will arrange some labs and the term project to provide students, through conducted simulation analysis and verification, with an in-depth understanding of the emerging technology of AV.

description.zh: 本課程開授之目標，在讓修習之學生能將鐵道車輛之工程技術與跨領域設計相互融合，在工程分析面能配合跨領域人文設計之需求，並在人文設計面瞭解工程之規範與要求。本課程內容包括鐵道車輛之系統基本架構、鐵道車輛結構及動態之基本工程分析技術、鐵道車輛車廂之功能性設計、及鐵道人文文化；本課程並配合軌道單位之校外參訪，讓課堂所學能與實務技術融合。本課程是以跨院合授的方式，由鐵道車輛技術研發中心、車輛系、文化事業發展系之師資共同參與授課。
description.en: This course aims to provide students the knowledge of engineering technology and interdisciplinary design for railway vehicles.  Design of railway vehicles should consider both the engineering and interdisciplinary cultural design at the same time.  A designer should consider not only engineering regulations and requirements, but also concepts of cultural design.  This course covers basic introduction of railway vehicle system, basic analysis of vehicle structures and dynamics, vehicle interior and exterior functional design, and railway culture.  The industrial tour in this course helps students to realize the theoretical and practical parts of railway vehicles.  This course is a joint lecture instructed by professional faculties from Railway Vehicle Research Center, Department of Vehicle Engineering, and Department of Cultural Vocation Development.

name.zh: 鐵道車輛技術與跨領域設計
name.en: Engineering Technology and Interdisciplinary Design for Railway Vehicle

notes: 車輛三、四、車輛所合開

description.zh: 本課程開授之目標，在讓修習之學生能將鐵道車輛之工程技術與跨領域設計相互融合，在工程分析面能配合跨領域人文設計之需求，並在人文設計面瞭解工程之規範與要求。本課程內容包括鐵道車輛之系統基本架構、鐵道車輛結構及動態之基本工程分析技術、鐵道車輛車廂之功能性設計、及鐵道人文文化；本課程並配合軌道單位之校外參訪，讓課堂所學能與實務技術融合。本課程是以跨院合授的方式，由鐵道車輛技術研發中心、車輛系、文化事業發展系之師資共同參與授課。
description.en: This course aims to provide students the knowledge of engineering technology and interdisciplinary design for railway vehicles.  Design of railway vehicles should consider both the engineering and interdisciplinary cultural design at the same time.  A designer should consider not only engineering regulations and requirements, but also concepts of cultural design.  This course covers basic introduction of railway vehicle system, basic analysis of vehicle structures and dynamics, vehicle interior and exterior functional design, and railway culture.  The industrial tour in this course helps students to realize the theoretical and practical parts of railway vehicles.  This course is a joint lecture instructed by professional faculties from Railway Vehicle Research Center, Department of Vehicle Engineering, and Department of Cultural Vocation Development.

name.zh: 鐵道車輛技術與跨領域設計
name.en: Engineering Technology and Interdisciplinary Design for Railway Vehicle

notes: 車輛三、四、車輛所合開

description.zh: 室內空氣品質及室內空氣污染對人體之危害、空氣環境汙染物、換氣與通風、檢測方法、污染源診斷、空氣品質控制及改善、國內外法規、管理計劃規劃。含室內空氣污染物之移除技術、室內空氣清淨機原理應用於室內空氣品質之控制。
description.en: Indoor and outside air conditions, air pollutants, fresh air and air conditioning & ventilation, indoor air quality control, management and regulation, indoor air cleaners.

name.zh: 室內空氣品質控制與管理
name.en: Indoor Air Quality Control and management

description.zh: 這門課除了教授傳統企業環境管理及相關實務之外，特別將著重在企業提升如何透過綠色創新來提升綠色競爭力的策略與做法；此外，課程另一重點將會是企業如何透過協助聯合國永續發展目標 (UN SDGs) 的達成，來創造企業的永續競爭力。學生將會深入探究金字塔底層 (BOP) 與創造共享價值 (Creating Shared Value, CSV) 之理論及實務做法，以及成為一個真正永續企業的策略。
description.en: In this course, traditional corporate environmental management and the strategies for improving green competitiveness will be taught. In addition, the strategies of corporate sustainability- how the corporate to create sustainable competitiveness by coping with the 17 goals of UN’s Sustainable Development Goals (UN SDGs) will also be taught. Theories and practices of Bottom of the Pyramid (BOP) and Creating Shared Value (CSV), as well as the strategies of being a true sustainable enterprise will be emphasized in the class.

description.zh: 本課程之主旨在於加強學生對薄膜處理程序之深入了解，以作為進一步對水質管理應用之基礎。薄膜的種類介紹包括薄膜逆滲透、奈米薄膜、超過濾、微過濾、前驅滲透、電透析以及薄膜生物處理。基本理論包括薄膜前處理、質量傳輸、積垢、結構、薄膜阻塞及清理、後處理及實務應用。
description.en: This class will provide graduate student authoritative information on the current knowledge of membrane process for water treatment, including reverse osmosis, nanofiltration, ultrafiltration, microfiltration, forward osmosis, electrodialysis and membrane bioreactor. The theories include pretreatment, mass transfer, fouling, scaling, membrane cleaning, post treatment and practical application.

description.zh: 本課程以講授廢棄物減量與資源回收再利用之相關方法與技術為主，使學生從學習過程中瞭解 4R 之原理，除了相關的法令之外，亦包括：1. 減廢方法與技術 2. 資源化方法與技術 3. 廢棄物再利用方法與技術 4. 廢棄物生命週期之分析 5. 減廢策略與管理體系等
description.en: This course is to introduce the principles of 4R in the waste management. In addition to related regulations, contents of this course include pollution prevention approaches and technology for waste minimization, recovery, and reuse, life cycle analysis, and management policy.

description.zh: 幫助學生認識一般科技文章以及科技論文語法、文體、句子結構等，並加強英文口頭表達之能力。
description.en: This course helps the learners recognize the syntax, style, and organization as far as the papers on technology and technical writings are concerned. Discussions include specific ways to technical presentation and technical writings.

notes: 製科所和機電博班合開，限博士班修習

description.zh: 本課程以深入淺出之方式，介紹與機器學習之相關技術及演算法，目標是修習本課程之學生具有閱讀機器學習相關文獻之基本知識，並能從事相關之實務或電腦模擬實驗之工作，因此本課程著重在廣泛介紹各類之演算法之應用，而非深究少數演算法之深奧數學原理．本課程涵蓋之演算法，包含：最佳化基本知識，隨機最佳化演算法，隨機搜尋，決策樹，隨機森林，類神經網路及深度學習相關演算法，基因演算法，貝氏定理及應用，高斯混合模型，隱藏式馬可夫鍊 (及訓練演算法，支援向量機，線性及邏輯回歸，分群方法，降維方法，提升方法，決策融合技巧，及增強式學習等．
description.en: This introductory course covers most of the techniques and algorithms related to the current trend in the machine learning field. The goal of this course is that students complete this course can read and understand the literature in the machine learning field, and can conduct computer simulations for experiments or apply the techniques to practical problems. Therefore, this course intends to cover a broad range of algorithms with emphasis on applications, rather than to cover only a few algorithms with extensive mathematical treatments. The algorithms covered in this course include: foundations of optiminizations, random search, decision tree,  random decision forests, neural networks and deep learning, genetic algorithm, Bayes' theorem and its applications, Gauss mixture model, hidden Markov model (with its training algorithm), support vector machine, linear and logistic regressions, clustering algorithms, dimension reduction techniques (LDA, PCA, ICA, FA), boosting methods, decision

notes: 資工所和電資外生所合開

description.zh: 資料科學是個跨領域的重要興新學科，其基本知識含括資訊、線性代數、機率與統計等，相關技術可應用在許多領域上，包含教育領域。本課程從學科整體介紹開始，討論資料科學中各主要階段的相關議題：包含資料搜尋擷取、資料整理與問題發想、數理知識回顧與討論、資料分析建模與方法、資料呈現與視覺化等。除課堂上講授與討論外，課程亦著重如何實際應用所學，將使用教育資料並以小組方式進行議題發想與分析實作的學期專題。此外，為強化健全資料視覺呈現課題，在實作專題中課程亦著重學生報告能力的培養，希望培育出全方位的資料科學人才。
description.en: Data science is an emerging interdisciplinary field that explores how to produce or create the valuable information and knowledge from large, multi-typed, or unstructured data and provides effective feedbacks to many applications, including education. The related topics include data processing and computing, data storage, statistics and probability, linear algebra, and data analysis. This course introduces the rapidly growing field, discusses the state-of-art techniques, and provides students with the fundamental related knowledge as well as the ability to use software tools. The major phases on data manipulation- collection, preparation, analytics, and presentation, in data science will be discussed. The training of this course is toward equipping students with the general mindset and the ability to solve problems practically with the learned techniques on educational data with project groups. In addition, the students also need to practice the presentation for the findings and result

name.zh: 資料科學原理與教育數據應用
name.en: Data Science Principles with Applications on Educational Data

notes: 資工所和電資外生所合開

description.zh: 本課程旨在教授學生瞭解雲端環境及物聯網系統架構並進一步教授雲端環境及物聯網安全需求，課程內容除介紹雲端環境及物聯網系統的基本概念外，亦將由 OWASP 的雲端安全及物聯網安全重點進行說明，培養學生有能力分析雲端及物聯網環境中的各式潛在安全威脅，並具備設計與實作具安全防護能力的雲端及物聯網系統。課程內容包含：●雲服務技術簡介●雲服務安全●雲服務資安標準●物聯網技術簡介●工業物聯網潛在威脅●工控資安●物聯網資安檢測●物聯網資安標準●資安安全與隱私保護
description.en: This course aims to guide students understanding cloud environments and IoT systems and their corresponding security requirements. In addition to introducing basic concepts of cloud environment and IoT system, the course contents will focus on OWASP's cloud security and IoT security. All practical techniques will be explained. Students are able to analyze various potential security threats in the cloud and Internet of Things environments, and to learn security protection capabilities for cloud and IoT systems. Course contents including:�P●	Introduction to cloud technologies�P●	Introduction to cloud security�P●	Security standards for cloud services �P●	Introduction to IoT technologies�P●	Potential threats of industrial IoT systems�P●	Industrial Cyber Security introduction�P●	IoT security detection�P●	IoT security standards�P●	Information security and privacy protection

notes: 資工所、電資外生所和資安學程合開

description.zh: 本課程將深入介紹檔案系統與儲存系統之作用原理，課程主軸將涵蓋 1. 輸出 / 輸入設備 2. 磁碟陣列與資料可靠性 3. 檔案系統基礎與設計原理 4. 分散式檔案系統 5. 新興儲存裝置 與 6. 鍵值儲存系統。修習本課程之學生將須要具備下列基礎知識，包含作業系統、C 語言以及基礎 Linux 指令。同時，本課程也將依照課程進展介紹最新的新興儲存裝置、檔案系統與儲存系統之相關研究以及大數據管理等議題。
description.en: This course will detail the working principles and design philosophy of file and storage systems and with prime focus on (1) I/O Devices, (2) RAID and Data Integrity, (3) File system Basics and Designs, (4) Distributed File System, (5) Emerging Storage Devices, (6) Key Value Stores. Please be noted that the knowledge of Operating System, C language, and the use of basic Linux command are required before taking this course. Depending on the current research trends, the course also discusses the latest applied storage topics, especially related to scalable and dependable big data management.

notes: 資工所和電資外生所合開

description.zh: 本課程主要探索分析不實訊息的方法，透過這門課將學習到異常訊息、社交工程、傳播路徑及深度造假等對不實訊息分析的技術，包含語意分析、帳號識別分析及傳播路徑對不實訊息的影響分析。
description.en: This course is mainly to explore the methods of analyzing false information. Through this course, you will learn the techniques of analyzing false information, such as abnormal information, social engineering, propagation path and deep fake, including semantic analysis, account identification analysis and propagation path. Analysis of the impact of false information.

notes: 資工所和電資外生所合開

description.zh: 自主移動式機器人課程提供近年來在移動機器人的研究概況，以及相關的技術開發。本課程將將說明近三十年來領域發展歷史，讓同學了解包括機器人運動學、感測技術、定位與導航技術，以及實際應用的各項近期的進展。
description.en: Autonomous Mobile Robots presents an overview of technologies and methods for mobile robotics research. The specific goals of this course follow: 1. To provide historical context about mobile robotics, primarily over the past 30 years. 2. To enable students to study a chosen, specific mobile robotic technology. 3. To study state-of-the-art mobile robot research in detail.

notes: 資工所和電資外生所合開

description.zh: 實現計算已從傳統地本地端機器獨立完成，進而委託上雲端等服務提供者協力完成。然而隨著資料或應用的授權，相關的計算安全性必須重新被探討。本課程將會從資料的隱密性出發，探討如何使用同態加密法輕鬆完成一個安全的授權計算，進而利用其他輕量化元件 (混淆電路、私密分享) 來取代同態加密並重新設計授權計算協定。接著會轉往定義資料的隱私性，並介紹 k 匿名等去識別化技術，最終帶入現今最嚴謹的差分隱私。透過上述之保有隱私與安全方法，將著名的人工智慧與機器學習演算法導入授權計算之中，重構不同情境的新型態安全計算框架。
description.en: The implementation of computation has been completed independently from the local machine, and then outsourced to the cloud (or some service providers) to complete it. However, with the delegation of data or applications, accordingly the security of such computation must be revisited. This course will start from the data confidentiality, discuss how to use homomorphic encryption to easily complete a secure outsourced computation, and then use other lightweight components (garbled circuit, secret sharing) to replace homomorphic encryption and redesign the secure protocols. Then it will move to define the privacy of data, introduce de-identification techniques such as k-anonymity, and finally bring the most rigorous notion of differential privacy. Through the above-mentioned methods of preserving privacy and security, artificial intelligence and machine learning algorithms are introduced into the outsourced computation to reconstruct a new type of the framework for different scenarios.

notes: 二教 103PBL 教室。資工所和電資外生所合開

description.zh: 1. 醫用電子學之基礎。2. 生醫電物理化學之基礎。3. 人體生理系統與經絡系統介紹。4. 生醫系統電物理化學模型分析。5. 醫用電探針、感測器元件與生物晶片的應用。6. 量測理論與生醫電訊號量測技術。7. 生醫電訊號處理技術。8. 超音波、紅外線、X 光、CT、磁振醫學造影原理與影像處理。9. 醫用電子安全規格製訂。10. 醫用醫療儀器與生化分析儀設計。11.DICOM、HL7 醫療網路資訊系統介紹。12. 中西醫工應用系列介紹。
description.en: 1.Fundamental of medical electronics。2.Fundamental of electro-physiology。3.Introduction to human body system and Meridian system。4.Electronic physics-chemical modeling analysis of   biomedical system。5.Applications of medical electrode、biosensor and biochip。 6.Medical measurement theory and technology。7.Processing technology of biomedical signals。8.Constructing and processing of ultrasound、infrared、X-ray  、CT and MRI Imaging。9.Safety specifications of medical electronic devices。10.Designs of biomed

notes: 機電所和機械外生班合開，限 50 人

description.zh: 1. 台灣海域的地質概述，2. 海域的工程地質調查，3. 不同環境下的風場結構，4. 海流特性的調查與評估，5. 波浪特性的調查與評估，6. 鋼結構施工，7. 風機之運輸與安裝，8. 灌漿工程，9. 離岸變電站與基礎，10. 風機葉片之製作、安裝、維護與維修 11. 海纜鋪設工程 12. 構材防蝕技術 13. 沖刷防治 14 基樁鑽掘與噪音降檢
description.en: 1. Offshore geology description nearby Taiwan, 2. Offshore geotechnical site investigation, 3. Wind farm structures under different environmental conditions, 4. Investigation and evaluation of current properties, 5. Investigation and evaluation of wave properties, 6. Construction of steel structure, 7. Transportation and installation of wind turbines, 8. Grouting engineering, 9. Offshore substation and foundation , 10. Fabrication, installation, maintenance and repair of wind turbine blades, 11. Laying procedures of subsea power cables, 12. Corrosion-proof technologies, 13. Scouring-proof technologies, 14 Pile drilling and noise reduction

name.zh: 離岸風機工程調查與施工
name.en: Engineering investigation and construction for offshore wind turbines

notes: (新聘兼任) 防災所和工程學院 (大) 合開，大學部 20 人

description.zh: 本課程以都市再生理念為中心，講述推動都市再生過程中面對相關文化資產保存議題之理論與實際操作架構。第一部份探討歷史文化保存相關理念手法。第二部份探討各國文化保存再生案例實踐之相關課題與借鏡，第三部份針對台灣本土都市更新過程中面臨歷史文化保存議題深入研討。
description.en: This course regards urban revitalization as the central concept to discuss about the theory & implementation of history & culture conservation issues of urban revitalization. This course consisted of three parts. The first part is considered of relevant concepts & strategies of history and culture conservation. The second part is to survey different implemented examples of history and culture conservation of different country. The third part involves the regional issues by local-oriented issues of Taiwan. A few of cultural conservation topics are introduced to be further interpreted.

name.en: Special topics on urban & culture revitalization

notes: 日職建都所合開

description.zh: 臺灣建築史的發展大約可分成受到漢民族影響的傳統建築，以及日本和西方世界影響的近現代建築，本課程主要探究臺灣近現代建築發展的歷程。本課程係以時間為軸，將台灣近現代建築分為三個主題：(1) 臺灣近現代建築的背景、(2) 臺灣殖民時期、(3) 二次大戰之後的臺灣建築。
description.en: This course mainly discusses the development of modern Taiwanese architecture since the Japanese colonial period. The historical development of Taiwanese architecture could be divided into traditional Han architecture and modern architecture with Japanese and western influences. Based on the timeline, three themes will be introduced: (1) the background of Taiwanese modern architecture, (2) Taiwanese architecture during the colonial period, (3) Taiwanese architecture after the Second World War.

notes: 建築四和建都所合開

description.zh: 都市主義 (Urbanism) 最早可追溯於十九世紀末建築工程師對於空間組織與城市關係的討論，其真正的崛起始於二十世紀初對於集中生產，空間組織網絡與政治經濟市民等都市中新興現象的討論。因日趨複雜化的都市發展與環境巨變的挑戰，九十年代開始陸續出現一系列以都市主義為基盤的跨學科整合性討論，而景觀都市主義 (Landscape Urbanism， 1997) 則在其中扮演相當關鍵的角色。不論是庫哈斯早期在？S/M/L/XL ? 中的批判或瓦爾德海姆在？都市景觀主義讀本？中的宣言，皆引指建築、景觀建築、都市設計與都市計畫學門，已逐漸形成一種彼此跨越亦彼此更新的領域狀態。這般？跨？都市主義架構，使各學門在理論發展與專業實踐上具有更開展性的方法，介入當代與未來的都市環境與城市生活。然而此跨都市主義的學理多在景觀學門的教學範疇內，但在建築專業教育中卻鮮有足夠的涉及與含括。本課程則基於此前提，欲將當代景觀都市主義學理，配合建築與都市主義思作為架構，一方面將景觀都市主義相關論述引入建築學習，另一方面欲擴充建築專業知識之本體，培養學生具有主體性的跨域知識建構。本課程結構以景觀與建築兩學門做為學理核心，同時為強化都市主義的實踐本質，將協同專家與景觀學人共同進
description.en: The term "urbanism" originated in the late nineteenth century with a focus onspatial organization of the city. The emergence of urbanism in the early twentieth century was associated with the rise of industrial distribution, spatial networks and citizenship etc. in the city. After 90’s, there were a series of new academic terms referring to this idea which created a base for interdisciplinary studies amongst related spatial terrains. Landscape Urbanism is regarded as one of the significant design and planning ethos especially in the twenty-first century. In Koolhaas’ early work S/M/L/XL and Waldheim’s representative collection The Landscape Urbanism Reader, they both shared account that architecture, landscape architecture, urban design and planning are moving toward shared form of ?emerging ‘practice. The body of knowledge about Landscape Urbanism has been largely developed within landscape discipline, yet merely in the architectural discourse especially in Taiwan.With such pr

name.zh: 建築與景觀都市主義 研究
name.en: Studies in Architecture and Landscape Urbanism

notes: 建築三和四合開

description.zh: 本課程主要教授在建築上之節約能源設計之理念、技術、法規及案例分析等，授課內容包含：1. 建築節約能源導論 2. 建築能源對策 3. 建築外殼節能設計 4. 建築空調節能設計 5. 建築採光與照明節能設計 6. ENVLOAD 之應用 7. 綠建築之發展 8. 節能案例解說與分析 9. 相關法令解說
description.en: This course is focus on the concept technique law and case study about Energy Conservation Design of Architecture .It major content includes :1. Introduction about Architecture's Energy Conservation.2. Impact of Architecture's Energy Conservation.3. Envelope Design of Architecture's Energy Conservation.4. Air Conditional Design of Architecture's Energy Conservation.5. Lighting and Illumination of Architecture's Energy Conservation.6. Application of Envelope Design.7. Development of Green Architecture.8. Illustration and Analysis of Case study.9. Relative Law and Regulations.

description.zh: 目前建築工程營建產業多賴以圖文資料溝通，文件易有失誤，會提高成本、工期延長、甚至於爭議之狀況。BIM 工具之運用，可有效提升營建產業生產力。各國政府已紛紛推出 BIM 的審照制度，我國近年來於公共工程招標已要求 BIM 技術之整合運用。本課程針對 BIM 運用於建築生命週期中各產業間的介紹及效益、實例分享，並於課程中指導同學針對 BIM 軟體基礎工具使用。
description.en: Architectural engineering construction industry on which 2D graphic data communication, the file is easy to form mistakes, will increase the cost of the extension of time, even controversial situation. The use of Building Information Modeling (BIM) software tools, which can effectively enhance the productivity of the construction industry. Governments around the world have now launched the BIM audit system.In recent years, Taiwan has asked the public works bidding integrate and use of BIM technology. This course focuses on the introduction and effective life cycle of BIM for architectural industry, examples of sharing.  Guidance to students in courses based tool for BIM software.

name.zh: BIM 建築資訊系統概論

notes: 新聘專案教師，全英授課，電腦課

description.zh: 「仿生工程」是生物學到工程技術的觀念轉移，生物系統在上億年的演化驗證後已經達到高效且永續的精緻成果，本課程將介紹仿生工程之最新發展，師法自然將其應用於工程上將帶來革命性的突破。課程內容包含四大主題: (1) 仿生概述、(2) 生物製造技術、(3) 生物高分子與 (4) 生物材料於仿生技術上的應用。
description.en: “Biomimetic Engineering” is a kind of knowledge transferring from biology to engineering technology. After billions of years of evolution, it has been proven that the biological system is highly efficient and sustainable. In this course, the latest progress in Biomimetic Engineering will be introduced. It will bring us revolutionary breakthroughs if we learn from nature and apply it to technology. The topics covered in this course will include (1) an introduction to bioinspiration, (2) biofabrication, (3) biomacromolecules, and (4) biomaterials and their application in bioinspired engineering.

notes: 化工所生化所合開

description.zh: 先修課程：科技日文 I 或具備日文基礎。本課程學習理工科系領域中常用之科學。工程用語以及圖、表、器具、裝置等日文。在暸解文法同時，學習以日文表達科學。工程領域中之特定文體敘述。本課程學習內容約在日本語檢定三級左右。
description.en: Prerequisites: Scientific and technical Japanese I or fundamental Japanese reading ability. Fundamental terminology of science and engineering are explained in Japanese together with expressions of charts, tables, equipment, devices and others. By learning the fundamental Japanese grammar, this lecture provides the framework for understanding the expression of scientific and technical matters in Japanese. The context of this lecture is about level 3 of JLPT.

notes: 機械二甲乙和機電二合開，限 48 人，先修課程科技日文 I

description.zh: 課程內容包括：原理探討：超音波，磁場與磁性，電磁感應與渦電流，輻射線，液體表面現象，材料微結構；方法介紹：磁場檢測法，超音波檢測法，渦電流檢測法，X 光檢測法，液滲法，微奈米檢測 (各種顯微鏡) 等；材料非破壞檢測實驗：導電性材料、磁性材料、陶瓷材料、複合材料之缺陷檢測；結構非破壞檢測實驗：機械零件、以及特定結構之檢測；非破壞檢測影像：電腦數據擷取、數據分析、與影像處理
description.en: Introduce the concepts of following topics, Fundamentals: ultrasonic waves, magnetic field and magnetism, electromagnetic induction and eddy currents, X-rays, penetrants. NDT methods: ultrasonic testing, magnetoscopic inspections, eddy current testing, radiographic technique, penetrants method. NDT of materials: conductive materials, magnetic materials, ceramics, composite materials. NDT of structures: mechanical components, specific structures. NDT images: PC-based data acquisition, data analysis and image process.

name.zh: 材料與結構非破壞檢測
name.en: Non-Destructive Testing of Materials and Structures

notes: 機電所、日職製科所和機電博、博外生班合開，合計限 14

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。生物力學是一門整合醫學與工學的學科。本課程介紹並討論十大主題：(1) 脊椎生物力學、(2) 關節生物力學、(3) 骨折生物力學、(4) 復健生物力學、(5) 運動生物力學、(6) 心血管生物力學、(7) 植入物設計原理、(8) 手術器械設計原理、(9) 矯具設計原理與 (10) 病床與輪椅設計原理。
description.en: Biomechanics is a multi-discipline branch incorporating medicine and mechanics. Ten topics are introduced and discussed in this class: (1) spinal biomechanics, (2) joint biomechanics, (3) trauma biomechanics, (4) rehabilitation biomechanics, (5) sport biomechanics, (6) cardiovascular biomechanics, (7) implant design, (8) instrument design, (9) orthotice design, and (10) sickbed and wheelchair design.

name.zh: 植入物與矯具生物力學

notes: 機電所和製科所合開，限 21 人

description.zh: 先修課程：統計學基礎統計介紹、一因子、二因子、多因子實驗、完全隨機化法、隨機化區集法、拉丁方格法、及直交表、田口式品質工程。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to provide students with methods of promoting experimental efficiency. It may include introduction to basic statistical concepts, one-factor, two-factor, multi-factor experiments, completely randomized design, randomized block design, Latin square, and orthogonal array, Taguchi technique for quality engineering.

notes: 機電所和製科所合開，限 25 人

description.zh: 本課程沿續「積體電路製程先進技術與設備」課程，介紹半導體世代機台開發與製程應用、關鍵元件設計概念與應用，著重科學基礎知識如何應用在半導體產業。
description.en: As an extension of “Processing technology and equipment for advanced semiconductor manufacturing” course, this course focuses on how the scientific knowledge is connected and applied to the real development of tools and introduces the evolution of the design and application of semiconductor tools and key components.

name.zh: 半導體尖端設備與關鍵元件
name.en: Semiconductor advanced equipment and key components

notes: 機電所和製科所合開，請教務處安排教室，限 40 人

description.zh: 先修課程：動態分析與模擬或負責教授同意。  非線性系統現象介紹，參數影響及應用模擬方法，數值分析及案例研究。
description.en: Nonlinear phenomena, Effects of parameters, Simulations and analyses, Case study.

notes: 機電所、製科所和自動化所合開，限 20 人

description.zh: 精確度、重覆性、精密度及解析度等、彈性變形及動態特性、背隙摩擦及動態特性、系統補償、精密機構及動態分析。
description.en: Accuracy, Repeatability, Precision and Resolution; Elastic Deformation, Backlash, Friction and their Dynamic Properties; System Compensation; precision Mechanisms and Dynamic Analysis.

notes: 機電所、製科所和機械、車輛外生班合開，限 40 人

description.zh: 本課程內容分二部分進行授課，第一個部份以小組進行校園建築進行實測後，繪製平、立、剖面圖，以加強學生團隊合作，並透過實際量測與繪製建築平、立、剖面圖，使學生感受實體與練習之關係；由於目前臺灣多以集合住宅建照申請居多，且住宅為空間尺度之根本；因此，第二個部份之課堂操作，依序為浴廁、臥室、廚房、餐廳、客廳單元等不同空間尺度練習後，聚焦於住宅平面圖之練習；接著，透過住宅平面圖之練習，衍伸至立面圖與剖面圖與透視圖練習。課程亦將藉由同學上述二個部分之練習，延續第一學期建築製圖基本常識、觀念與技法之傳授，以確實增進學生建築製圖能力。 本課程符合系教育目標如下： 1. 訓練學生建築設計與工程基礎專業能力； 2. 透過實作方式彙整建築設計與建築構造之技能； 3. 引導建立建築專業道德倫理態度； 4. 整合建築理論與實務提升就業競爭力。
description.en: This course will need the knowledge from the previous course Architectural Graphics (1) and apply them into graphics; The course have two parts, first part of the course will split the class into small groups ,students will first measuring the school buildings and than draw them into three-dimensional diagrams. Second, lecture the detail graphics of residential building such as the floor plan, bathroom, bedroom, kitchen etc. and more drawing practice on cross section graphics and elevation graphics. During the semester Introduction to graphics will enable the students ready for second semester. After this course the students will acquire the following aspects: 1). Advance knowledge in architectural design and engineering. 2). Practical skill in architectural design and structure. 3). Correct attitude in architectural professions moral. 4). Integrate theory an

notes: 建築一和創意一合開 (限主修建築系選課)，新聘專案教師

description.zh: 本課程主要在教導學生對西方 (歐洲及西亞) 認識歷史建築之演進過程與思考涵構，並使學生具備西方文化歷史與思想的相關知識，其主要授課內容如下：1. 在範圍上 -- 自古埃及、西亞、而收至古典建築、基督教建築、中世紀的大教堂時代以至文藝復興及 17、18 世紀的建築歷史。2. 在思想上 -- 自希臘的文化與哲學思想談起，以至各時代之政治、宗教與社會文明之演進，瞭解歷史涵構及其對建築的表現。3. 在建築上─針對每一時期的建築表現，瞭解其構造方法、材料應用及相關細部特徵。

notes: 建築一和創意一合開 (限主修建築系選課)

description.zh: 本課程之主要目的在於教授都市設計的基本分析理論與方法，除透過課堂案例的介紹與討論外，學生還將以分組方式進行觀察研究與運算分析。案例介紹與討論之重點在於認識影響都市空間環境品質的關鍵要素，而分組研究之目的則在於讓學生藉由各種現場觀察與數位分析工具的應用，進一步探索這些關鍵要素在都市空間形構過程的交互影響過程。
description.en: This course aims to introduce students to key theoretical and methodological approaches in urban design. The main content will be delivered through a series of case study discussion and project-based research practice. In specific, the case study is to review and identify key factors shaping the physical environment of cities; while through collaborative research projects, students are expected to engage in a step-by-step process of on-site observation and computational analysis, examining how the factors are interacting with each other.

notes: 建都所和設計博合開

description.zh: 當 Lumiere 兄弟於 1895 年末在巴黎一家咖啡館，舉辦第一場售票的電影放映會時，也正是全球第二次工業革命如火如荼影響人們的生產方式與都市生活之際，透過紀錄當代都市活動與工業化機械美學的短片，他們讓電影技術與城市發展從最初就密不可分，共同作為歌頌現代性的重要媒介。然而，學術界要遲到約莫百年之後，從 1990 年代開始才逐漸形成專門探討電影與城市互動關係的跨學門領域。來自電影研究、都市研究、地理學、歷史學、比較文學、區域研究？？等等領域的學者們，於過去三十數年間替電影城市研究貢獻心力。他們不只是藉由電影分析與相關史料爬梳來重新理解現代性、現代主義與當代都市的發展，也同時關注於二次大戰後流行的黑色電影 (film noir) 如何將當時的都市議題作為其創作主題，後續於 1970 年代起流行的各種近未來反烏托邦電影，又是怎麼進一步藉由預測人類都市的發展來反思當下，創造電影與城市間更為複雜的互文關係。千禧年之後，隨著電影工業與市場的全球化，電影逐漸成為具有都市行銷潛力的大眾媒體，電影場景更逐步發展成一個重要的觀光類型。同時因為電影技術門檻降低與社群媒體的發展，電影也不再只是電影公司或具有天份的獨立電影工作者的遊戲，更多難以分類的影像對都市空間進
description.en: While cinema has been invented over a hundred years and getting influential in shaping people’s perspectives to our environments, the studies of cinematic urbanism have only initiated since 1990s. During the past decades, this interdisciplinary field has developed upon the scholarships of various disciplines, including film and media studies, cultural studies, history, geography, urban studies, etc. This course intends to introduce this still young field through chronologically examining the relationships between cinema and cities, from both being used to celebrate and mediate the modern feelings,to film noir playing a crucial role to criticize and depict urban problems, and to cinematic urban imaginaries boosting tourism and intervening in urban process. Students will learn the theories and methodologies of cinematic urbanism studies, comprehending cinema and different urban spaces as powerful medium that could be manipulated to create, transmit, and perceive certain ideologies.

notes: 建都所和設計博合開

description.zh: 本課程從建築物構築方法和材料特性出發，介紹構法的歷史以及創新應用。內容包括現行工法的運用，以及先進工法的突破。藉由課程引導和案例介紹，培養學生構法知識與應用能力，提升學理與實務上的知能。
description.en: This course starts from building construction methods, introduces the technical history, innovative applications of construction methods. The content includes the application of current construction methods, as well as the breakthrough of advanced construction. Through course guidance and case study, students will cultivate their knowledge of construction method, and enhance their ability in academic theory and practice.

name.zh: 傳統與未來的建築構法

notes: 建都所和設計博合開

description.zh: 本課程主要在教導學生探討基本室內環境品質與人體健康間的關係，使學生具備創造健康室內環境的相關知識及操作能力，主要授課要點如下：1. 以各種類型的建築室內環境為主題；2. 探討人為環境與人體健康之關係；3. 探討建築材料、構造與設備對室內環境各項因子之影響；4. 學習室內環境品質量測儀器之操作與判讀能力；5. 具備診斷與改善一般室內環境議題之相關專業知識及操作能力。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to discuss the relationship between Indoor Environment Quality and human healthy, and make sure our students can realize the knowledge of healthy environment and manage it.Contents：1. The indoor environment of different types of building.2. The relationship between the artificial environment and human health.3. Discuss the influence of the building material, construction and equipment on indoor environment.4. Learn to use the instrument to measure indoor environment quality.5. Learn to diagnose and improve indoor environment quality.

notes: 建都所和設計博合開

description.zh: 培養正確的英語發音與腔調，並訓練學生熟悉如何使用音標記錄發音以及辨認學習者在英語發音中經常發生的問題。  課程中也介紹英語語音系統的主要規則。
description.en: This course will be concerned with English speech sounds and stress patterns, the use of phonetic symbols for transcribing pronunciation and identifying pronunciation problems. The general principles of English phonology will be introduced.

description.zh: 建立節能車輛模擬平台，用以評估主系統與次系統之性能與響應關係，並以行車型態為例，分析能量管理系統、引擎、馬達、燃料電池、變速箱與不同儲能電池彼此之特性影響，進一步完成整車調校與控制策略之修正；介紹節能車輛中所使用數學模型與相關理論，進一步連結到學生在實務時會遇到的實際案例，解釋所觀察到的物理反應現象。
description.en: Establish the energy-saving vehicle simulation platforms are developed in this study to evaluate performance and response between main system and subsystems. The driving cycles are adopted as an example and characteristics among energy management system (EMS), engine, motor, fuel cell, automated manual transmission (AMT) and Energy storage batteries are analyzed for further calibration and modification of control strategy. This course aims at teaching key mathematical models and related theories used in energy-saving vehicles, further links to actual cases that students will encounter on the scene, and explains the physical reaction phenomena observed.

name.zh: 節能車輛模擬與嵌入式系統
name.en: Energy-saving vehicle simulation and embedded system

notes: 日、職車輛所和能源與車輛外生合開

description.zh: 本課程以介紹電腦在工程設計應用為主，內容有電腦輔助繪圖含電腦三維實體模型建立、電腦模擬、最佳設計、有限元素分析等。
description.en: This course introduces the computer aided engineering techniques applied in mechanical engineering design. The course contents will include topics on computer aided design and draft including the creation of 3D solid model, computer simulation, Optimization technique, and finite element analysis techniques

notes: 機電所、製科所和機械外生班合開，限 40 人

description.zh: 使學生了解基本結構元素受震動時的反應，授課內容包括一度竹目由系統 (運動方程式、自由震盪反應、諧和荷重反應、週期荷重反應、衝擊荷重反應、一段動力荷重反應等) 多自由度系統 (結構性質矩陣之估算、無阻尼自由震盪、動力阻尼分析、實際震盪分析)、離散參數系統 (偏微分運動方程式、非阻尼自由震盪分析、動力反應分析、動力直接勁度法、波傳導分析)。
description.en: General theory for dynamic response of systems having one or several degrees of freedom. Emphasis on the application of dynamic response theory to structural design.

notes: 土木三四甲乙合開 // 限 40 人

description.zh: 本課程講授內容兼顧理論與實務。促使學習土木工程學生瞭解施工安全及衛生的重要性，如何規劃推動各項安全管理實務工作。確認施工觀念，發揮全面防災功能，確保施工安全與衛生。
description.en: The objective of this course is to introduce the protection of fire engineering， It will cover: Safety and disaster preclusion of opencast ground、foundation construction、hypothesis engineering、structure engineering、fitment engineering etc.

notes: 土木三四甲乙合開 / 限 20 人

description.zh: 工程地質對於工程結構物之規劃、設計、施工、維護等均有重要關係。本課程內容包括：(1) 地質調查、(2) 岩石之風化及其性質、(3) 地下探查、(4) 地球物理探測、(5) 邊坡滑動與山坡、(6) 建築物、結構物之基礎、(7) 公路與鐵路、(8) 隧道、(9) 壩址地質調查。
description.en: Fundamentals of mineralogy,petrology,sedimentation,stratigraphy,and structural geology needed by environmental scientists to understant earth materials.

notes: 土木三甲乙合開 / 限 40 人

description.zh: 概述內容最多各為 1000Bytes 給水及污水工程介紹自來水及汙水工程及其操作系統所需之原理、設計工具。其主要應用到流體力學、水文學、水處理及相關之設計及計算。主要的議題包含水質參數、地表水及地下水處理、自來水處理過程、汙染物移除、管網設計、汙水處理、生物處理、下水道建設、自來水及下水道操作及維護。
description.en: The Water Supply and Sewerage provides students with engineering principles and tools for designing and operating water and sewerage systems. It facilitates application of knowledge acquired in fluid mechanics, hydrology, water quality, design and computing. Key topics include water quality parameters; groundwater and surface water treatment; water treatment process technologies; nutrient removal; simplified sewerage; decentralised water and sanitation systems; biosolids management; and operation and maintenance of water supply and sanitation infrastructure.

notes: 土木三四甲乙合開 / 限 40 人

description.zh: 「Forecasting isn’t prediction.」- Paul Saffo 未來思考與趨勢前瞻，有助於讓每一位同學思索未來社會可能轉變得新趨勢和新的需求。無論同學希望學習或專精的技能為何，如何應用 該技能，提前 選擇一個在未來對社會或個人更可能有所助益的方向練習、實作，不斷繼續前進，才能夠將個人的意義進一步投射至未來的社會價值中；如此一來，未 來社會也將會給給予你應有的報酬。未來思考的課程，將師承奇點大學客座教授，同時也是美國史丹佛大學設計學院特聘助理教授 Paul Saffo 的 Forecasting 課程，內容將有 - 現況觀察、趨勢分析、未來事件辯論、未來趨勢矩陣圖、前瞻思考經典賞析（包含文章與電影） 等。
description.en: 「Forecasting isn’t prediction.」- Paul SaffoFuture Studies & Forecasting will be more and more important skill for every young generation students. What will the future look alike? What is the driving forces pushing us from current to the future? How many pace layers of future arrivals?In this class, we will discuss Stanford consulting prof. Paul Saffo’s Future Studies & Forecasting methods, by – Observing current trends, future event debate, Matrices and Axes of Uncertainty, future mindset developing, etc.

notes: 限 12 人，互動日碩 / 外碩與設計博合開

description.zh: 以圖像語言的架構教授分析性繪圖 (Analytical Drawing Process) 的概念與操作，以及分析性繪圖在設計速寫上的應用。課程以課堂講解與實地速寫來進行，主題包括感知與理解層面的三維觀察與紀錄、圖解、與圖像筆記。教學目標為：1. 介紹分析性繪圖與徒手草寫。2. 訓練以徒手草寫的過程來觀察、分析、與記錄結構、空間、與建成環境的三維特性。3. 熟悉感知與理解的圖學系統與速寫表現手法，能以圖像筆記來記錄設計主題。
description.en: This course introduces the concept of analytical drawing process, and how to utilize it in design sketching.The objectives are:1.Introduce the concept of analytical drawing process and techniques of freehand sketch. 2.Develop the ability to see and analyze the three-dimensional characteristics of an observed object and encountered environment through analytical drawing process. 3.Familiar with both conceptual and perceptual form of representation, and be able to take a visual note to document an investigated subject.

notes: 預選限 12 人，互動日碩 / 外碩與設計博合開

description.zh: 本課程將以問題導向學習 (Problem-based Learning) 的模式，學習設計思考的五個核心步驟：同理心分析、問題定義、創意發想、雛型發展、驗證評估。並透過實際案例的分析與操作，學習互動設計跨領域創新的方法。本課程的主要目標在於提供學生：1. 了解互動設計的方法與步驟；2. 探討互動設計跨領域創新的方法與操作模式；3. 透過實務案例的操作累積互動設計的執行經驗。
description.en: This course will use Problem-based Learning (PBL) method to teach the five kernel steps of design thinking including the following: Empathize, Define, Ideate, Prototype, and Test. It will also help students in knowing the interdisciplinary innovation methods of interaction design by case studies and real case operation. The main course goals include the following: gain an understanding of the methods and steps of interaction design; explore the methods and operation models for the interdisciplinary innovation of interaction design; and gain the experiences of interaction design by real cases analysis and operation.

notes: 請排 PBL 教室，限 15 人，日碩 / 外碩 / 設計博合開

description.zh: 本課程主要介紹在計算機科學中常見或基本的資料結構，探討的主題包括: ADT (抽像資料型態) 及複雜度，靜態結構與儲存表示，陣列，堆疊，佇列，串列，樹狀結構，遞迴，排序，搜尋。
description.en: This course is mainly aimed at introducing the data structures commonly used in programming languages which include ADT (abstract data type) and complexity, static structures and their storage representations, arrays, stacks, queues, linked lists, trees, recursion, sorting, and searching.

notes: 資工組必修，EMI 英文

description.zh: 本課程旨在幫助學生建立足夠的知識與技能在企業研究方法上。課程內容主要分為兩部分， 第一部分將首先介紹論文架構開始，緊接著介紹如何撰寫緒論、文獻探討、研究方法、資料收集、結果分析、討論、結論及參考文獻，配合課程中的實際案例討論，指導學生應注意的論文格式與規範。本課程的第二部分則在介紹目前企業研究上常用的各種數量方法，各種數量方法的原理及其應用的領域將以實際案例解釋說明，透過上課解說演練、討論、作業、報告等方式使學生熟悉各種研究方法。主要教授的研究方法包括層級分析法、網路程序分析、TOPSIS、VIKOR、灰關聯法、決策實驗分析法、模糊理論、約略集合及基本多變量分析。所教授的各種的研究方法將以 Excel 進行分析與計算演練，本課程學習結束後後，學生應當能具備足夠的能力使用各種研究方法於企業問題解決。
description.en: The objective of this course is to help students build up the knowledge/skills in business research methods. The content of the course can be divided by two major parts. The first part will begin from the introduction of thesis structure, followed by how to write the introduction, literature review, methodology, data collection, result analysis, discussion, remarking and reference. The format of thesis will also be illustrated by some class examples. The second part of the class will begin from the introduction of different quantity methods commonly used in business research methods today. The categories of research methods and their applicable problems are then presented using real-world case studies. Students can learn different decision making tools through lectures, discussion, assignment, term-projects and in class practices. The main methods include AHP, ANP, TOPSIS, VIKOR, DEMATEL, Gray Relation Methods, Fuzzy Set Theory, Rough Set Theory and some basic multivariate analysis. St

description.zh: 機器學習探討如何能由觀測到的資料中自我學習，自我進化，而能自動增進其處理效能。例如進行預測，特徵擷取，分類，模式辨認，決策，各種訊號處理，甚至建立人工智慧等等。本課程將介紹機器學習的基礎演算法、理論及工具。並讓學生嘗試在各種領域中實際實踐這些技術。課程內容包括：(a) 監督式學習（例如參數和非參數演算法、支持向量機和類神經網路等），(b) 無監督學習（例如群聚、降維和深度學習等）與 (c) 機器學習應用實例（例如語音信號處理，影像訊號處理，音訊訊號處理與自然語言處理，資訊擷取與資料搜尋等）。
description.en: Machine learning studies how to automatically learn from observed data to improve the performance of prediction, information extraction, clustering, pattern recognition, decision making, signal processing and even artificial intelligence. This course will introduce fundamental algorithms, theories and their practical applications. The content will cover (a) supervised learning, such as parametric and non-parametric algorithms, super vector machines and neural networks, (b) unsupervised learning, for example, data clustering, dimension reduction and deep learning and (c) practical applications on speech, image, audio signal and natural language processing or information retrieval and search, etc.

notes: 電子三四甲乙丙合開

description.zh: 在過去的 60 年裡，生物醫學工程學科發展已成為明確的，多樣化的，內容無所不包的領域；包括生物電現象、生物信息學、生物材料、生物力學、生物儀器、生物傳感器、生物信號處理等領域，以及生物技術、計算生物學和複雜多樣性、基因組學、醫學影像學、光學和雷射激光、輻射影像、組織工程等。本課程主要將適用於工程學門學生，且已完成物理、化學或生物學基礎課程為佳。此基礎在大二或大三的學生應該已可做好充分的準備。本課程將學習人體解剖學、生理學、生物物理學和生物醫學工程。整合了一系列知識，以幫助修課同學瞭解生物訊息和醫學儀器，並可以用來監測這些生物醫學現象。課程的學習主要是將這些生物醫學現象，運用其基礎於電力、壓力和流量的物理現象加以說明，並將這些生物醫學現象經由電子及工程的特殊條件和應用系統而呈現。在這種學習中，課程涵蓋了相關醫學和生物學領域、化學、物理、工程的知識和方法，期使將其成功及適當應用於多種生物醫學儀器。本課程將主要研習人體結構（解剖）及其功能系統（生理學），但這些原則同樣也可能適用於其它所有生命系統。經由醫學背景引導進入此領域，結合工程及材料師長的經驗及參與，將可含括主要生醫工程及組織工程領域的基礎
description.en: Over the past sixty years, as the discipline of biomedical engineering has evolved, it has become clear that it is a diverse, seemingly all-encompassing field that includes such areas as bioelectric phenomena, bioinformatics, biomaterials, biomechanics, bioinstrumentation, biosensors, biosignal processing, biotechnology, computational biology and complexity, genomics, medical imaging, optics and lasers, radiation imaging, tissue engineering, moral and ethical issues. This course will be designed primarily for engineering students who have completed physical equations and a basic course in statics of chemistry and biology.  Students in their sophomore year or junior year should be adequately prepared for this course.  This course will be learning about human anatomy, biophysics, physiology, and biomedical engineering. It brings together a number of disciplines to help understand biomedical phenomena and the instrumentation that can be used to monitor these phenomena. It is primarily abo

name.zh: 人體生物學及生物物理學
name.en: Biology and Biophysics of Human Body

notes: 電子三四甲乙與電子所合開

description.zh: 課程綱要： 1. 半導體元件簡介 2. 物理氣相沉積 3. 化學氣相沉積 4. 微影─光阻覆蓋，曝光，顯影 5. 蝕刻─濕式蝕刻，乾式蝕刻 6. 攙雜─擴散法，離子植入法 7. 氧化和熱處理製程
description.en: Course Outline： 1.Introduction to Semiconductor Device 2.Physical Vapor Deposition 3.Chemical Vapor Deposition 4.Photolithography─photoresist coating, exposure, development 5.Etching─wet etching, dry etching 6.Doping─diffusion, ion implantation 7.Oxidation and Thermal Treatment Process

notes: 電子三四甲乙合開

description.zh: １. 數值解之介紹：精確度與誤差觀念２. 插值及多項式３. 數值積分與微４. 數值線性代數５. 非線性方程式之解６. 曲線配合與函數近似７. 近似解理論８. 常微分方程式的數值解法９. 偏微分方程式的數值解法
description.en: 1.Preliminary of Numerical Solutions2.Interpolations and Polynomials3.Numerical Differentiation and Integratin 4.Numerical Linear Algebra5.Numerical solution fo Nonlinear Systems6.Curve Fitting and cubic spline Interpolation 7.Approximation Theory8.Numerical Solution of Ordinary Differential Equations9.Numerical Solution of Partial Differential Equations

notes: 電子三四甲乙、四丙合開

description.zh: 1. 簡介；2. 組合邏輯系統設計；3. 標準組合邏輯模組；4. 算術組合模組與網路；5. 順序邏輯系統設計；6. 標準順序邏輯模組；7. RTL 系統；8. 資料及控制子系統；9. 微處理器設計。10. 數位系統設計之原則與方法；11. ASM (Algorithm StateMachine) Chart 之應用與序向邏輯方法：傳統式合成法、多工器控制法、One-Hot 法、ROM-Based 法；12. ASIC 所需之基本 SSI/MSI 元件；13. 使用 SSI/MSI 基本元件解決邏輯問題；14. 採用數位系統設計之原理與方法，利用 ASIC 之基本元件，再配合基本閘設計 ALU、CPU 控制器、中斷控制器、DMA 控制器等 IC 元件；15.Bit-Slice 計算機設計；16. 微程式設計；17.Hardwired CPU 設計。
description.en: 1. Introduction; 2. Design of combinational systems; 3. Standard combinational modules; 4. Arithmetic combinational modules and networks5. Design of sequential network; 6. Standard sequential network; 7. Register transfer level (RTL) systems; 8. Data and control subsystems; 9. Design of a microcomputer; 7.Principles of digital system design; 8.ASM chart 9.SSI/MSI component 10.Application of ASIC component 11.Bit-Slice machine 12.Hardwared CPU design.

notes: 電子三四甲乙合開

description.zh: 近年來許多關於人工智慧、網路應用、甚至於嵌入式系統等等的場域皆使用 Python 來做為開發之程式語言。有鑑於多數的 Python 開發者皆將 Python 作為一般的直譯式程式語言，卻沒有善用到 Python 物件導向之特性，因此本門課將主要以 Python 物件導向程式撰寫為出發，輔以要求學生開發各類型之應用來熟悉 Python 物件導向程式之特點，並且教導學生使用各類型之應用函式庫來讓學生更加熟悉 Python 之特性，期末亦會要求學生利用所學習到之技巧來開發網路前後端程式。
description.en: Recently, many artificial intelligence (AI), network, and embedded system application developers use Python programming language to implement their systems. However, many developers only take Python as a script language instead of using Python’s object oriented characteristics. This class will mainly start from programming Python by the object-oriented way. Students will be required to implement various kinds of assignments to learn the characteristics of Python objects. Besides, students can learn how to apply all kinds of Python application programming interfaces to understand the Python more. In the end of this class, students will be required to develop a network application containing a frond-end client and back-end server to show their achievements.

name.zh: Python 物件導向實務應用
name.en: Advanced Object Oriented Programming in Python

notes: 電子四甲乙與電子所合開，總人數限 30 人

description.zh: 瞭解常見之演算法及其分析，1.Complexity、Big-Oh 符號，2. 演算法之分析，3. 集合、優先佇列，4. 樹、平衡樹，5. 排序演算法，6. 搜尋演算法，7. 圖形演算法，8. 幾何演算法，9.NP-complete problems 之理論及對策。
description.en: 1.Complexity 2.Analysis of algorithms3.Set,priorty queue4.Tree,Balanced tree5.Sorting algorithms6.Search algorithms7.Graph algorithms8.Geometry algorithms9.NP-complete problems

notes: 電子三甲乙丙合開

description.zh: (1) 簡介 (2) FPGA 系統 (3) FPGA 結構 (4) 組合邏輯設計 (5) 順序機設計 (6) FPGA 雛形系統設計 (7) FPGA 雛形系統驗證 (8) 大型系統設計
description.en: (1)Introduction(2)FPGA-Based Systems(3)FPGA Fabrics(4)Combinational Logic Design(5)Sequential Machines Design(6)FPGA Prototyping Systems Design(7)FPGA Prototyping Systems Verification(8)Large-Scale Systems Design

notes: 電子三甲乙合開

description.zh: 1. 積體電路的分類，2. 積體電路晶片設計的流程，3.CMOS 元件的基本結構與佈局，4.CMOS 元件的設計規範技術，5.CMOS 元件組成各種數位電路，6. 以高階方法探討積體電路之設計，7. 系統分割，8. 設計問題之探討，9.IC 的構造， 10. 設計方法，11. 時序問題之探討，12. 鐘脈問題之探討，13.VLSI 之測試，14. 有助於設計與測試的結構化技巧探討，15. 專題製作。
description.en: 1.Classification of VLSI circuit 2.Flow of VLSI design 3.VLSI characterization 4.CMOS design methods5.CMOS digital circuit 6.High-level VLSI design7.System partiton 8.Time squence9.Clock10.VLSI testing 11.Special projects

notes: 電子三甲乙合開

description.zh: 1. 程式語言類別介紹 2. 物件導向與資料抽象化 3. 類別與方法 4. 訊息﹐實例與初始化 5. 繼承 6. 靜態與動態繫結 7. 多型性 8. 發展環境及工具 9. C++ Java Smalltalk 簡介 10. 應用程式實例介紹
description.en: 1.Programming Language Paradigms  2.Object-Orientation and Data Abstraction  3.Classes and Methods 4.Messages, Instances, and Initialization 5.Inheritance  6.Static and Dynamic Binding7.Polymorphism  8.Environment and Tools  9.Introduction to C++, Java, and Smalltalk 10.Case Study

description.zh: 1. 程式語言類別介紹 2. 物件導向與資料抽象化 3. 類別與方法 4. 訊息﹐實例與初始化 5. 繼承 6. 靜態與動態繫結 7. 多型性 8. 發展環境及工具 9. C++ Java Smalltalk 簡介 10. 應用程式實例介紹
description.en: 1.Programming Language Paradigms  2.Object-Orientation and Data Abstraction  3.Classes and Methods 4.Messages, Instances, and Initialization 5.Inheritance  6.Static and Dynamic Binding7.Polymorphism  8.Environment and Tools  9.Introduction to C++, Java, and Smalltalk 10.Case Study

description.zh: 本課程在訓練學生如何使用電腦輔助設計軟体來設計電力電子積體電路，進而能培養學生具有設計電力電子積體電路的能力，課程內容包念： 1. 電源管理 IC 設計簡介 2. 電壓參考電路設計 3. 低電壓降電壓調整器設計 4. 交換式電壓調整器 5. 交換電容電源轉換器 6. 電池充電技術與應用 7. 設計專題討論
description.en: This course is trained the student to use computer-aided design tools for the design of power electronic integrated circuit. Therefore, the student has the design capability of power electronic integrated circuit. The contents of this course: 1.Introduction to power management IC design 2. Voltage reference Design 3.Low dropout regulator design 4. Switching voltage regulator 5.Switching Capacitor Regulator 6.Battery charging techniques and applications 7.Design project discussion

name.zh: 電力電子積體電路設計

description.zh: 1. 傳輸線 2. 散射參數 3. 微波主動元件 4. 寬頻放大電路 5. 低雜訊放大電路 6. 功率放大器 7. 高穩定振盪器 8. 壓控振盪器 9. 鎖相迴路 10. 混波器
description.en: 1.Transmission line2.Scattering parameters3.Microwave active components4.Wideband amplifier5. Low noise Amplifier 6.Power amplifier 7.Highly-stable oscillator8.Voltage-controlled oscillators9. Phase-locked loop10. Mixers

notes: 電子所與電資外生所合開

description.zh: 本課程包含：1. 散射參數與網路分析儀 2. 頻譜儀介紹 3. 自動化量測 4. 平面化傳輸線 5. 射頻集總元件與阻抗匹配 6. 積體電路封裝 7. 射頻耦合器 8. 射頻濾波器學生能從這門課學習到射頻被動元件的分析、設計與應用。
description.en: This course covers: 1.S-parameter and Network Analyzer2.Introduction to Spectrum Analyzer3.Automatic Measurement4.Planar Transmission Lines5.RF Lump Elements and Impedance Matching6.IC Package7.RF Coupler8.RF FilterThe students can learn the analysis, design, and applications of RF passive circuits from this course.

notes: 電子所日職合開

description.zh: 本課程以介紹電磁波散射與微波電路組件為主，深入介紹下列議題並討論如何分析、設計、製作與量測：1. 雷達系統之簡介。2. 智慧型車用雷達。3. 表面散射與體積散射。4. 微波遙測。5. 各種高頻轉接電路的設計。 6. 各種高頻平面電路的設計。7. 多端埠平面電路的量測校正技術。
description.en: 1. Introduction to radar systems.2. Intelligent vehicular radar systems.3. Surface scattering and volume scattering.4. Microwave remote sensing.5. Designs for various high-frequency transitions. 6. Designs for various high-frequency planar circuits.7. Measurement and calibration techniques for multi-port planar circuits.

description.zh: 本課程為線性代數的深化與廣化。以理論的深化而言，本課程由高斯消去法談起，解釋四個向量空間，進而說明矩陣的正交性與投影。接著，本課程闡述行列式、特徵值與特徵向量、矩陣的乘冪與指數、頻譜分解，最終收尾於奇異值分解，以此定理統整這一學期的所有內容。以應用的廣化而言，本課程在上述理論說明之外，還會特別介紹科學、工程的應用實例，例如迴歸分析、線性規劃、圖論與網路、主成份分析。
description.en: 1. Introduction - Importance of Linear Algebra2. Ax=b, Matrix, Gaussian Elimination and Application3. Vector Spaces and Linear Equation4. Applications: Graphs and Networks5. Orthogonality and Least Squares6. Applications: Multiple Regression7. Application: Linear Programming 8. Determinant and its Applications9. Eigenvalues and Eigenvectors10. Ak and Difference Equations11. eA and Differential Equations12. Similarity Transformation and Spectral Theorem13. Positive Definite Matrices and Minimum Principles14. Applications: Multivariate Analysis and Principal Component Analysis15. Singular Value Decomposition and its Applications

notes: 電子所與電資外生所合開

description.zh: (1) 物聯網概述，(2) 物聯網感知層，(3) 物聯網網路層，(4) 物聯網應用層，(5) 物聯網平台與雲端運算，(6) 無線感測網路 802.15.4 與 ZigBee，(7) 無線感測網路應用，(8) RFID 原理與應用，(9) WSNs 至 IoT，(10) 近期發展與研究議題。
description.en: (1) Introduction to the Internet of Things (IoT), (2) IoT: Perception Layer, (3) IoT: Network Layer, (4) IoT: Application Layer, (5) IoT Platform and Could Computing, (6) Wireless Sensor Networks (WSNs): 802.15.4 and ZigBee, (7) WSN Applications, (8) Principles and Applications of RFID, (9) WSNs to IoT, (10) Recent Advances and Related Research Issues.

name.en: Internet of Things and Sensor Networks

notes: 電子所和 AI、資工學程合開

This course will be designed primarily for engineering students who have completed physical equations and a basic course in statics of chemistry and biology.  Students in their sophomore year or junior year should be adequately prepared for this course.  This course will be learning about human anatomy, biophysics, physiology, and biomedical engineering. It brings together a number of disciplines to help understand biomedical phenomena and the instrumentation that can be used to monitor these phenomena. It is primarily abo

name.zh: 人體生物學及生物物理學

notes: 電子三四甲乙與電子所合開

description.zh: 本課程介紹異質多網多媒體的特性與架構，包含：有線及無線網路的內容介紹，以及整合有線及無線網路成為異質網路的概念，其中將針對 IEEE 802.21 Media Independent Handover (MIH) 教導學生針對異質網路垂直切換的原理及技術。最後，對於多媒體服務技術及原理做介紹，包含：VoIP 服務以及視訊串流服務的介紹，以及如何針對 多種異質網路整合多媒體服務的介紹，藉此提升學生對於新世代異質多網多媒體服務之認識。
description.en: This course introduces the characteristics and architecture of multimedia service in heterogeneous network environment. First, wired and wireless networks, e.g., 3G/3.5G/4G, Wi-Fi, Bluetooth and other popular wireless access techniques, would be introduced one by one. Then, by describing the theory and technology of IEEE 802.21 Media Independent Handover (MIH), this course would show how to integrate multiple different networks into heterogeneous network environments and how to handoff among them. Finally, regarding multimedia service, VoIP and video streaming services would be taken into consideration. This course would introduce how to provide multimedia services over heterogeneous network environment. Therefore, students can learn the next-generation techniques about multimedia services in heterogeneous network environment from this course.

name.en: Multimedia Service in Heterogeneous Network Environment

notes: 限 30 人，電子所和 AI 學程合開

description.zh: 1. 數學基礎   1.1 函數成長率之漸近性質   1.2 遞迴關係之解   1.3 數學歸納法 2. 基本分析技巧   2.1 計算複雜度之上下限   2.2 最差情況分析及平均情況分析   2.3 動態平均分析 3. 基本設計技巧   3.1 分擊法   3.2 貪婪法   3.3 動態規劃   3.4 隨機演算法 4. 計算複雜度   4.1 資訊理論證明法   4.2 對抗式證明法   4.3 問題之線性轉換   4.4 完全 NP
description.en: 1. Mathematical background   1.1 Asymptotic growth rate of functions   1.2 Solving recurrence relations   1.3 Mathematical induction2. Basic analysis techniques   2.1 Computational complexities -- lower bounds and upper bounds   2.2 Worst case analysis and average case analysis   2.3 Amortized analysis3. Basic Design Paradigms   3.1 Divide and conquer   3.2 Greedy methods   3.3 Dynamic programming   3.4 Probabilistic algorithms4. Computational Complexity   4.1 Information-theoretic arguments   4.2 Adversary arguments   4.3 Linear reduction of problems   4.4 NP-completeness

name.en: Design and Analysis of Computer Algorithms

notes: 電子所日職、電資外生所和資安學程合開

description.zh: 1. 醫用電子學之基礎。2. 生醫電物理化學之基礎。3. 人體生理系統與經絡系統介紹。4. 生醫系統電物理化學模型分析。5. 醫用電探針、感測器元件與生物晶片的應用。6. 量測理論與生醫電訊號量測技術。7. 生醫電訊號處理技術。8. 超音波、紅外線、X 光、CT、磁振醫學造影原理與影像處理。9. 醫用電子安全規格製訂。10. 醫用醫療儀器與生化分析儀設計。11.DICOM、HL7 醫療網路資訊系統介紹。12. 中西醫工應用系列介紹。
description.en: 1.Fundamental of medical electronics。2.Fundamental of electro-physiology。3.Introduction to human body system and Meridian system。4.Electronic physics-chemical modeling analysis of   biomedical system。5.Applications of medical electrode、biosensor and biochip。 6.Medical measurement theory and technology。7.Processing technology of biomedical signals。8.Constructing and processing of ultrasound、infrared、X-ray  、CT and MRI Imaging。9.Safety specifications of medical electronic devices。10.Designs of biomed

description.zh: 本課程在研習數位電視，此課程包含 EDTV HDTV，SDTV。其課程目的在給予學習者了解數位電視分析與設計，並強調基礎與應用知識以符合工業界的需求，課程內容可包括下列主題。1. 影像簡介， 2. 顏色空間， 3. 類比影像介面， 4. 數位影像介面， 5. 數位影像處理， 6. NTSC,  PAL, 和 SECAM 系統， 7. H.261 和 H.263， 8. MPEG， 9. 數位電視。
description.en: This course is concerned with the digital television (DTV) design, which includes Enhanced Definition Television (EDTV), High Definition Television (HDTV), Standard Definition Television (SDTV). Its purpose is to deal with the analysis and design of DTV system, emphasizing fundamentals as well as new paradigms that students need to master in today's industry. The course covers the following topics. 1. Introduction to Video; 2. Color space; 3. Analog video interfaces; 4. Digital Video Interfaces; 5. Digital Video Processing; 6. NTSC, PAL, and SECAM system; 7. H.261 and H.263; 8. MPEG ; 9. Digital Television (DTV).

notes: 電子四甲乙、電子所、AI 學程和電資外生所合開

description.zh: 生態工法的概念和原則近年來廣泛地引介和應用在各種的土木工程領域中，包括河溪、坡地、都市和交通建設等，而由於土石流和坡地災害的頻繁發生，因此在山坡地應用生態工法遂成為重要的課題，也逐漸成為應該提供給土木系學生，使其瞭解相關基礎知識的重要課程，因此在本導論課程中，我們將介紹如何將生物地工技術和土壤生物工程（Biotechnical and Soil Bioengineering）應用在邊坡穩定和侵蝕控制上，使學生認識並瞭解目前在邊坡保護上結合工程力學分析、植物學知識和實際案例應用的發展，並藉此介紹國內外常用的邊坡穩定工法，以及結合不同傳統擋土設施的可行方式。本課程無先修課程限制，建議研究所和大學部高年級同學選修。
description.en: The concept and principles of ecological engineering has been widely adopted by various disciplines of traditional civil engineering, including hydraulic engineering, slope stabilization, urban infrastructures, and transportation engineering. Among them, slope stabilization is a particularly important topic because of the frequent occurrence of debris flows and landslides in Taiwan, and thus it becomes necessary to provide such a course to familiarize students with this important field. In this introductory course, we will explain the fundamental concepts of biotechnical and soil bioengineering and how to apply them to the slope stabilization and erosion control. An interdisciplinary approach that combines the knowledge and understanding of both mechanical design and vegetation properties will be emphasized. The results can be integrated with traditional retaining structures to create more economical and eco-friendly slope stabilization systems. No prerequisite.

name.en: Biotechnical and Soil Bioengineering Slope Stabilization

notes: 土木四甲乙和防災所合開 / 大學部 13 人

description.zh: 基於學生畢業後的生涯發展，本課程目標旨在提供學生清楚認知未來的生涯發展，進而規劃自己的進路。針對設計學生畢業後的發展可以從學術界與實務界兩方面考量，學術界以直升研究所或工作後再修讀在職專班，而實務界則以可從事的相關職場做介紹與分析各行業的特色與前途，可擔任的職務名稱包括：互動設計師、互動程式設計師、使用者介面設計師、互動廣告企劃等，以供學生參考。
description.en: Based on the personal career development,  the course aims to provide a clearly scope and knowledge of future career development. This career can be analyzed in two categories, one is academic field that provide the master program and in-job training program; the another is practical field which concerns about more related design job, such as interaction designer, interactive programmer, user interface designer and interactive advertisement planner. This course not only introduces the design-related job, but also analyzes their characteristics and future development route.

notes: 請排六教 526, 修課限 35 人

description.zh: 隨著衛星資料的取得變得更為容易，衛星遙測在各領域的應用在近年來變得更為廣泛。本課程將從遙測之基本概念開始介紹，接著介紹常用的衛星資料來源，最後本課程將簡介在土木與環工領域的衛星遙測應用。本課程一半以上的時間將為實作，學生將熟習在遙測分析軟體上分析真正的衛星資料，並在學期末遞交對自選主題之一研究報告。
description.en: The applications of satellite remote sensing data in various fields have been popular with the increase of selections of satellite data sources in recent years. This course will start with basic concepts of remote sensing, then introduce popular satellite data sources. In the end, the course will introduce applications of satellite data in the field of civil and environmental engineering. More than 50% of the class time will be hands-on. Students will have the opportunity to work on actual satellite data. At the end of the semester, students will need to submit a research report on topics chosen by students.

name.zh: 土木與環工之衛星遙測應用與實作
name.en: Applications of Satellite Remote Sensing in Civil and Environmental Engineering with labs

notes: 土木四甲乙和防災所合開 / EMI 英文 / 大學部限 25 人

description.zh: 本課程旨在講授互動式廣告的規劃與製作原理，包括互動式媒體的特性、廣告製作可如何掌握、發揮互動式媒體的特性，以及建置、設計、發展、與維護互動式廣告所需的相關概念、科技與技能。本課程亦教導同學如何應用電腦影像（computer imaging）與多媒體的科技與技術，來製作互動式廣告。
description.en: This course is mainly about the planning and principles of interactive advertisement production such as features of interactive media, how can advertisement production control and develop the features of interactive media, as well as the related concepts, technology, and skills needed in order to build, design, develop, and maintain interactive advertisement. Students will learn how to use computer imaging and the technology and techniques of multi-media to make an interactive advertisement.

notes: 請排三教 307, 限本系生修，限 15 人，日職合開

description.zh: 以結構工程、大地工程、防災科學、運輸交通、營建管理、營建材料及營建技術為專題討論主題之主要範疇。
description.en: SeminarSpecial subject discussion of structure engineering , geography engineering pretecting calamity science, transportation, construction management , construction material and construction technique.

notes: 丙丁戊組

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。自動化機械設計簡介、自動化機械設計程序、驅動器、感測器、基礎電器控制及電工配線、基礎數位電路設計、氣液壓及電控迴路的邏輯設計法、可程式控制器、監控系統、自動化系統的規劃及評估。
